original: Śaṃkara: Upadeśasāhasrī
caitanyaṃ sarvagaṃ sarvaṃ sarvabhūtaguhāśayam /
analyzed: caitanyam sarva gam sarvam sarva bhūta guhā āśayam

original: yat sarvaviṣayātītaṃ tasmai sarvavide namaḥ // SamUpad_I,1.1 //
analyzed: yat sarva viṣaya atītam tasmai sarva vide namaḥ

original: samāpayya kriyāḥ sarvā dārāgnyādhānapūrvikāḥ /
analyzed: samāpayya kriyāḥ sarvāḥ dāra agnyādhāna pūrvikāḥ

original: brahmavidyām athedānīṃ vaktuṃ vedaḥ pracakrame // SamUpad_I,1.2 //
analyzed: brahma vidyām atha idānīm vaktum vedaḥ pracakrame

original: karmāṇi dehayogārthaṃ dehayoge priyāpriye /
analyzed: karmāṇi deha yoga artham deha yoge priya apriye

original: dhruve syātāṃ tato rāgo dveṣaś caiva tataḥ kriyāḥ // SamUpad_I,1.3 //
analyzed: dhruve syātām tatas rāgaḥ dveṣaḥ ca eva tatas kriyāḥ

original: dharmādharmau tato 'jñasya dehayogas tathā punaḥ
analyzed: dharma adharmau tatas jñasya deha yogaḥ tathā punar

original: evaṃ nityapravṛtto 'yaṃ saṃsāraś cakravad bhṛśam // SamUpad_I,1.4 //
analyzed: evam nitya pravṛttaḥ yam saṃsāraḥ cakra vat bhṛśam

original: ajñānaṃ tasya mūlaṃ syād iti taddhānam iṣyate /
analyzed: ajñānam tasya mūlam syāt iti tat hānam iṣyate

original: brahmavidyāta ārabdhā tato niḥśreyasaṃ bhavet // SamUpad_I,1.5 //
analyzed: brahma vidyātaḥ ārabdhā tatas niḥśreyasam bhavet

original: vidyaivājñānahānāya na karmāpratikūlataḥ /
analyzed: vidyā eva ajñāna hānāya na karma a pratikūlataḥ

original: nājñānasyāprahāṇe hi rāgadveṣakṣayo bhavet // SamUpad_I,1.6 //
analyzed: na ajñānasya aprahāṇe hi rāga dveṣa kṣayaḥ bhavet

original: rāgadveṣakṣayābhāve karma doṣodbhavaṃ dhruvam /
analyzed: rāga dveṣa kṣaya abhāve karma doṣa udbhavam dhruvam

original: tasmān niḥśreyasārthāya vidyaivātra vidhīyate // SamUpad_I,1.7 //
analyzed: tasmāt niḥśreyasa arthāya vidyā eva atra vidhīyate

original: nanu karma tathā nityaṃ kartavyaṃ jīvane sati /
analyzed: nanu karma tathā nityam kartavyam jīvane sati

original: vidyāyāḥ sahakāritvaṃ mokṣaṃ prati hi tad vrajet // SamUpad_I,1.8 //
analyzed: vidyāyāḥ sahakāri tvam mokṣam prati hi tat vrajet

original: yathā vidyā tathā karma coditatvāviśeṣataḥ /
analyzed: yathā vidyā tathā karma codita tva aviśeṣataḥ

original: pratyavāyasmṛteś caiva kāryaṃ karma mumukṣubhiḥ // SamUpad_I,1.9 //
analyzed: pratyavāya smṛteḥ ca eva kāryam karma mumukṣubhiḥ

original: nanu dhruvaphalā vidyā nānyat kiṃcid apekṣate /
analyzed: nanu dhruva phalā vidyā na anyat kiṃcid apekṣate

original: nāgniṣṭomo yathaivānyad dhruvakāryo 'py apekṣate // SamUpad_I,1.10 //
analyzed: na agniṣṭomaḥ yathā eva anyat dhruva kāryā u pi apekṣate

original: tathā dhruvaphalā vidyā karma nityam apekṣate /
analyzed: tathā dhruva phalā vidyā karma nityam apekṣate

original: ity evaṃ kecid icchanti na karma pratikūlataḥ // SamUpad_I,1.11 //
analyzed: iti evam kecid icchanti na karma pratikūlataḥ

original: vidyāyāḥ pratikūlaṃ hi karma syāt sābhimānataḥ /
analyzed: vidyāyāḥ pratikūlam hi karma syāt sa abhimānataḥ

original: nirvikārātmabuddhiś ca vidyetīha prakīrtitā // SamUpad_I,1.12 //
analyzed: nirvikāra ātma buddhiḥ ca vidyā iti iha prakīrtitā

original: ahaṃ kartā mamedaṃ syād iti karma pravartate /
analyzed: aham kartā mama idam syāt iti karma pravartate

original: vastvadhīnā bhaved vidyā kartradhīno bhaved vidhiḥ // SamUpad_I,1.13 //
analyzed: vastu adhīnā bhavet vidyā kartṛ adhīnaḥ bhavet vidhiḥ

original: kārakāṇy upamṛdnāti vidyābbuddhim ivoṣare /
analyzed: kārakāṇi upamṛdnāti

original: tatsatyamatim ādāya karma kartuṃ vyavasyati // SamUpad_I,1.14 //
analyzed: tat satya matim ādāya karma kartum vyavasyati

original: viruddhatvād ataḥ śakyaṃ karma kartuṃ na vidyayā /
analyzed: viruddha tvāt atas śakyam karma kartum na vidyayā

original: sahaivaṃ viduṣā tasmāt karma heyaṃ mumukṣuṇā // SamUpad_I,1.15 //
analyzed: saha evam viduṣā tasmāt karma heyam mumukṣuṇā

original: dehādyair aviśeṣeṇa dehino grahaṇaṃ nijam /
analyzed: deha ādyaiḥ aviśeṣeṇa dehinaḥ grahaṇam nijam

original: prāṇināṃ tad avidyotthaṃ tāvat karmavidhir bhavet // SamUpad_I,1.16 //
analyzed: prāṇinām tat avidyā uttham tāvat karma vidhiḥ bhavet

original: neti netīti dehādīn apohyātmāvaśeṣitaḥ /
analyzed: na iti na iti iti deha ādīn apohya ātma avaśeṣitaḥ

original: aviśeṣātmabodhārthaṃ tenāvidyā nivartitā // SamUpad_I,1.17 //
analyzed: a viśeṣa ātma bodha artham tena avidyā nivartitā

original: nivṛttā sā kathaṃ bhūyaḥ prasūyeta pramāṇataḥ /
analyzed: nivṛttā sā katham bhūyas prasūyeta pramāṇataḥ

original: asaty evāviśeṣe hi pratyagātmani kevale // SamUpad_I,1.18 //
analyzed: asati eva aviśeṣe hi pratyagātmani kevale

original: na ced bhūyaḥ prasūyeta kartā bhokteti dhīḥ katham /
analyzed: na ced bhūyas prasūyeta kartā bhoktā iti dhīḥ katham

original: sad asmīti ca vijñāne tasmād vidyāsahāyikā // SamUpad_I,1.19 //
analyzed: sat asmi iti ca vijñāne tasmāt vidyā sahāyikā

original: atyarecayad ity ukto nyāsaḥ śrutyāta eva hi /
analyzed: atyarecayat iti uktaḥ nyāsaḥ śrutyā atas eva hi

original: karmabhyo mānasāntebhya etāvad iti vājinām // SamUpad_I,1.20 //
analyzed: karmabhyaḥ mānasa antebhyaḥ etāvat iti vājinām

original: amṛtatvaṃ śrutaṃ tasmāt tyājyaṃ karma mumukṣubhiḥ /
analyzed: amṛta tvam śrutam tasmāt tyājyam karma mumukṣubhiḥ

original: agniṣṭomavad ity uktaṃ tatredam abhidhīyate // SamUpad_I,1.21 //
analyzed: agniṣṭoma vat iti uktam tatra idam abhidhīyate

original: naikakārakasādhyatvāt phalānyatvāc ca karmaṇaḥ /
analyzed: na eka kāraka sādhya tvāt phala anya tvāt ca karmaṇaḥ

original: vidyā tadviparītāto dṛṣṭānto viṣamo bhavet // SamUpad_I,1.22 //
analyzed: vidyā tad viparītā atas dṛṣṭāntaḥ viṣamaḥ bhavet

original: kṛṣyādivat phalārthatvād anyakarmopabṛṃhaṇam /
analyzed: kṛṣi ādi vat phala artha tvāt anya karma upabṛṃhaṇam

original: agniṣṭomas tv apekṣeta vidyānyat kim apekṣate // SamUpad_I,1.23 //
analyzed: agniṣṭomaḥ tu apekṣeta vidyā anyat kim apekṣate

original: pratyavāyas tu tasyaiva yasyāhaṃkāra iṣyate /
analyzed: pratyavāyaḥ tu tasya eva yasya ahaṃkāraḥ iṣyate

original: ahaṃkāraphalārthitve vidyete nātmavedinaḥ // SamUpad_I,1.24 //
analyzed: ahaṃkāra phala arthi tve vidyete na ātma vedinaḥ

original: tasmād ajñānahānāya saṃsāravinivṛttaye /
analyzed: tasmāt ajñāna hānāya saṃsāra vinivṛttaye

original: brahmavidyāvidhānāya prārabdhopaniṣat tv iyam // SamUpad_I,1.25 //
analyzed: brahmavidyā vidhānāya prārabdhā upaniṣad tu iyam

original: sader upanipūrvasya kvipi copaniṣad bhavet /
analyzed: sadeḥ upani pūrvasya kvipi ca upaniṣad bhavet

original: mandīkaraṇabhāvāc ca garbhādeḥ śātanāt tathā // SamUpad_I,1.26 //
analyzed: mandīkaraṇa bhāvāt ca garbha ādeḥ śātanāt tathā

original: iti caitanyaprakaraṇam // SamUpad_I,1 //
analyzed: iti caitanya prakaraṇam

original: pratiṣeddhum aśakyatvān neti netīti śeṣitam /
analyzed: pratiṣeddhum aśakya tvāt na iti na iti iti śeṣitam

original: idaṃ nāham idaṃ nāham ity addhā pratipadyate // SamUpad_I,2,1 //
analyzed: idam na aham idam na aham iti addhā pratipadyate

original: idaṃdhīr idamātmotthā vācārambhaṇagocarā /
analyzed: idam dhīḥ idam ātma utthā vācā ārambhaṇa gocarā

original: niṣiddhātmodbhavatvāt sā na punar mānatāṃ vrajet // SamUpad_I,2.2 //
analyzed: niṣiddha ātma udbhava tvāt sā na punar māna tām vrajet

original: pūrvabuddhim abādhitvā nottarā jāyate matiḥ /
analyzed: pūrva buddhim a bādhitvā na uttarā jāyate matiḥ

original: dṛśir ekaḥ svayaṃsiddhaḥ phalatvāt sa na bādhyate // SamUpad_I,2.3 //
analyzed: dṛśiḥ ekaḥ svayam siddhaḥ phala tvāt sa na bādhyate

original: idaṃvanam atikramya śokamohādidūṣitam /
analyzed: idam vanam atikramya śoka moha ādi dūṣitam

original: vanād gāndhārako yadvat svam ātmānaṃ prapadyate // SamUpad_I,2.4 //
analyzed: vanāt gāndhārakaḥ yadvat svam ātmānam prapadyate

original: iti pratiṣedhaprakaraṇam // SamUpad_I,2 //
analyzed: iti pratiṣedha prakaraṇam

original: īśvaraś ced anātmā syān nāsāv asmīti dhārayet /
analyzed: īśvaraḥ ced anātmā syāt na asau asmi iti dhārayet

original: ātmā ced īśvaro 'smīti vidyā sānyanivartikā // SamUpad_I,3.1 //
analyzed: ātmā ced īśvaraḥ smi iti vidyā sā anya nivartikā

original: ātmano 'nyasya ced dharmā asthūlatvādayo matāḥ /
analyzed: ātmanaḥ nyasya ced dharmāḥ asthūla tva ādayaḥ matāḥ

original: ajñeyatve 'sya kiṃ taiḥ syād ātmatve tv anyadhīhnutiḥ // SamUpad_I,3.2 //
analyzed: ajñeya tve kim taiḥ syāt ātma tve tu anya dhī hnutiḥ

original: mithyādhyāsaniṣedhārthaṃ tato 'sthūlādi gṛhyatām /
analyzed: mithyā adhyāsa niṣedha artham tatas sthūla ādi gṛhyatām

original: paratra cen niṣedhārthaṃ śūnyatāvarṇanaṃ hi tat // SamUpad_I,3.3 //
analyzed: paratra ced niṣedha artham śūnyatā varṇanam hi tat

original: bubhutsor yadi cānyatra pratyagātmana iṣyate /
analyzed: bubhutsoḥ yadi ca anyatra pratyagātmanaḥ iṣyate

original: aprāṇo hy amanāḥ śubhra iti cānarthakaṃ vacaḥ // SamUpad_I,3.4 //
analyzed: a prāṇaḥ hi a manāḥ śubhraḥ iti ca anarthakam vacaḥ

original: itīśvaraprakaraṇam // SamUpad_I,3 //
analyzed: iti īśvara prakaraṇam

original: ahaṃpratyayabījaṃ yad ahaṃpratyayavatsthitam /
analyzed: ahaṃpratyaya bījam yat ahaṃpratyaya vat sthitam

original: nāhaṃpratyayavahnyuṣṭaṃ kathaṃ karma prarohati // SamUpad_I,4.1 //
analyzed: na ahaṃpratyaya vahni uṣṭam katham karma prarohati

original: dṛṣṭavac cet prarohaḥ syān nānyakarmā sa iṣyate /
analyzed: dṛṣṭa vat ced prarohaḥ syāt na anya karmā saḥ iṣyate

original: tannirodhe kathaṃ tat syāt pṛcchāmo vas tad ucyatām // SamUpad_I,4.2 //
analyzed: tad nirodhe katham tat syāt pṛcchāmaḥ vaḥ tat ucyatām

original: dehādyārambhasāmarthyāj jñānaṃ sadviṣayaṃ tvayi /
analyzed: deha ādi ārambha sāmarthyāt jñānam sat viṣayam tvayi

original: abhibhūya phalaṃ kuryāt karmānte jñānam udbhavet // SamUpad_I,4.3 //
analyzed: abhibhūya phalam kuryāt karmānte jñānam udbhavet

original: ārabdhasya phale hy ete bhogo jñānaṃ ca karmaṇaḥ /
analyzed: ārabdhasya phale hi ete bhogaḥ jñānam ca karmaṇaḥ

original: avirodhas tayor yukto vaidharmyaṃ cetarasya tu // SamUpad_I,4.4 //
analyzed: avirodhaḥ tayoḥ yuktaḥ vaidharmyam ca itarasya tu

original: dehātmajñānavaj jñānaṃ dehātmajñānabādhakam /
ātmany eya bhaved yasya sa necchann api mucyate // SamUpad_I,4.5 //
analyzed: ātmani bhavet yasya sa na icchan api mucyate

original: [tataḥ sarvam idaṃ siddhaṃ prayogo 'smābhir īritaḥ // SamUpad_I,4.5 //]
analyzed: tatas sarvam idam siddham prayogaḥ smābhiḥ īritaḥ

original: ity ahaṃpratyayaprakaraṇam // SamUpad_I,4 //
analyzed: iti ahaṃpratyaya prakaraṇam

original: mūtrāśaṅko yathodaṅko nāgrahīd amṛtaṃ muniḥ /
analyzed: mūtrāśaṅkaḥ yathā udaṅkaḥ na agrahīt amṛtam muniḥ

original: karmanāśabhayāj jantor ātmajñānāgrahas tathā // SamUpad_I,5.1 //
analyzed: karma nāśa bhayāt jantoḥ ātma jñāna āgrahaḥ tathā

original: buddhisthaś calatīvātmā dhyāyatīva ca dṛśyate /
analyzed: buddhi sthaḥ calati iva ātmā dhyāyati iva ca dṛśyate

original: naugatasya yathā vṛkṣās tadvat saṃsāravibhramaḥ // SamUpad_I,5.2 //
analyzed: naugatasya yathā vṛkṣāḥ tadvat saṃsāra vibhramaḥ

original: nausthasya prātilomyena nagānāṃ gamanaṃ yathā /
analyzed: nausthasya prātilomyena nagānām gamanam yathā

original: ātmanaḥ saṃsṛtis tadvad dhyāyatīveti hi śrutiḥ // SamUpad_I,5.3 //
analyzed: ātmanaḥ saṃsṛtiḥ tadvat dhyāyati iva iti hi śrutiḥ

original: caitanyapratibimbena vyāpto bodho hi jāyate /
analyzed: caitanya pratibimbena vyāptaḥ bodhaḥ hi jāyate

original: buddheḥ śabdādinirbhāsas tena momuhyate jagat // SamUpad_I,5.4 //
analyzed: buddheḥ śabda ādi nirbhāsaḥ tena momuhyate jagat

original: caitanyābhāsatāhamas tādarthyaṃ ca tad asya yat /
analyzed: caitanya ābhāsa tā ahamaḥ tādarthyam ca tat asya yat

original: idamaṃśaprahāṇe na paraḥ so 'nubhavo bhavet // SamUpad_I,5.5 //
analyzed: idam aṃśa prahāṇe na paraḥ saḥ nubhavaḥ bhavet

original: iti mūtrāśaṅkaprakaraṇam // SamUpad_I,5 //
analyzed: iti mūtra āśaṅkā prakaraṇam

original: chittvā tyaktena hastena svayaṃ nātmā viśeṣyate /
analyzed: chittvā tyaktena hastena svayam nā ātmā viśeṣyate

original: tathā śiṣṭena sarveṇa yena yena viśeṣyate // SamUpad_I,6.1 //
analyzed: tathā śiṣṭena sarveṇa yena yena viśeṣyate

original: tasmāt tyaktena hastena tulyaṃ sarvaṃ viśeṣaṇam /
analyzed: tasmāt tyaktena hastena tulyam sarvam viśeṣaṇam

original: anātmatvena tasmāj jño muktaḥ sarvaviśeṣaṇaiḥ // SamUpad_I,6.2 //
analyzed: anātma tvena tasmāt jñaḥ muktaḥ sarva viśeṣaṇaiḥ

original: viśeṣaṇam idaṃ sarvaṃ sādhvalaṃkaraṇaṃ yathā /
analyzed: viśeṣaṇam idam sarvam sādhu alaṃkaraṇam yathā

original: avidyāstam ataḥ sarvaṃ jñāta ātmany asad bhavet // SamUpad_I,6.3 //
analyzed: avidyā astam atas sarvam jñāte ātmani asat bhavet

original: jñātaivātmā sadā grāhyo jñeyam utsṛjya kevalaḥ /
analyzed: jñātā eva ātmā sadā grāhyaḥ jñeyam utsṛjya kevalaḥ

original: aham ity api yad grāhyaṃ vyapetāṅgasamaṃ hi tat // SamUpad_I,6.4 //
analyzed: aham iti api yat grāhyam vyapeta aṅga samam hi tat

original: yāvān syād idamaṃśo yaḥ sa svato 'nyo viśeṣaṇam /
analyzed: yāvān syāt idam aṃśaḥ yaḥ sa svatas nyaḥ viśeṣaṇam

original: viśeṣaprakṣayo yatra siddho jñaś citragur yathā // SamUpad_I,6.5 //
analyzed: viśeṣa prakṣayaḥ yatra siddhaḥ jñaḥ citraguḥ yathā

original: idam aṃśo 'ham ity atra tyājyo nātmeti paṇḍitaiḥ /
analyzed: idam aṃśaḥ ham iti atra tyājyaḥ na ātmā iti paṇḍitaiḥ

original: ahaṃ brahmeti śiṣṭo 'ṃśo bhūtapūrvagater bhavet // SamUpad_I,6.6 //
analyzed: aham brahma iti śiṣṭaḥ ṃśaḥ bhūta pūrva gateḥ bhavet

original: iti chittvāprakaraṇam // SamUpad_I,6 //
analyzed: iti chittvā prakaraṇam

original: buddhyārūḍhaṃ sadā sarvaṃ dṛśyate yatra tatra vā /
analyzed: buddhi ārūḍham sadā sarvam dṛśyate yatra tatra vā

original: mayā tasmāt paraṃ brahma sarvajñaś cāsmi sarvagaḥ // SamUpad_I,7.1 //
analyzed: mayā tasmāt param brahma sarvajñaḥ ca asmi sarvagaḥ

original: yathātmabuddhicārāṇāṃ sākṣī tadvat pareṣv api /
analyzed: yathā ātma buddhi cārāṇām sākṣī tadvat pareṣu api

original: naivāpoḍhuṃ na vādātuṃ śakyas tasmāt paro hy aham // SamUpad_I,7.2 //
analyzed: na eva apoḍhum na vā ādātum śakyaḥ tasmāt paraḥ hi aham

original: vikāritvam aśuddhatvaṃ bhautikatvaṃ na cātmanaḥ /
analyzed: vikāri tvam aśuddha tvam bhautika tvam na ca ātmanaḥ

original: aśeṣabuddhisākṣitvād buddhivac cālpavedanā // SamUpad_I,7.3 //
analyzed: aśeṣa buddhi sākṣi tvāt buddhi vat ca alpa vedanā

original: maṇau prakāśyate yadvad raktādyākāratātape /
analyzed: maṇau prakāśyate yadvat rakta ādi ākāra tā ātape

original: mayi saṃdṛśyate sarvam ātapeneva tan mayā // SamUpad_I,7.4 //
analyzed: mayi saṃdṛśyate sarvam ātapena iva tat mayā

original: buddhau dṛśyaṃ bhaved buddhau satyāṃ nāsti viparyaye /
analyzed: buddhau dṛśyam bhavet buddhau satyām na asti viparyaye

original: draṣṭā yasmāt sadā draṣṭā tasmād dvaitaṃ na vidyate // SamUpad_I,7.5 //
analyzed: draṣṭā yasmāt sadā draṣṭā tasmāt dvaitam na vidyate

original: avivekāt parābhāvaṃ yathā buddhir avet tathā /
analyzed: avivekāt parābhāvam yathā buddhiḥ avet tathā

original: vivekāt tu parād anyaḥ svayaṃ cāpi na vidyate // SamUpad_I,7.6 //
analyzed: vivekāt tu parāt anyaḥ svayam ca api na vidyate

original: iti buddhyārūḍhaprakaraṇam // SamUpad_I,7 //
analyzed: iti buddhi ārūḍha prakaraṇam

original: citisvarūpaṃ svata eva me mate rasādiyogas tava mohakāritaḥ /
analyzed: citi svarūpam svatas eva me mate rasa ādi yogaḥ tava moha kāritaḥ

original: ato na kiṃcit tava ceṣṭitena me phalaṃ bhavet sarvaviśeṣahānataḥ // SamUpad_I,8.1 //
analyzed: atas na kiṃcid tava ceṣṭitena me phalam bhavet sarva viśeṣa hānataḥ

original: vimucya māyāmayakāryatām iha praśāntim āyāhy asadīhitāt sadā /
analyzed: vimucya māyā maya kārya tām iha praśāntim āyāhi asat īhitāt sadā

original: ahaṃ paraṃ brahma sadā vimuktavat tathājam ekaṃ dvayavarjitaṃ yataḥ // SamUpad_I,8.2 //
analyzed: aham param brahma sadā vimukta vat tathā ajam ekam dvaya varjitam yatas

original: sadā ca bhūteṣu samo 'smi kevalo yathā ca khaṃ sarvagam akṣaraṃ śivam /
analyzed: sadā ca bhūteṣu samaḥ smi kevalaḥ yathā ca kham sarvagam akṣaram śivam

original: nirantaraṃ niṣkalam akriyaṃ paraṃ tato na me 'stīha phalaṃ tavehitaiḥ // SamUpad_I,8.3 //
analyzed: nirantaram niṣkalam akriyam param tatas na me sti iha phalam tava īhitaiḥ

original: ahaṃ mamaiko na tadanyad iṣyate tathā na kasyāpy aham asmy asaṅgataḥ /
analyzed: aham mama ekaḥ na tad anyat iṣyate tathā na kasya api aham asmi asaṅgataḥ

original: asaṅgarūpo 'ham ato na me tvayā kṛtena kāryaṃ tava cādvayatvataḥ // SamUpad_I,8.4 //
analyzed: asaṅga rūpaḥ ham atas na me tvayā kṛtena kāryam tava ca advaya tvataḥ

original: phale ca hetau ca jano viṣaktavān iti pracintyāham ato vimokṣaṇe /
analyzed: phale ca hetau ca janaḥ viṣaktavān iti pracintya aham atas vimokṣaṇe

original: janasya saṃvādam imaṃ prakḷptavān svarūpatattvārthavibodhakāraṇam // SamUpad_I,8.5 //
analyzed: janasya saṃvādam imam prakḷptavān sva rūpa tattva artha vibodha kāraṇam

original: saṃvādam etaṃ yadi cintayen naro vimucyate 'jñānamahābhayāgamāt /
analyzed: saṃvādam etam yadi cintayet naraḥ vimucyate jñāna mahā bhaya āgamāt

original: vimuktakāmaś ca tathā janaḥ sadā caraty aśokaḥ sama ātmavit sukhī // SamUpad_I,8.6 //
analyzed: vimukta kāmaḥ ca tathā janaḥ sadā carati aśokaḥ samaḥ ātma vid sukhī

original: iti citisvarūpaprakaraṇam // SamUpad_I,8 //
analyzed: iti citi svarūpa prakaraṇam

original: sūkṣmatāvyāpite jñeye gandhāder uttarottaram /
analyzed: sūkṣma tā vyāpite jñeye gandha ādeḥ uttarottaram

original: pratyagātmāvasāneṣu pūrvapūrvaprahāṇataḥ // SamUpad_I,9.1 //
analyzed: pratyagātma avasāneṣu pūrva pūrva prahāṇataḥ

original: śārīrā pṛthivī tāvad yāvad bāhyā pramāṇataḥ /
analyzed: śārīrā pṛthivī tāvat yāvat bāhyā pramāṇataḥ

original: abādīni ca tattvāni tāvaj jñeyāni kṛtsnaśaḥ // SamUpad_I,9.2 //
analyzed: ap ādīni ca tattvāni tāvat jñeyāni kṛtsnaśas

original: vāyvādīnāṃ yathotpatteḥ pūrvaṃ khaṃ sarvagaṃ tathā /
analyzed: vāyu ādīnām yathā utpatteḥ pūrvam kham sarvagam tathā

original: aham ekaḥ sadā sarvaś cinmātraḥ sarvago 'dvayaḥ // SamUpad_I,9.3 //
analyzed: aham ekaḥ sadā sarvaḥ cit mātraḥ sarva gaḥ dvayaḥ

original: brahmādyāḥ sthāvarāntā ye prāṇino mama pūḥ smṛtāḥ /
analyzed: brahma ādyāḥ sthāvara antāḥ ye prāṇinaḥ mama pūḥ smṛtāḥ

original: kāmakrodhādayo doṣā jāyeran me kuto 'nyataḥ // SamUpad_I,9.4 //
analyzed: kāma krodha ādayaḥ doṣāḥ jāyeran me kutas

original: bhūtadoṣaiḥ sadāspṛṣṭaṃ sarvabhūtastham īśvaram /
analyzed: bhūta doṣaiḥ sadā a spṛṣṭam sarva bhūta stham īśvaram

original: nīlaṃ vyoma yathā bālo duṣṭaṃ māṃ vīkṣate janaḥ // SamUpad_I,9.5 //
analyzed: nīlam vyoma yathā bālaḥ duṣṭam mām vīkṣate janaḥ

original: maccaitanyāvabhāsyatvāt sarvaprāṇidhiyāṃ sadā /
analyzed: mad caitanya avabhāsya tvāt sarva prāṇi dhiyām sadā

original: pūr mama prāṇinaḥ sarve sarvajñasya vipāpmanaḥ // SamUpad_I,9.6 //
analyzed: pūḥ mama prāṇinaḥ sarve sarva jñasya vipāpmanaḥ

original: janimaj jñānavijñeyaṃ svapnajñānavad iṣyate /
analyzed: janimat jñāna vijñeyam svapna jñānavat iṣyate

original: nityaṃ nirviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ tasmād dvaitaṃ na vidyate // SamUpad_I,9.7 //
analyzed: nityam nirviṣayam jñānam tasmāt dvaitam na vidyate

original: jñātur jñātir hi nityoktā suṣupte tv anyaśūnyataḥ /
analyzed: jñātuḥ jñātiḥ hi nitya uktā suṣupte tu anya śūnyataḥ

original: jāgrajjñātis tv avidyātas tad grāhyaṃ cāsad iṣyatām // SamUpad_I,9.8 //
analyzed: jāgrat jñātiḥ tu avidyātaḥ tat grāhyam ca asat iṣyatām

original: rūpavattvādyasattvān na dṛṣṭyādeḥ karmatā yathā /
analyzed: rūpavat tva ādi asattvāt na dṛṣṭi ādeḥ karma tā yathā

original: evaṃ vijñānakarmatvaṃ bhūmno nāstīti gamyate // SamUpad_I,9.9 //
analyzed: evam vijñāna karma tvam bhūmnaḥ na asti iti gamyate

original: iti sūkṣmatāprakaraṇam // SamUpad_I,9 //
analyzed: iti sūkṣmatā prakaraṇam

original: dṛśisvarūpaṃ gaganopamaṃ paraṃ sakṛdvibhātaṃ tv ajam ekam akṣaram /
analyzed: dṛśi sva rūpam gagana upamam param sakṛt vibhātam tu ajam ekam akṣaram

original: alepakaṃ sarvagataṃ yad advayaṃ tad eva cāhaṃ satataṃ vimukta om // SamUpad_I,10.1 //
analyzed: alepakam sarva gatam yat advayam tat eva ca aham satatam vimuktaḥ om

original: dṛśis tu śuddho 'ham avikriyātmako na me 'sti kaścid viṣayaḥ svabhāvataḥ /
analyzed: dṛśiḥ tu śuddhaḥ ham a vikriyā ātmakaḥ na me sti kaścid viṣayaḥ svabhāvataḥ

original: puras tiraś cordhvam adhaś ca sarvataḥ supūrṇabhūmā tv aja ātmani sthitaḥ // SamUpad_I,10.2 //
analyzed: puras tiras ca ūrdhvam adhas ca sarvatas su pūrṇa bhūmā tu ajaḥ ātmani sthitaḥ

original: ajo 'maraś caiva tathājaro 'mṛtaḥ svayaṃprabhaḥ sarvagato 'ham advayaḥ /
analyzed: ajaḥ maraḥ ca eva tathā ajaraḥ mṛtaḥ svayaṃprabhaḥ sarva gataḥ ham advayaḥ

original: na kāraṇaṃ kāryam atīva nirmalaḥ sadaiva tṛptaś ca tato vimukta om // SamUpad_I,10.3 //
analyzed: na kāraṇam kāryam atīva nirmalaḥ sadā eva tṛptaḥ ca tatas vimuktaḥ om

original: suṣuptajāgratsvapataś ca darśanaṃ na me 'sti kiṃcit svam iveha mohanam /
analyzed: suṣupta jāgrat svapataḥ ca darśanam na me sti kiṃcid svam iva iha mohanam

original: svataś ca teṣāṃ parato 'py asattvatas turīya evāsmi sadā dṛg advayaḥ // SamUpad_I,10.4 //
analyzed: svatas ca teṣām paratas pi a sattvataḥ turīyaḥ evā asmi sadā dṛś advayaḥ

original: śarīrabuddhīndriyaduḥkhasaṃtatir na me na cāhaṃ mama nirvikārataḥ /
analyzed: śarīra buddhīndriya duḥkha saṃtatiḥ na me na ca aham mama nirvikārataḥ

original: asattvahetoś ca tathaiva saṃtater asattvam asyāḥ svapato hi dṛśyavat // SamUpad_I,10.5 //
analyzed: asattva hetoḥ ca tathā eva saṃtateḥ asattvam asyāḥ svapataḥ hi dṛśya vat

original: idaṃ tu satyaṃ mama nāsti vikriyā vikārahetur na hi me 'dvayatvataḥ /
analyzed: idam tu satyam mama nā asti vikriyā vikāra hetuḥ na hi me dvaya tvataḥ

original: na puṇyapāpe na ca mokṣabandhane na cāsti varṇāśramatāśarīrataḥ // SamUpad_I,10.6 //
analyzed: na puṇya pāpe na ca mokṣa bandhane na ca asti varṇa āśrama tā śarīrataḥ

original: anādito nirguṇato na karma me phalaṃ ca tasmāt paramo 'ham advayaḥ /
analyzed: anāditaḥ nirguṇataḥ na karma me phalam ca tasmāt paramaḥ ham advayaḥ

original: yathā nabhaḥ sarvagataṃ na lipyate tathā hy ahaṃ dehagato 'pi sūkṣmataḥ // SamUpad_I,10.7 //
analyzed: yathā nabhaḥ sarva gatam na lipyate tathā hi aham sūkṣmataḥ

original: sadā ca bhūteṣu samo 'ham īśvaraḥ kṣarākṣarābhyāṃ paramo hy athottamaḥ /
analyzed: sadā ca bhūteṣu samaḥ ham īśvaraḥ kṣara akṣarābhyām paramaḥ hi atha uttamaḥ

original: parātmatattvaś ca tathādvayo 'pi san viparyayeṇābhivṛtas tv avidyayā // SamUpad_I,10.8 //
analyzed: parātma tattvaḥ ca san viparyayeṇa abhivṛtaḥ tu avidyayā

original: avidyayā bhāvanayā ca karmabhir vivikta ātmāvyavadhiḥ sunirmalaḥ /
analyzed: avidyayā bhāvanayā ca karmabhiḥ viviktaḥ ātmā avyavadhiḥ su nirmalaḥ

original: dṛgādiśaktipracito 'ham advayaḥ sthitaḥ svarūpe gaganaṃ yathācalam // SamUpad_I,10.9 //
analyzed: dṛś ādi śakti pracitaḥ ham advayaḥ sthitaḥ svarūpe gaganam yathā acalam

original: ahaṃ paraṃ brahma viniścayātmadṛṅ na jāyate bhūya iti śruter vacaḥ /
analyzed: aham param brahma viniścaya ātma dṛś na jāyate bhūyas iti śruteḥ vacaḥ

original: na caiva bīje tv asati prajāyate phalaṃ na janmāsti tato hy amohatā // SamUpad_I,10.10 //
analyzed: na ca eva bīje tu asati prajāyate phalam na janma asti tatas hi amoha tā

original: mamedam itthaṃ ca tavāda īdṛśaṃ tathāham evaṃ na paro 'pi cānyathā /
analyzed: mama idam ittham ca tava ādaḥ īdṛśam tathā aham evam na ca anyathā

original: vimūḍhataivāsya janasya kalpanā sadā same brahmaṇi vādvaye śive // SamUpad_I,10.11 //
analyzed: vimūḍha tā evā asya janasya kalpanā sadā same brahmaṇi vā advaye śive

original: yad advayaṃ jñānam atīva nirmalaṃ mahātmanāṃ tatra na śokamohatā /
analyzed: yat advayam jñānam atīva nirmalam mahātmanām tatra na śoka moha tā

original: tayor abhāve na hi karma janma vā bhaved ayaṃ vedavidāṃ viniścayaḥ // SamUpad_I,10.12 //
analyzed: tayoḥ abhāve na hi karma janma vā bhavet ayam veda vidām viniścayaḥ

original: suṣuptavaj jāgrati yo na paśyati dvayaṃ tu paśyann api cādvayatvataḥ /
analyzed: suṣupta vat jāgrati yaḥ na paśyati dvayam tu paśyan api ca advaya tvataḥ

original: tathā ca kurvann api niṣkriyaś ca yaḥ sa ātmavin nānya itīha niścayaḥ // SamUpad_I,10.13 //
analyzed: tathā ca kurvan api niṣkriyaḥ ca yaḥ saḥ ātma vid na anyaḥ iti iha niścayaḥ

original: itīdam uktaṃ paramārthadarśanaṃ mayā hi vedāntaviniścitaṃ param /
analyzed: iti idam uktam parama artha darśanam mayā hi vedānta viniścitam param

original: vimucyate 'smin yadi niścito bhaven na lipyate vyomavad eva karmabhiḥ // SamUpad_I,10.14 //
analyzed: vimucyate smin yadi niścitaḥ bhavet na lipyate vyoma vat eva karmabhiḥ

original: iti dṛśiprakaraṇam // SamUpad_I,10 //
analyzed: iti dṛśi prakaraṇam

original: īkṣitṛtvaṃ svataḥsiddhaṃ jantūnāṃ ca tato 'nyatā /
analyzed: īkṣitṛ tvam svatas siddham jantūnām ca tatas

original: ajñānād ity ato 'nyatvaṃ sad asīti nivartyate // SamUpad_I,11.1 //
analyzed: ajñānāt iti atas sat asi iti nivartyate

original: etāvad dhy amṛtatvaṃ na kiṃcid anyat sahāyakam /
analyzed: etāvat hi amṛta tvam na kiṃcid anyat sahāyakam

original: jñānasyeti bruvac chāstraṃ saliṅgaṃ karma bādhate // SamUpad_I,11.2 //
analyzed: jñānasya iti bruvat śāstram sa liṅgam karma bādhate

original: sarveṣāṃ manaso vṛttam aviśeṣeṇa paśyataḥ /
analyzed: sarveṣām manasaḥ vṛttam aviśeṣeṇa paśyataḥ

original: tasya me nirvikārasya viśeṣaḥ syāt kathaṃcana // SamUpad_I,11.3 //
analyzed: tasya me nirvikārasya viśeṣaḥ syāt kathaṃcana

original: manovṛttaṃ manaś caiva svapnavaj jāgratīkṣituḥ /
analyzed: manaḥ vṛttam manaḥ ca eva svapnavat jāgrati īkṣituḥ

original: saṃprasāde dvayāsattvāc cinmātraḥ sarvago 'dvayaḥ // SamUpad_I,11.4 //
analyzed: saṃprasāde dvaya asattvāt cit mātraḥ sarvagaḥ dvayaḥ

original: svapnaḥ satyo yathābodhād dehātmatvaṃ tathaiva ca /
analyzed: svapnaḥ satyaḥ yathā bodhāt deha ātma tvam tathā eva ca

original: pratyakṣādeḥ pramāṇatvaṃ jāgrat syād ātmavedanāt // SamUpad_I,11.5 //
vyomavat sarvabhūtastho bhūtadoṣair vivarjitaḥ /
analyzed: vyoma vat sarva bhūta sthaḥ bhūta doṣaiḥ vivarjitaḥ

original: sākṣī cetāguṇaḥ śuddho brahmaivāsmīti kevalaḥ // SamUpad_I,11.6 //
analyzed: sākṣī śuddhaḥ brahma eva asmi iti kevalaḥ

original: nāmarūpakriyābhyo 'nyo nityamuktasvarūpavān /
analyzed: nāma rūpa kriyābhyaḥ nyaḥ nitya mukta sva rūpavān

original: aham ātmā paraṃ brahma cinmātro 'haṃ sadādvayaḥ // SamUpad_I,11.7 //
analyzed: aham ātmā param brahma cit mātraḥ ham sadā advayaḥ

original: ahaṃ brahmāsmi kartā ca bhoktā cāsmīti ye viduḥ /
analyzed: aham brahma asmi kartā ca bhoktā ca asmi iti ye viduḥ

original: te naṣṭā jñanakarmabhyāṃ nāstikāḥ syur na saṃśayaḥ // SamUpad_I,11.8 //
analyzed: te naṣṭāḥ jñana karmabhyām nāstikāḥ syuḥ na saṃśayaḥ

original: dharmādharmaphalair yoga iṣṭo 'dṛṣṭo yathātmanaḥ /
analyzed: dharma adharma phalaiḥ yogaḥ iṣṭaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ yathā ātmanaḥ

original: śāstrād brahmatvam apy asya mokṣo jñānāt tatheṣyatām // SamUpad_I,11.9 //
analyzed: śāstrāt brahmatvam api asya mokṣaḥ jñānāt tathā iṣyatām

original: yā māhārajanādyās tā vāsanāḥ svapnadarśibhiḥ /
analyzed: yāḥ māhārajana ādyāḥ tāḥ vāsanāḥ svapna darśibhiḥ

original: anubhūyanta eveha tato 'nyaḥ kevalo dṛśiḥ // SamUpad_I,11.10 //
analyzed: anubhūyante evā iha tatas kevalaḥ dṛśiḥ

original: kośād iva viniṣkṛṣṭaḥ kāryakāraṇavarjitaḥ /
analyzed: kośāt iva viniṣkṛṣṭaḥ kārya kāraṇa varjitaḥ

original: yathāsir dṛśyate svapne tadvad boddhā svayaṃprabhaḥ // SamUpad_I,11.11 //
analyzed: yathā asiḥ dṛśyate svapne tadvat boddhā svayaṃprabhaḥ

original: āpeṣāt pratibuddhasya jñasya svābhāvikaṃ padam /
analyzed: āpeṣāt pratibuddhasya jñasya svābhāvikam padam

original: uktaṃ netyādivākyena kalpitasyāpanetṛṇā // SamUpad_I,11.12 //
analyzed: uktam na ityādi vākyena kalpitasya apanetṛṇā

original: mahārājādayo lokā mayi yadvat prakalpitāḥ /
analyzed: mahā rāja ādayaḥ lokāḥ mayi yadvat prakalpitāḥ

original: svapne tadvad dvayaṃ vidyād rūpaṃ vāsanayā saha // SamUpad_I,11.13 //
analyzed: svapne tadvat dvayam vidyāt rūpam vāsanayā saha

original: dehaliṅgātmanā kāryā vāsanārūpiṇā kriyā /
analyzed: deha liṅga ātmanā kāryā vāsanā rūpiṇā kriyā

original: netinetyātmarūpatvān na me kāryā kriyā kvacit // SamUpad_I,11.14 //
analyzed: na iti neti ātma rūpa tvāt na me kāryā kriyā kvacid

original: na tato 'mṛtatāśāsti karmaṇo 'jñānahetutaḥ /
analyzed: na tatas mṛta tā āśā asti karmaṇaḥ jñāna hetutaḥ

original: mokṣasya jñānahetutvān na tadanyad apekṣate // SamUpad_I,11.15 //
analyzed: mokṣasya jñāna hetu tvāt na tat anyat apekṣate

original: amṛtaṃ cābhayaṃ nārtaṃ netītyātmā priyo mama /
analyzed: amṛtam ca abhayam na ārtam na iti iti ātmā priyaḥ mama

original: viparītam ato 'nyad yat tyajet tat sakriyaṃ tataḥ // SamUpad_I,11.16 //
analyzed: viparītam atas yat tyajet tat sa kriyam tatas

original: itīkṣitṛtvaprakaraṇam // SamUpad_I,11 //
analyzed: iti īkṣitṛ tva prakaraṇam

original: prakāśasthaṃ yathā dehaṃ sālokam abhimanyate /
analyzed: prakāśa stham yathā deham sa ālokam abhimanyate

original: draṣṭrābhāsaṃ tathā cittaṃ draṣṭāham iti manyate // SamUpad_I,12.1 //
analyzed: draṣṭṛ ābhāsam tathā cittam draṣṭā aham iti manyate

original: yad eva dṛṣyate loke tenābhinnatvam ātmanaḥ /
analyzed: yat eva dṛṣyate loke tena abhinna tvam ātmanaḥ

original: prapadyate tato mūḍhas tenātmānaṃ na vindati // SamUpad_I,12.2 //
analyzed: prapadyate tatas mūḍhaḥ tena ātmānam na vindati

original: daśamasya navātmatvapratipattivad ātmanaḥ /
analyzed: daśamasya nava ātmatva pratipatti vat ātmanaḥ

original: dṛśyeṣu tadvad evāyaṃ mūḍho loko na cānyathā // SamUpad_I,12.3 //
analyzed: dṛśyeṣu tadvat eva ayam mūḍhaḥ lokaḥ na ca anyathā

original: tvaṃ kuru tvaṃ tad eveti pratyayāv ekakālikau /
analyzed: tvam kuru tvam tat eva iti pratyayau ekakālikau

original: ekanīḍau kathaṃ syātāṃ viruddhau nyāyato vada // SamUpad_I,12.4 //
analyzed: eka nīḍau katham syātām viruddhau nyāyataḥ vada

original: dehābhimānino duḥkhaṃ nādehasya svabhāvataḥ /
analyzed: deha abhimāninaḥ duḥkham na adehasya svabhāvataḥ

original: svāpavat tatprahāṇāya tat tvam ity ucyate dṛśeḥ // SamUpad_I,12.5 //
analyzed: svāpa vat tad prahāṇāya tat tvam iti ucyate dṛśeḥ

original: dṛśeś chāyā yadārūḍhā mukhacchāyeva darśane /
analyzed: dṛśeḥ chāyā yad ārūḍhā mukha chāyā iva darśane

original: paśyaṃs taṃ pratyayaṃ yogī dṛṣṭa atmeti manyate // SamUpad_I,12.6 //
analyzed: paśyan tam pratyayam yogī dṛṣṭa ātmā iti manyate

original: taṃ ca mūḍhaṃ ca yady anyaṃ pratyayaṃ vetti no dṛśeḥ /
analyzed: tam ca mūḍham ca yadi anyam pratyayam vetti no dṛśeḥ

original: sa eva yogināṃ śreṣṭho netaraḥ syān na saṃśayaḥ // SamUpad_I,12.7 //
analyzed: saḥ eva yoginām śreṣṭhaḥ na itaraḥ syāt na saṃśayaḥ

original: vijñāter yas tu vijñātā sa tvam ity ucyate yataḥ /
analyzed: vijñāteḥ yaḥ tu vijñātā sa tvam iti ucyate yatas

original: sa syād anubhavas tasya tato 'nyo 'nubhavo mṛṣā // SamUpad_I,12.8 //
analyzed: sa syāt anubhavaḥ tasya tatas nyaḥ nubhavaḥ mṛṣā

original: dṛśirūpe sadā nitye darśanādarśane mayi /
analyzed: dṛśi rūpe sadā nitye darśana adarśane mayi

original: kathaṃ syātāṃ tato nānya iṣyate 'nubhavas tataḥ // SamUpad_I,12.9 //
analyzed: katham syātām tatas nā anyaḥ iṣyate nubhavaḥ tatas

original: yatsthas tāpo raver dehe dṛśeḥ sa viṣayo yathā /
analyzed: yad sthaḥ tāpaḥ raveḥ dehe dṛśeḥ sa viṣayaḥ yathā

original: sattvasthas tadvad eveha dṛśeḥ sa viṣayas tathā // SamUpad_I,12.10 //
analyzed: sattva sthaḥ tadvat evā iha dṛśeḥ sa viṣayaḥ tathā

original: pratiṣiddhedamaṃśo jñaḥ kham ivaikaraso 'dvayaḥ /
analyzed: pratiṣiddha idam aṃśaḥ jñaḥ kham iva eka rasaḥ dvayaḥ

original: nityamuktas tathā śuddhaḥ so 'haṃ brahmāsmi kevalaḥ // SamUpad_I,12.11 //
analyzed: nitya muktaḥ tathā śuddhaḥ saḥ ham brahma asmi kevalaḥ

original: vijñātur naiva vijñātā paro 'nyaḥ saṃbhavaty ataḥ /
analyzed: vijñātuḥ na eva vijñātā paraḥ nyaḥ saṃbhavati atas

original: vijñātāhaṃ paro muktaḥ sarvabhūteṣu sarvadā // SamUpad_I,12.12 //
analyzed: vijñātā aham paraḥ muktaḥ sarva bhūteṣu sarvadā

original: yo vedāluptadṛṣṭitvam ātmano 'kartṛtāṃ tathā /
analyzed: yaḥ veda alupta dṛṣṭi tvam ātmanaḥ kartṛtām tathā

original: brahmavittvaṃ tathā muktvā sa ātmajño na cetaraḥ // SamUpad_I,12.13 //
analyzed: brahma vid tvam tathā muktvā saḥ ātma jñaḥ na ca itaraḥ

original: jñātaivāham avijñeyaḥ śuddho muktaḥ sadety api /
analyzed: jñātā eva aham avijñeyaḥ śuddhaḥ muktaḥ sadā iti api

original: vivekī pratyayo buddher dṛśyatvān nāśavattvataḥ // SamUpad_I,12.14 //
analyzed: vivekī pratyayaḥ buddheḥ dṛśya tvāt nāśavat tvataḥ

original: aluptā tv ātmano dṛṣṭir notpādyā kārakair yataḥ /
analyzed: a luptā tu ātmanaḥ dṛṣṭiḥ na utpādyā kārakaiḥ yatas

original: dṛśyayā cānyayā dṛṣṭyā janyatāsyāḥ prakalpitā // SamUpad_I,12.15 //
analyzed: dṛśyayā ca anyayā dṛṣṭyā janya tā asyāḥ prakalpitā

original: dehātmabuddhyapekṣatvād ātmanaḥ kartṛtā mṛṣā /
analyzed: deha ātma buddhi apekṣa tvāt ātmanaḥ kartṛ tā mṛṣā

original: naiva kiṃcit karomīti satyā buddhiḥ pramāṇajā // SamUpad_I,12.16 //
analyzed: na eva kiṃcid karomi iti satyā buddhiḥ pramāṇa jā

original: kartṛtvaṃ kārakāpekṣam akartṛtvaṃ svabhāvataḥ /
analyzed: kartṛ tvam kāraka apekṣam akartṛ tvam svabhāvataḥ

original: kartā bhokteti vijñānaṃ mṛṣaiveti suniścitam // SamUpad_I,12.17 //
analyzed: kartā bhoktā iti vijñānam mṛṣā eva iti su niścitam

original: evaṃ śāstrānumānābhyāṃ svarūpe 'vagate sati /
analyzed: evam śāstra anumānābhyām sva rūpe vagate sati

original: niyojyo 'ham iti hy eṣā satyā buddhiḥ kathaṃ bhavet // SamUpad_I,12.18 //
analyzed: niyojyaḥ ham iti hi eṣā satyā buddhiḥ katham bhavet

original: yathā sarvāntaraṃ vyoma vyomno 'py abhyantaro hy aham /
analyzed: yathā sarva antaram vyoma vyomnaḥ pi abhyantaraḥ hi aham

original: nirvikāro 'calaḥ śuddho 'jaro muktaḥ sadādvayaḥ // SamUpad_I,12.19 //
analyzed: calaḥ śuddhaḥ muktaḥ sadā advayaḥ

original: iti prakāśasthaprakaraṇam // SamUpad_I,12 //
analyzed: iti prakāśa stha prakaraṇam

original: acakṣuṣṭvān na dṛṣṭir me tathāśrotrasya kā śrutiḥ /
analyzed: a cakṣuṣṭvāt na dṛṣṭiḥ me tathā a śrotrasya kā śrutiḥ

original: avāktvān na tu vaktiḥ syād amanastvān matiḥ kutaḥ // SamUpad_I,13.1 //
analyzed: avāk tvāt na tu vaktiḥ syāt amanaḥ tvāt matiḥ kutas

original: aprāṇasya na karmāsti buddhyabhāve na veditā /
analyzed: aprāṇasya na karma asti buddhi abhāve na veditā

original: vidyāvidye tato na staś cinmātrajyotiṣo mama // SamUpad_I,13.2 //
analyzed: vidyā avidye tatas na staḥ cit mātra jyotiṣaḥ mama

original: nityamuktasya śuddhasya kūṭasthasyāvicālinaḥ /
analyzed: nitya muktasya śuddhasya kūṭasthasya avicālinaḥ

original: amṛtasyākṣarasyaivam aśarīrasya sarvadā // SamUpad_I,13.3 //
analyzed: amṛtasya akṣarasya evam aśarīrasya sarvadā

original: jighatsā vā pipāsā vā śokamohau jarāmṛtī /
analyzed: jighatsā vā pipāsā vā śoka mohau jarā mṛtī

original: na vidyante 'śarīratvād vyomavad vyāpino mama // SamUpad_I,13.4 //
analyzed: na vidyante śarīra tvāt vyoma vat vyāpinaḥ mama

original: asparśatvān na me spṛṣṭir nājihvatvād rasajñatā /
analyzed: asparśa tvāt na me spṛṣṭiḥ na ajihva tvāt rasajña tā

original: nityavijñānarūpasya jñānājñāne na me sadā // SamUpad_I,13.5 //
analyzed: nitya vijñāna rūpasya jñāna ajñāne na me sadā

original: yā tu syān mānasī vṛttiś cākṣuṣkā rūparañjanā /
analyzed: yā tu syāt mānasī vṛttiḥ cākṣuṣkā rūpa rañjanā

original: nityam evātmano dṛṣṭyā nityayā dṛśyate hi sā // SamUpad_I,13.6 //
analyzed: nityam eva ātmanaḥ dṛṣṭyā nityayā dṛśyate hi sā

original: tathānyendriyayuktā yā vṛttayo viṣayāñjanāḥ /
analyzed: tathā anya indriya yuktāḥ yāḥ vṛttayaḥ viṣaya añjanāḥ

original: smṛtī rāgādirūpa ca kevalāntar manasy api // SamUpad_I,13.7 //
analyzed: smṛtiḥ ca kevalā antar manasi api

original: mānasyas tadvad anyasya dṛśyante svapnavṛttayaḥ /
analyzed: mānasyaḥ tadvat anyasya dṛśyante svapna vṛttayaḥ

original: draṣṭur dṛṣṭis tato nityā śuddhānantā ca kevalā // SamUpad_I,13.8 //
analyzed: draṣṭuḥ dṛṣṭiḥ tatas nityā śuddhā anantā ca kevalā

original: anityā sāviśuddheti gṛhyate 'trāvivekataḥ /
analyzed: anityā sā a viśuddhā iti gṛhyate

original: sukhī duḥkhī tathā cāhaṃ dṛśyayopādhibhūtayā // SamUpad_I,13.9 //
analyzed: sukhī duḥkhī tathā ca aham dṛśyayā upādhi bhūtayā

original: mūḍhayā mūḍha ity evaṃ śuddhayā śuddha ity api /
analyzed: mūḍhayā mūḍhaḥ iti evam śuddhayā śuddhaḥ iti api

original: manyate sarvaloko 'yaṃ yena saṃsāram ṛcchati // SamUpad_I,13.10 //
analyzed: manyate sarva lokaḥ yam yena saṃsāram ṛcchati

original: acakṣuṣṭvādiśāstroktaṃ sabāhyābhyantaraṃ hy ajam /
nityamuktam ihātmānaṃ mumukṣuś cet sadā smaret // SamUpad_I,13.11 //
analyzed: nitya muktam iha ātmānam mumukṣuḥ ced sadā smaret

original: acakṣuṣṭvādiśāstrāc ca nendriyāṇi sadā mama /
analyzed: a cakṣuḥ tva ādi śāstrāt ca na indriyāṇi sadā mama

original: aprāṇo hy amanāḥ śubhra iti cātharvaṇe vacaḥ // SamUpad_I,13.12 //
analyzed: a prāṇaḥ hi a manāḥ śubhraḥ iti ca ātharvaṇe vacaḥ

original: śabdādīnām abhāvaś ca śrūyate mama kāṭhake /
analyzed: śabda ādīnām abhāvaḥ ca śrūyate mama kāṭhake

original: aprāṇo hy amanā yasmād avikārī sadā hy aham // SamUpad_I,13.13 //
analyzed: a prāṇaḥ hi a manāḥ yasmāt a vikārī sadā hi aham

original: vikṣepo nāsti tasmān me na samādhis tato mama /
analyzed: vikṣepaḥ nā asti tasmāt me na samādhiḥ tatas mama

original: vikṣepo vā samādhir vā manasaḥ syād vikāriṇaḥ // SamUpad_I,13.14 //
analyzed: vikṣepaḥ vā samādhiḥ vā manasaḥ syāt vikāriṇaḥ

original: amanaskasya śuddhasya kathaṃ tat syād dvayaṃ mama /
analyzed: amanaskasya śuddhasya katham tat syāt dvayam mama

original: amanastvāvikāritve videhavyāpino mama // SamUpad_I,13.15 //
analyzed: amanaḥ tva avikāri tve videha vyāpinaḥ mama

original: ity etad yāvad ajñānaṃ tāvat kāryaṃ mamābhavat /
analyzed: iti etat yāvat ajñānam tāvat kāryam mama abhavat

original: nityamuktasya śuddhasya buddhasya ca sadā mama // SamUpad_I,13.16 //
analyzed: nitya muktasya śuddhasya buddhasya ca sadā mama

original: samādhir vāsamādhir vā kāryaṃ vānyat kuto bhavet /
analyzed: samādhiḥ vā asamādhiḥ vā kāryam vā anyat kutas bhavet

original: maṃ hi dhyātvā ca buddhvā ca manyante kṛtakṛtyatām // SamUpad_I,13.17 //
analyzed: mam hi dhyātvā ca buddhvā ca manyante kṛtakṛtya tām

original: ahaṃ brahmāsmi sarvo 'smi śuddho buddho 'sitaḥ sadā /
analyzed: aham brahmā asmi sarvaḥ smi śuddhaḥ buddhaḥ sitaḥ sadā

original: ajaḥ sarvaga evāham ajaraś cāmṛto 'kṣayaḥ // SamUpad_I,13.18 //
analyzed: ajaḥ sarvagaḥ eva aham ajaraḥ ca amṛtaḥ kṣayaḥ

original: madanyaḥ sarvabhūteṣu boddhā kaścin na vidyate /
analyzed: mad anyaḥ sarva bhūteṣu boddhā kaścid na vidyate

original: karmādhyakṣaś ca sākṣī ca cetā nityo 'guṇo 'dvayaḥ // SamUpad_I,13.19 //
analyzed: karma adhyakṣaḥ ca sākṣī ca cetāḥ nityaḥ guṇaḥ dvayaḥ

original: na sac cāhaṃ na cāsac ca nobhayaṃ kevalaḥ śivaḥ /
analyzed: na sat ca aham na ca asat ca na ubhayam kevalaḥ śivaḥ

original: na me saṃdhyā na rātrir vā nāhar vā sarvadā dṛśeḥ // SamUpad_I,13.20 //
analyzed: na me saṃdhyā na rātriḥ vā na ahar vā sarvadā dṛśeḥ

original: sarvamūrtiviyuktaṃ yad yathā khaṃ sūkṣmam advayam /
analyzed: sarva mūrti viyuktam yat yathā kham sūkṣmam advayam

original: tenāpy asmi vinābhūtaṃ brahmaivāhaṃ tathādvayam // SamUpad_I,13.21 //
analyzed: tena api asmi vinābhūtam brahmā eva aham tathā advayam

original: mamātmāsya ta ātmeti bhedo vyomno yathā bhavet /
analyzed: mama ātmā asya te ātmā iti bhedaḥ vyomnaḥ yathā bhavet

original: ekasya suṣibhedena tathā mama vikalpitaḥ // SamUpad_I,13.22 //
analyzed: ekasya suṣi bhedena tathā mama vikalpitaḥ

original: bhedo 'bhedas tathā caiko nānā ceti vikalpitam /
analyzed: bhedaḥ bhedaḥ tathā ca ekaḥ nānā ca iti vikalpitam

original: jñeyaṃ jñātā gatir gantā mayy ekasmin kuto bhavet // SamUpad_I,13.23 //
analyzed: jñeyam jñātā gatiḥ gantā mayi ekasmin kutas bhavet

original: na me heyaṃ na cādeyam avikārī yato hy aham /
analyzed: na me heyam na ca adeyam avikārī yatas hi aham

original: sadā muktas tathā śuddhaḥ sadā buddho 'guṇo 'dvayaḥ // SamUpad_I,13.24 //
analyzed: sadā muktaḥ tathā śuddhaḥ sadā buddhaḥ guṇaḥ dvayaḥ

original: ity evaṃ sarvadātmānaṃ vidyāt sarvaṃ samāhitaḥ /
analyzed: iti evam sarvadā ātmānam vidyāt sarvam samāhitaḥ

original: viditvā māṃ svadehastham ṛṣir mukto dhruvo bhavet // SamUpad_I,13.25 //
analyzed: viditvā mām sva deha stham ṛṣiḥ muktaḥ dhruvaḥ bhavet

original: kṛtakṛtyaś ca siddhaś ca yogī brāhmaṇa eva ca /
analyzed: kṛtakṛtyaḥ ca siddhaḥ ca yogī brāhmaṇaḥ eva ca

original: yadaivaṃ veda tattvārtham anyathā hy ātmahā bhavet // SamUpad_I,13.26 //
analyzed: yadā evam veda tattva artham anyathā hi ātma hā bhavet

original: vedārtho niścito hy eṣa samāsena mayoditaḥ /
analyzed: veda arthaḥ niścitaḥ hi eṣa samāsena mayā uditaḥ

original: saṃnyāsibhyaḥ pravaktavyaḥ śāntebhyaḥ śiṣṭabuddhinā // SamUpad_I,13.27 //
analyzed: saṃnyāsibhyaḥ pravaktavyaḥ śāntebhyaḥ śiṣṭa buddhinā

original: ity acakṣuṣṭvaprakaraṇam // SamUpad_I,13 //
analyzed: iti a cakṣuṣṭva prakaraṇam

original: svapnasmṛtyor ghaṭāder hi rūpābhāsaḥ pradṛśyate /
analyzed: svapna smṛtyoḥ ghaṭa ādeḥ hi rūpa ābhāsaḥ pradṛśyate

original: purā nūnaṃ tadākarā dhīr dṛṣṭety anumīyate // SamUpad_I,14.1 //
analyzed: purā nūnam tad ākarā dhīḥ dṛṣṭā iti anumīyate

original: bhikṣām aṭan yathā svapne dṛṣṭo deho na sa svayam /
analyzed: bhikṣām aṭan yathā svapne dṛṣṭaḥ dehaḥ na sa svayam

original: jāgraddṛśyāt tathā dehād draṣṭṛtvād anya eva saḥ // SamUpad_I,14.2 //
analyzed: jāgrat dṛśyāt tathā dehāt draṣṭṛ tvāt anyaḥ eva saḥ

original: mūṣāsiktaṃ yathā tāmraṃ tannibhaṃ jāyate tathā /
analyzed: mūṣā siktam yathā tāmram tat nibham jāyate tathā

original: rūpādīn vyāpnuvac cittaṃ tannibhaṃ dṛśyate dhruvam // SamUpad_I,14.3 //
analyzed: rūpa ādīn vyāpnuvat cittam tad nibham dṛśyate dhruvam

original: vyañjako vā yathāloko vyaṅgyasyākāratām iyāt /
analyzed: vyañjakaḥ vā yathā ālokaḥ vyaṅgyasya ākāra tām iyāt

original: sarvārthavyañjakatvād dhīr arthākarā pradṛśyate // SamUpad_I,14.4 //
analyzed: sarva artha vyañjaka tvāt dhīḥ artha ākarā pradṛśyate

original: dhir evārthasvarūpā hi puṃsā dṛṣṭā purāpi ca /
analyzed: dhiḥ eva artha svarūpā hi puṃsā dṛṣṭā purā api ca

original: na cet svapne kathaṃ paśyet smarato vākṛtiḥ kutaḥ // SamUpad_I,14.5 //
analyzed: na ced svapne katham paśyet smarataḥ vā ākṛtiḥ kutas

original: vyañjakatvaṃ tad evāsya rūpādyākāradṛśyatā /
analyzed: vyañjaka tvam tat eva asya rūpa ādi ākāra dṛśya tā

original: draṣṭṛtvaṃ ca dṛśes tadvad vyāptiḥ syād dhiya udbhave // SamUpad_I,14.6 //
analyzed: draṣṭṛ tvam ca dṛśeḥ tadvat vyāptiḥ syāt dhiyaḥ udbhave

original: cinmātrajyotiṣā sarvaḥ sarvadeheṣu buddhayaḥ /
analyzed: cit mātra jyotiṣā sarvaḥ sarva deheṣu buddhayaḥ

original: mayā yasmāt prakāśyante sarvasyātmā tato hy aham // SamUpad_I,14.7 //
analyzed: mayā yasmāt prakāśyante sarvasya ātmā tatas hi aham

original: karaṇaṃ karma kartā ca kriyā svapne phalaṃ ca dhīḥ /
analyzed: karaṇam karma kartā ca kriyā svapne phalam ca dhīḥ

original: jāgraty evaṃ yato dṛṣṭā draṣṭā tasmāt tato 'nyathā // SamUpad_I,14.8 //
analyzed: jāgratī evam yatas dṛṣṭā draṣṭā tasmāt tatas nyathā

original: buddhyādīnām anātmatvaṃ heyopādeyarūpataḥ /
analyzed: buddhi ādīnām anātma tvam heya upādeya rūpataḥ

original: hānopādānakartātmā na tyājyo na ca gṛhyate // SamUpad_I,14.9 //
analyzed: hāna upādāna kartā ātmā na tyājyaḥ na ca gṛhyate

original: sabāhyābhyantare śuddhe prajñānaikarase ghane /
analyzed: sa bāhya abhyantare śuddhe prajñāna eka rase ghane

original: bāhyam ābhyantaraṃ cānyat kathaṃ heyaṃ prakalpyate // SamUpad_I,14.10 //
analyzed: bāhyam ābhyantaram ca anyat katham heyam prakalpyate

original: ya ātmā neti netīti parāpohena śeṣitaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ ātmā na iti na iti iti para apohena śeṣitaḥ

original: sa ced brahmavidātmeṣṭo yatetātaḥ paraṃ katham // SamUpad_I,14.11 //
analyzed: sa ced brahma vid ātma iṣṭaḥ yateta atas param katham

original: aśanāyādyatikrāntaṃ brahmaivāsmi nirantaram /
analyzed: aśanāyā ādi atikrāntam brahmā eva asmi nirantaram

original: kāryavān syāṃ kathaṃ cāhaṃ vimṛśed evam añjasā // SamUpad_I,14.12 //
analyzed: kāryavān syām katham ca aham vimṛśet evam añjasā

original: pāragas tu yathā nadyās tatsthaḥ paraṃ yiyāsati /
analyzed: pāragaḥ tu yathā nadyāḥ tad sthaḥ param yiyāsati

original: ātmajñaś cet tathā kāryaṃ kartum anyad ihecchati // SamUpad_I,14.13 //
analyzed: ātma jñaḥ ced tathā kāryam kartum anyat iha icchati

original: ātmajñasyāpi yasya syād dhānopādānatā yadi /
analyzed: ātma jñasya api yasya syāt dhāna upādāna tā yadi

original: na mokṣārhaḥ sa vijñeyo vānto 'sau brahmaṇā dhruvam // SamUpad_I,14.14 //
analyzed: na mokṣa arhaḥ sa vijñeyaḥ brahmaṇā dhruvam

original: sādityaṃ hi jagat prāṇas tasmān nāhar niśaiva vā /
analyzed: sa ādityam hi jagat prāṇaḥ tasmāt na ahar niśā eva vā

original: prāṇajñasyāpi na syātāṃ kuto brahmavido 'dvaye // SamUpad_I,14.15 //
analyzed: prāṇa jñasya api na syātām kutas brahma vidaḥ dvaye

original: na smaraty ātmano hy ātmā vismared vāpy aluptacit /
analyzed: na smarati ātmanaḥ hi ātmā vismaret vā api a lupta cit

original: mano 'pi smaratīty etaj jñānam ajñānahetujam // SamUpad_I,14.16 //
analyzed: manaḥ pi smarati iti etat jñānam ajñāna hetu jam

original: jñātur jñeyaḥ paro hy ātmā so 'vidyākalpitaḥ smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: jñātuḥ jñeyaḥ paraḥ hi ātmā saḥ vidyā kalpitaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: apoḍhe vidyayā tasmin rajjvāṃ sarpa ivādvayaḥ // SamUpad_I,14.17 //
analyzed: apoḍhe vidyayā tasmin rajjvām sarpaḥ iva advayaḥ

original: kartṛkarmaphalābhāvāt sabāhyābhyantaraṃ hy ajam /
analyzed: kartṛ karma phala abhāvāt sa bāhya abhyantaram hi ajam

original: mamāhaṃ ceti yo bhāvas tasmin kasya kuto bhavet // SamUpad_I,14.18 //
analyzed: mama aham ca iti yaḥ bhāvaḥ tasmin kasya kutas bhavet

original: ātmā hy ātmīya ity eṣa bhāvo 'vidyāprakalpitaḥ /
analyzed: ātmā hi ātmīyaḥ iti eṣa bhāvaḥ vidyā prakalpitaḥ

original: ātmaikatve hy asau nāsti bījabhāve kutaḥ phalam // SamUpad_I,14.19 //
analyzed: ātma eka tve hi asau nā asti bīja bhāve kutas phalam

original: draṣṭṛ srotṛ tathā mantṛ vijñātṛ eva tad akṣaram /
analyzed: draṣṭṛ srotṛ tathā mantṛ vijñātṛ eva tat akṣaram

original: draṣṭrādyanyan na tad yasmāt tasmād draṣṭāham akṣaram // SamUpad_I,14.20 //
analyzed: draṣṭṛ ādi anyat na tat yasmāt tasmāt draṣṭā aham akṣaram

original: sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ caiva draṣṭṛtvādikriyāyutam /
analyzed: sthāvaram jaṅgamam ca eva draṣṭṛ tva ādi kriyā yutam

original: sarvam akṣaram evātaḥ sarvasyātmākṣaraṃ tv aham // SamUpad_I,14.21 //
analyzed: sarvam akṣaram eva atas sarvasya ātmā akṣaram tu aham

original: akāryaśeṣam ātmānam akriyātmakriyāphalam /
analyzed: akārya śeṣam ātmānam akriya ātma kriyā phalam

original: nirmamaṃ nirahaṃkāraṃ yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati // SamUpad_I,14.22 //
analyzed: nirmamam nirahaṃkāram yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati

original: mamāhaṃkārayatnecchāḥ śūnyā eva svabhāvataḥ /
analyzed: mama ahaṃkāra yatna icchāḥ śūnyāḥ eva svabhāvataḥ

original: ātmanīti yadi jñātam ādhvaṃ svasthāḥ kim īhitaiḥ // SamUpad_I,14.23 //
analyzed: ātmani iti yadi jñātam ādhvam svasthāḥ kim īhitaiḥ

original: yo 'haṃkartāram ātmānaṃ tathā vettāram eva yaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ haṃkartāram ātmānam tathā vettāram eva yaḥ

original: vetty anātmajña evāsau yo 'nyathājñaḥ sa ātmavit // SamUpad_I,14.24 //
analyzed: vetti anātma jñaḥ eva asau yaḥ nyathā jñaḥ saḥ ātma vid

original: yathānyatve 'pi tādātmyaṃ dehādiṣv ātmano matam /
analyzed: yathā anyatve pi tādātmyam deha ādiṣu ātmanaḥ matam

original: tathākartur avijñānāt phalakarmātmatātmanaḥ // SamUpad_I,14.25 //
analyzed: tathā akartuḥ avijñānāt phala karma ātma tā ātmanaḥ

original: dṛṣṭiḥ śrutir matir jñātiḥ svapne dṛṣṭā janaiḥ sadā /
analyzed: dṛṣṭiḥ śrutiḥ matiḥ jñātiḥ svapne dṛṣṭā janaiḥ sadā

original: tāsām ātmasvarūpatvād ataḥ pratyakṣatātmanaḥ // SamUpad_I,14.26 //
analyzed: tāsām ātma sva rūpa tvāt atas pratyakṣa tā ātmanaḥ

original: paralokabhayaṃ yasya nāsti mṛtyubhayaṃ tathā /
analyzed: para loka bhayam yasya nā asti mṛtyu bhayam tathā

original: tasyātmajñasya śocyaḥ syuḥ sabrahmendrā apīśvarāḥ // SamUpad_I,14.27 //
analyzed: tasya ātma jñasya śocyaḥ syuḥ sa brahma indrāḥ api īśvarāḥ

original: īśvaratvena kiṃ tasya brahmendratvena vā punaḥ /
analyzed: īśvara tvena kim tasya brahma indra tvena vā punar

original: tṛṣṇā cet sarvataś chinnā sarvadainyodbhavāśubhā // SamUpad_I,14.28 //
analyzed: tṛṣṇā ced sarvatas chinnā sarva dainya udbhavā aśubhā

original: aham ity ātmadhīr yā ca mamety ātmīyadhīr api /
analyzed: aham iti ātma dhīḥ yā ca mama iti ātmīya dhīḥ api

original: arthaśūnye yadā yasya sa ātmajño bhavet tadā // SamUpad_I,14.29 //
analyzed: artha śūnye yadā yasya saḥ ātma jñaḥ bhavet tadā

original: buddhyādau saty upādhau ca tathāsaty aviśeṣatā /
analyzed: buddhi ādau sati upādhau ca tathā asati aviśeṣa tā

original: yasya ced ātmano jñātā tasya kāryaṃ kathaṃ bhavet // SamUpad_I,14.30 //
analyzed: yasya ced ātmanaḥ jñātā tasya kāryam katham bhavet

original: prasanne vimale vyomni prajñānaikarase 'dvaye /
analyzed: prasanne vimale vyomni prajñāna eka rase dvaye

original: utpannātmadhiyo brūta kim anyat kāryam iṣyate // SamUpad_I,14.31 //
analyzed: utpanna ātma dhiyaḥ brūta kim anyat kāryam iṣyate

original: ātmānaṃ sarvabhūtastham amitraṃ cātmano 'pi yaḥ /
analyzed: ātmānam sarva bhūta stham amitram ca ātmanaḥ pi yaḥ

original: paśyann icchaty asau nūnaṃ śītīkartuṃ vibhāvasum // SamUpad_I,14.32 //
analyzed: paśyan icchati asau nūnam śītīkartum vibhāvasum

original: prajñāprāṇānukāry ātmā chāyevākṣādigocaraḥ /
analyzed: prajñā prāṇa anukārī ātmā chāyā iva akṣa ādi gocaraḥ

original: dhyāyatīveti cokto hi śuddho muktaḥ svato hi saḥ // SamUpad_I,14.33 //
analyzed: dhyāyati iva iti ca uktaḥ hi śuddhaḥ muktaḥ svatas hi saḥ

original: aprāṇasyāmanaskasya tathāsaṃsargiṇo dṛśeḥ /
analyzed: a prāṇasya a manaskasya tathā a saṃsargiṇaḥ dṛśeḥ

original: vyomavad vyāpino hy asya kathaṃ kāryaṃ bhaven mama // SamUpad_I,14.34 //
analyzed: vyoma vat vyāpinaḥ hi asya katham kāryam bhavet mama

original: asamādhiṃ na paśyāmi nirvikārasya sarvadā /
analyzed: asamādhim na paśyāmi nirvikārasya sarvadā

original: brahmaṇo me viśuddhasya śodhyaṃ cānyad vipāpmanaḥ // SamUpad_I,14.35 //
analyzed: brahmaṇaḥ me viśuddhasya śodhyam ca anyat vipāpmanaḥ

original: gantavyaṃ ca tathaivāhaṃ sarvagasyācalasya ca /
analyzed: gantavyam ca tathā eva aham sarvagasya acalasya ca

original: nordhvaṃ nādhas tiro vāpi niṣkalasyāguṇatvataḥ // SamUpad_I,14.36 //
analyzed: na ūrdhvam na adhas tiras vā api niṣkalasya aguṇa tvataḥ

original: cinmātrajyotiṣo nityaṃ tamas tasmin na vidyate /
analyzed: cit mātra jyotiṣaḥ nityam tamaḥ tasmin na vidyate

original: kathaṃ kāryaṃ mamaivādya nityamuktasya śiṣyate // SamUpad_I,14.37 //
analyzed: katham kāryam mama eva adya nitya muktasya śiṣyate

original: amanaskasya kā cintā kriyā vānindriyasya kā /
analyzed: amanaskasya kā cintā kriyā vā anindriyasya kā

original: aprāṇo hy amanāḥ śubhra iti satyaṃ śruter vacaḥ // SamUpad_I,14.38 //
analyzed: a prāṇaḥ hi a manāḥ śubhraḥ iti satyam śruteḥ vacaḥ

original: akālatvād adeśatvād adiktvād animittataḥ /
analyzed: a kāla tvāt a deśa tvāt a diś tvāt a nimittataḥ

original: ātmano naiva kālāder apekṣā dhyāyataḥ sadā // SamUpad_I,14.39 //
analyzed: ātmanaḥ nā eva kāla ādeḥ apekṣā dhyāyataḥ sadā

original: yasmin devāś ca vedāś ca pavitraṃ kṛtsnam ekatām /
analyzed: yasmin devāḥ ca vedāḥ ca pavitram kṛtsnam eka tām

original: vrajet tan mānasaṃ tīrthaṃ yasmin snātvāmṛto bhavet // SamUpad_I,14.40 //
analyzed: vrajet tat mānasam tīrtham yasmin snātvā amṛtaḥ bhavet

original: na cāsti śabdādir ananyavedanaḥ paraspareṇāpi na caiva dṛśyate /
analyzed: na ca asti śabda ādiḥ ananya vedanaḥ paraspareṇa api na ca eva dṛśyate

original: pareṇa dṛśyās tu yathā rasādayas tathaiva dṛśyatvata eva daihikāḥ // SamUpad_I,14.41 //
analyzed: pareṇa dṛśyāḥ tu yathā rasa ādayaḥ tathā eva dṛśya tvataḥ eva daihikāḥ

original: ahaṃ mamety eṣaṇayatnavikriyāḥ sukhādayas tadvad iha pradṛśyataḥ /
analyzed: aham mama iti eṣaṇa yatna vikriyāḥ sukha ādayaḥ tadvat iha pradṛśyataḥ

original: dṛśyatvayogāc ca paraspareṇa te na dṛśyatāṃ yānti tataḥ paro bhavet // SamUpad_I,14.42 //
analyzed: dṛśya tva yogāt ca paraspareṇa te na dṛśya tām yānti tatas paraḥ bhavet

original: ahaṃkriyādyā hi samastavikriyā sakartṛkā karmaphalena saṃhitā /
analyzed: ahaṃkriyā ādyā hi samasta vikriyā sa kartṛkā karma phalena saṃhitā

original: citisvarūpeṇa samantato 'rkavat prakāśyamānāsitatātmano hy ataḥ // SamUpad_I,14.43 //
analyzed: citi sva rūpeṇa samantataḥ rka vat prakāśyamāna asita tā ātmanaḥ hi atas

original: dṛśisvarūpeṇa hi sarvadehināṃ viyad yathā vyāpya manāṃsy avasthitaḥ /
analyzed: dṛśi sva rūpeṇa hi sarva dehinām viyat yathā vyāpya manāṃsi avasthitaḥ

original: ato na tasmād aparo 'sti veditā paro 'pi tasmād ata eka īśvaraḥ // SamUpad_I,14.44 //
analyzed: atas na tasmāt aparaḥ sti veditā paraḥ tasmāt atas ekaḥ īśvaraḥ

original: śarīrabuddhyor yadi cānyadṛśyatā nirātmavādāḥ sunirākṛṭā mayā /
analyzed: śarīra buddhyoḥ yadi ca anya dṛśya tā nirātma vādāḥ su nirākṛṭāḥ mayā

original: paraś ca siddho hy aviśuddhikarmataḥ sunirmalaḥ sarvagato 'sito 'dvayaḥ // SamUpad_I,14.45 //
analyzed: paraḥ ca siddhaḥ hi aviśuddhi karmataḥ su nirmalaḥ sarva gataḥ sitaḥ

original: ghaṭādirūpaṃ yadi te na gṛhyate manaḥ pravṛttaṃ bahudhā svavṛttibhiḥ /
analyzed: ghaṭa ādi rūpam yadi te na gṛhyate manaḥ pravṛttam bahudhā sva vṛttibhiḥ

original: aśuddhyacidrūpavikāradoṣatā mater yathā vārayituṃ na pāryate // SamUpad_I,14.46 //
analyzed: aśuddhi acit rūpa vikāra doṣa tā mateḥ yathā vārayitum na pāryate

original: yathā viśuddhaṃ gaganaṃ nirantaraṃ na sajjate nāpi ca lipyate tathā /
analyzed: yathā viśuddham gaganam nirantaram na sajjate na api ca lipyate tathā

original: samastabhūteṣu sadaiva teṣv ayaṃ samaḥ sadātmā hy ajaro 'maro 'bhayaḥ // SamUpad_I,14.47 //
analyzed: samasta bhūteṣu sadā eva teṣu ayam samaḥ sat ātmā hi ajaraḥ maraḥ bhayaḥ

original: amūrtamūrtāni ca karmavāsanā dṛśisvarūpasya bahiḥ prakalpitāḥ /
analyzed: amūrta mūrtāni ca karma vāsanāḥ dṛśi sva rūpasya bahis prakalpitāḥ

original: avidyayā hy ātmani mūḍhadṛṣṭibhir apohya netīty avaśeṣito dṛśiḥ // SamUpad_I,14.48 //
analyzed: avidyayā hi ātmani mūḍha dṛṣṭibhiḥ apohya na iti iti avaśeṣitaḥ dṛśiḥ

original: prabodharūpaṃ manaso 'rthayogajaṃ smṛtau ca suptasya ca dṛśyate 'rthavat /
analyzed: prabodha rūpam manasaḥ rtha yoga jam smṛtau ca suptasya ca dṛśyate rthavat

original: tathaiva dehapratimānataḥ pṛthag dṛśeḥ śarīraṃ ca manaś ca dṛśyataḥ // SamUpad_I,14.49 //
analyzed: tathā eva deha pratimānataḥ pṛthak dṛśeḥ śarīram ca manaḥ ca dṛśyataḥ

original: svabhāvaśuddhe gagane ghanādike male 'payāte sati cāviśeṣatā /
analyzed: svabhāva śuddhe gagane ghana ādike male sati ca aviśeṣa tā

original: yathā ca tadvac chrutivāritadvaye sadāviśeṣo gaganopame dṛśau // SamUpad_I,14.50 //
analyzed: yathā ca tadvat śruti vārita dvaye sadā aviśeṣaḥ gagana upame dṛśau

original: iti svapnasmṛtiprakaraṇam // SamUpad_I,14 //
analyzed: iti svapna smṛti prakaraṇam

original: nānyad anyad bhaved yasmān nānyat kiṃcid vicintayet /
analyzed: na anyat anyat bhavet yasmāt na anyat kiṃcid vicintayet

original: anyasyānyatvabhāve hi nāśas tasya dhruvo bhavet // SamUpad_I,15.1 //
analyzed: anyasya anya tva bhāve hi nāśaḥ tasya dhruvaḥ bhavet

original: smarato dṛśyate dṛṣṭaṃ paṭe citram ivārpitam /
analyzed: smarataḥ dṛśyate dṛṣṭam paṭe citram iva arpitam

original: yatra yena ca tau jñeyau sattvakṣetrajñasaṃjñakau // SamUpad_I,15.2 //
analyzed: yatra yena ca tau jñeyau sattva kṣetrajña saṃjñakau

original: phalāntaṃ cānubhūtaṃ yad yuktaṃ kartrādikārakaiḥ /
analyzed: phala antam ca anubhūtam yat yuktam kartṛ ādi kārakaiḥ

original: smaryamāṇaṃ hi karmasthaṃ pūrvaṃ karmaiva tat tataḥ // SamUpad_I,15.3 //
analyzed: smaryamāṇam hi karma stham pūrvam karma eva tat tatas

original: draṣṭuś cānyad bhaved dṛśyaṃ dṛśyatvād ghaṭavat sadā /
analyzed: draṣṭuḥ ca anyat bhavet dṛśyam dṛśya tvāt ghaṭa vat sadā

original: dṛśyād draṣṭāsajātīyo na dhīvat sākṣitānyathā // SamUpad_I,15.4 //
analyzed: dṛśyāt draṣṭā a sajātīyaḥ na dhī vat sākṣi tā anyathā

original: svātmabuddhim apekṣyāsau vidhīnāṃ syāt prayojakaḥ /
analyzed: sva ātma buddhim apekṣya asau vidhīnām syāt prayojakaḥ

original: jātyādiḥ śavavat tena tadvan nānātmatānyathā // SamUpad_I,15.5 //
analyzed: jāti ādiḥ śava vat tena tadvat nānā ātma tā anyathā

original: na priyāpriya ity ukter nādehatvaṃ kriyāphalam /
analyzed: na priya apriye iti ukteḥ na adeha tvam kriyā phalam

original: dehayogaḥ kriyāhetus tasmād vidvān kriyās tyajet // SamUpad_I,15.6 //
analyzed: deha yogaḥ kriyā hetuḥ tasmāt vidvān kriyāḥ tyajet

original: karmasv ātmā svatantraś cen nivṛttau ca tatheṣyatām /
analyzed: karmasu ātmā svatantraḥ ced nivṛttau ca tathā iṣyatām

original: adehatve phale 'kārye jñāte kuryāt kathaṃ kriyāḥ // SamUpad_I,15.7 //
analyzed: adeha tve phale kārye jñāte kuryāt katham kriyāḥ

original: jātyādin saṃparityajya nimittaṃ karmaṇāṃ budhaḥ /
analyzed: jātyādin saṃparityajya nimittam karmaṇām budhaḥ

original: karmahetuviruddhaṃ yat svarūpaṃ śāstrataḥ smaret // SamUpad_I,15.8 //
analyzed: karma hetu viruddham yat svarūpam śāstrataḥ smaret

original: ātmaikaḥ sarvabhūteṣu tāni tasmiṃś ca khe yathā /
analyzed: ātmā ekaḥ sarva bhūteṣu tāni tasmin ca khe yathā

original: paryagād vyomavat sarvaṃ śukraṃ dīptimad iṣyate // SamUpad_I,15.9 //
analyzed: paryagāt vyomavat sarvam śukram dīptimat iṣyate

original: vraṇasnāyvor abhāvena sthūlaṃ dehaṃ nivārayet /
analyzed: vraṇa snāyvoḥ abhāvena sthūlam deham nivārayet

original: śuddhāpāpatayā lepaṃ liṅgaṃ cākāyam ity uta // SamUpad_I,15.10 //
analyzed: śuddha a pāpa tayā lepam liṅgam ca a kāyam iti uta

original: vāsudevo yathāśvatthe svadehe cābravit samam /
analyzed: vāsudevaḥ yathā aśvatthe sva dehe ca abravit samam

original: tadvad vetti ya ātmānaṃ samaṃ sa brahmavittamaḥ // SamUpad_I,15.11 //
analyzed: tadvat vetti yaḥ ātmānam samam sa brahma vittamaḥ

original: yathā hy anyaśarīreṣu mamāhantā na ceṣyate /
analyzed: yathā hi anya śarīreṣu mama ahantā na ca iṣyate

original: asmiṃś cāpi tathā dehe dhīsākṣitvāviśeṣataḥ // SamUpad_I,15.12 //
analyzed: asmin ca api tathā dehe dhī sākṣi tva aviśeṣataḥ

original: rūpasaṃskāratulyādhi rāgadveṣau bhayaṃ ca yat /
analyzed: rūpa saṃskāra tulya adhi rāga dveṣau bhayam ca yat

original: gṛhyate dhīśrayaṃ tasmāj jñātā śuddho 'bhayaḥ sadā // SamUpad_I,15.13 //
analyzed: gṛhyate dhī śrayam tasmāt jñātā śuddhaḥ bhayaḥ sadā

original: yanmanās tanmayo 'nyatve nātmatvāptau kriyātmani /
analyzed: yanmanāḥ tanmayaḥ nyatve na ātma tva āptau kriyā ātmani

original: ātmatve cānapekṣatvāt sāpekṣaṃ hi na tat svayam // SamUpad_I,15.14 //
analyzed: ātma tve ca anapekṣa tvāt sāpekṣam hi na tat svayam

original: kham ivaikarasā jñaptir avibhaktājarāmalā /
analyzed: kham iva ekarasā jñaptiḥ avibhaktā ajara amalā

original: cakṣurādyupadhānāt sā viparītā vibhāvyate // SamUpad_I,15.15 //
analyzed: cakṣuḥ ādi upadhānāt sā viparītā vibhāvyate

original: dṛśyatvād aham ity eṣa nātmadharmo ghaṭādivat /
analyzed: dṛśya tvāt aham iti eṣa na ātma dharmaḥ ghaṭa ādi vat

original: tathānye pratyayā jñeyā doṣāś cātmāmalo hy ataḥ // SamUpad_I,15.16 //
analyzed: tathā anye pratyayāḥ jñeyāḥ doṣāḥ ca ātmā amalaḥ hi atas

original: sarvapratyayasākṣitvād avikārī ca sarvagaḥ /
analyzed: sarva pratyaya sākṣi tvāt avikārī ca sarva gaḥ

original: vikriyeta yadi draṣṭā buddhyādīvālpavid bhavet // SamUpad_I,15.17 //
analyzed: vikriyeta yadi draṣṭā buddhi ādi iva alpa vid bhavet

original: na dṛṣṭir lupyate draṣṭuś cakṣurāder yathaiva tu /
analyzed: na dṛṣṭiḥ lupyate draṣṭuḥ cakṣuḥ ādeḥ yathā eva tu

original: nahi draṣṭur iti hy uktaṃ tasmād draṣṭā sadaiva bhuk // SamUpad_I,15.18 //
analyzed: nahi draṣṭuḥ iti hi uktam tasmāt draṣṭā sadā eva bhuj

original: saṃghāto vāsmi bhūtānāṃ karaṇānāṃ tathaiva ca /
analyzed: saṃghātaḥ vā asmi bhūtānām karaṇānām tathā eva ca

original: vyastaṃ vānyatamo vāsmi ko āsmīti vicārayet // SamUpad_I,15.19 //
analyzed: vyastam vā anyatamaḥ vā asmi vicārayet

original: vyastaṃ nāhaṃ samastaṃ vā bhūtam indriyam eva vā /
analyzed: vyastam na aham samastam vā bhūtam indriyam eva vā

original: jñeyatvāt karaṇatvāc ca jñātānyo 'smād ghaṭādivat // SamUpad_I,15.20 //
analyzed: jñeya tvāt karaṇa tvāt ca jñātā anyaḥ smāt ghaṭa ādi vat

original: ātmāgner indhanā buddhir avidyākāmakarmabhiḥ /
analyzed: ātma agneḥ indhanā buddhiḥ avidyā kāma karmabhiḥ

original: dīpitā prajvalaty eṣa dvāraiḥ śrotrādibhiḥ sadā // SamUpad_I,15.21 //
analyzed: dīpitā prajvalati eṣa dvāraiḥ śrotra ādibhiḥ sadā

original: dakṣiṇākṣipradhāneṣu yadā buddhir viceṣṭate /
analyzed: dakṣiṇa akṣi pradhāneṣu yadā buddhiḥ viceṣṭate

original: viṣayair haviṣā dīptā ātmāgniḥ sthūlabhuk tadā // SamUpad_I,15.22 //
analyzed: viṣayaiḥ haviṣā dīptāḥ ātma agniḥ sthūlabhuj tadā

original: hūyante tu havīṃṣīti rūpādigrahaṇe smaran /
analyzed: hūyante tu havīṃṣi iti rūpa ādi grahaṇe smaran

original: arāgadveṣa ātmāgnau jāgraddoṣair na lipyate // SamUpad_I,15.23 //
analyzed: a rāga dveṣaḥ ātma agnau jāgrat doṣaiḥ na lipyate

original: mānase tu gṛhe vyaktā avidyākarmavāsanāḥ /
analyzed: mānase tu gṛhe vyaktāḥ avidyā karma vāsanāḥ

original: paśyaṃs taijasa ātmoktaḥ svayaṃjyotiḥprakāśitāḥ // SamUpad_I,15.24 //
analyzed: paśyan taijasaḥ ātmā uktaḥ svayam jyotiḥ prakāśitāḥ

original: viṣayā vāsanā vāpi codyante naiva karmabhiḥ /
analyzed: viṣayāḥ vāsanāḥ vā api codyante nā eva karmabhiḥ

original: yadā buddhau tadā jñeyaḥ prājña ātmā hy ananyadṛk // SamUpad_I,15.25 //
analyzed: yadā buddhau tadā jñeyaḥ prājñaḥ ātmā hi an anya dṛś

original: manobuddhīndriyāṇāṃ yā avasthāḥ karmacoditāḥ /
analyzed: manaḥ buddhi indriyāṇām yāḥ avasthāḥ karma coditāḥ

original: caitanyenaiva bhāsyante raviṇeva ghaṭādayaḥ // SamUpad_I,15.26 //
analyzed: caitanyena eva bhāsyante raviṇā iva ghaṭa ādayaḥ

original: tatraivaṃ sati buddhīr jña ātmabhāsāvabhāsayan /
analyzed: tatra evam sati buddhīḥ jñaḥ ātma bhāsā avabhāsayan

original: kartā tāsāṃ yadarthās tā mūḍhair evābhidhīyate // SamUpad_I,15.27 //
analyzed: kartā tāsām yad arthāḥ tāḥ mūḍhaiḥ eva abhidhīyate

original: sarvajño 'py ata eva syāt svena bhāsāvabhāsayan /
analyzed: sarvajñaḥ pi atas eva syāt svena bhāsā avabhāsayan

original: sarvaṃ sarvakriyāhetoḥ sarvakṛttvaṃ tathātmanaḥ // SamUpad_I,15.28 //
analyzed: sarvam sarva kriyā hetoḥ sarva kṛt tvam tathā ātmanaḥ

original: sopādhiś caivam ātmokto nirupākhyo 'nupādhikaḥ /
analyzed: sa upādhiḥ ca evam ātmā uktaḥ nirupākhyaḥ n upādhikaḥ

original: niṣkalo nirguṇaḥ śuddhas taṃ mano vāk ca nāpnutaḥ // SamUpad_I,15.29 //
analyzed: niṣkalaḥ nirguṇaḥ śuddhaḥ tam manaḥ vāc ca na āpnutaḥ

original: cetano 'cetano vāpi kartākartā gato 'gataḥ /
analyzed: cetano cetanaḥ vā api kartā a kartā gataḥ gataḥ

original: baddho muktas tathā caiko naikaḥ śuddho 'nyatheti vā // SamUpad_I,15.30 //
analyzed: baddhaḥ muktaḥ tathā ca ekaḥ na ekaḥ śuddhaḥ nyathā iti vā

original: aprāpyaiva nivartante vāco dhībhiḥ sahaiva tu /
analyzed: a prāpya eva nivartante vācaḥ dhībhiḥ saha eva tu

original: nirguṇatvāt kriyābhāvād viśeṣāṇāṃ hy abhāvataḥ // SamUpad_I,15.31 //
analyzed: nirguṇa tvāt kriyā bhāvāt viśeṣāṇām hi abhāvataḥ

original: vyāpakaṃ sarvato vyoma mūrtaiḥ sarvair viyojitam /
analyzed: vyāpakam sarvatas vyoma mūrtaiḥ sarvaiḥ viyojitam

original: yathā tadvad ihātmānaṃ vidyāc chuddhaṃ paraṃ padam // SamUpad_I,15.32 //
analyzed: yathā tadvat iha ātmānam vidyāt śuddham param padam

original: dṛṣṭaṃ hitvā smṛtiṃ tasmin sarvagraś ca tamas tyajet /
analyzed: dṛṣṭam hitvā smṛtim tasmin sarvagraḥ ca tamaḥ tyajet

original: sarvadṛg jyotiṣā yukto dinakṛc chārvaraṃ yathā // SamUpad_I,15.33 //
analyzed: sarva dṛś jyotiṣā yuktaḥ dinakṛt śārvaram yathā

original: rūpasmṛtyandhakārārthāḥ pratyayā yasya gocarāḥ /
analyzed: rūpa smṛti andhakāra arthāḥ pratyayāḥ yasya gocarāḥ

original: sa evātmā samo draṣṭā sarvabhūteṣu sarvagaḥ // SamUpad_I,15.34 //
analyzed: saḥ eva ātmā samaḥ draṣṭā sarva bhūteṣu sarva gaḥ

original: ātmabuddhimanaścakṣurviṣayālokasaṃgamāt /
analyzed: ātma buddhi manaḥ cakṣuḥ viṣaya āloka saṃgamāt

original: vicitro jāyate buddheḥ pratyayo 'jñānalakṣaṇaḥ // SamUpad_I,15.35 //
analyzed: vicitraḥ jāyate buddheḥ pratyayaḥ jñāna lakṣaṇaḥ

original: vivicyāsmāt svam ātmānaṃ vidyāc chuddhaṃ paraṃ padam /
analyzed: vivicya asmāt svam ātmānam vidyāt śuddham param padam

original: draṣṭāraṃ sarvabhūtasthaṃ samaṃ sarvabhayātigam // SamUpad_I,15.36 //
analyzed: draṣṭāram sarva bhūta stham samam sarva bhaya atigam

original: samastaṃ sarvagaṃ śāntaṃ vimalaṃ vyomavat sthitam /
analyzed: samastam sarvagam śāntam vimalam vyoma vat sthitam

original: niṣkalaṃ niṣkriyaṃ sarvaṃ nityaṃ dvandvair vivarjitam // SamUpad_I,15.37 //
sarvapratyayasākṣī jñaḥ kathaṃ jñeyo mayety uta /
analyzed: sarva pratyaya sākṣī jñaḥ katham jñeyaḥ mayā iti uta

original: vimṛśyaivaṃ vijānīyāj jñātaṃ brahma na veti vā // SamUpad_I,15.38 //
analyzed: vimṛśya evam vijānīyāt jñātam brahma na vā iti vā

original: adṛṣṭaṃ draṣṭr avijñātaṃ dabhram ityādiśāsanāt /
analyzed: a dṛṣṭam draṣṭṛ a vijñātam dabhram iti ādi śāsanāt

original: naiva jñeyaṃ mayānyair vā paraṃ brahma kathaṃcana // SamUpad_I,15.39 //
analyzed: nā eva jñeyam mayā anyaiḥ vā param brahma kathaṃcana

original: svarūpāvyavadhānābhyāṃ jñānālokasvabhāvataḥ /
analyzed: svarūpa avyavadhānābhyām jñāna āloka svabhāvataḥ

original: anyajñānānapekṣatvāj jñātaṃ caiva sadā mayā // SamUpad_I,15.40 //
analyzed: anya jñāna anapekṣa tvāt jñātam ca eva sadā mayā

original: nānyena jyotiṣā kāryaṃ raver ātmaprakāśane /
analyzed: na anyena jyotiṣā kāryam raveḥ ātma prakāśane

original: svabodhān nānyabodhecchā bodhasyātmaprakāśane // SamUpad_I,15.41 //
analyzed: sva bodhāt na anya bodha icchā bodhasya ātma prakāśane

original: na tasyaivānyato 'pekṣā svarūpaṃ yasya yad bhavet /
analyzed: na tasya eva anyatas upekṣā svarūpam yasya yat bhavet

original: prakāśāntaradṛśyo na prakāśo hy asti kaścana // SamUpad_I,15.42 //
analyzed: prakāśa antara dṛśyaḥ na prakāśaḥ hi asti kaścana

original: vyaktiḥ syād aprakāśasya prakāśātmasamāgamāt /
analyzed: vyaktiḥ syāt aprakāśasya prakāśa ātma samāgamāt

original: prakāśas tv arkakāryaḥ syād iti mithya vaco hy ataḥ // SamUpad_I,15.43 //
analyzed: prakāśaḥ tu arka kāryaḥ syāt iti vacaḥ hi atas

original: yato 'bhūtvā bhaved yac ca tasya tat kāryam iṣyate /
analyzed: yatas bhūtvā bhavet yat ca tasya tat kāryam iṣyate

original: svarūpatvād abhūtvā na prakāśo jāyate raveḥ // SamUpad_I,15.44 //
analyzed: sva rūpa tvāt a bhūtvā na prakāśaḥ jāyate raveḥ

original: sattāmātre prakāśasya kartādityādir iṣyate /
analyzed: sattā mātre prakāśasya kartā ityādiḥ iṣyate

original: ghaṭādivyaktito yadvat tadvad bodhātmanīṣyatām // SamUpad_I,15.45 //
analyzed: ghaṭa ādi vyaktitaḥ yadvat tadvat bodha ātmani iṣyatām

original: bilāt sarpasya niryāṇe sūryo yadvat prakāśakaḥ /
analyzed: bilāt sarpasya niryāṇe sūryaḥ yadvat prakāśakaḥ

original: prayatnena vinā tadvaj jñātātmā bodharūpataḥ // SamUpad_I,15.46 //
analyzed: prayatnena vinā tadvat jñāta ātmā bodha rūpataḥ

original: dagdhaivam uṣṇaḥ sattāyāṃ tadvad bodhātmanīṣyatām /
analyzed: uṣṇaḥ sattāyām tadvat bodha ātmani iṣyatām

original: saty eva yad upādhau tu jñāte sarpa ivotthite // SamUpad_I,15.47 //
analyzed: sati eva yat upādhau tu jñāte sarpe iva utthite

original: jñātāyatno 'pi tadvaj jñaḥ kartā bhrāmakavad bhavet /
analyzed: tadvat jñaḥ kartā bhrāmaka vat bhavet

original: svarūpeṇa svayaṃ nātmā jñeyo 'jñeyo 'thavā tataḥ // SamUpad_I,15.48 //
analyzed: sva rūpeṇa svayam na ātmā jñeyaḥ tatas

original: viditāviditābhyāṃ tad anyad eveti śāsanāt /
analyzed: vidita a viditābhyām tat anyat eva iti śāsanāt

original: bandhamokṣādayo bhāvās tadvad ātmani kalpitāḥ // SamUpad_I,15.49 //
analyzed: bandha mokṣa ādayaḥ bhāvāḥ tadvat ātmani kalpitāḥ

original: nāhorātre yathā sūrye prabhārūpāviśeṣataḥ /
analyzed: na ahar rātre yathā sūrye prabhā rūpa aviśeṣataḥ

original: bodharūpāviśeṣān na bodhābodhau tathātmani // SamUpad_I,15.50 //
analyzed: bodha rūpa aviśeṣāt na bodha abodhau tathā ātmani

original: yathoktaṃ brahma yo veda hānopādānavarjitam /
analyzed: yathā uktam brahma yaḥ veda hāna upādāna varjitam

original: yathoktena vidhānena sa satyaṃ naiva jāyate // SamUpad_I,15.51 //
analyzed: yathā uktena vidhānena sa satyam nā eva jāyate

original: janmamṛtyupravāheṣu patito naiva śaknuyāt /
analyzed: janma mṛtyu pravāheṣu patitaḥ nā eva śaknuyāt

original: ita uddhartum ātmānaṃ jñānād anyena kenacit // SamUpad_I,15.52 //
analyzed: itas uddhartum ātmānam jñānāt anyena kenacid

original: “bhidyate hṛdayagranthiś chidyante sarvasaṃśayāḥ /
analyzed: bhidyate hṛdaya granthiḥ chidyante sarva saṃśayāḥ

original: kṣīyante cāsya karmāṇi tasmin dṛṣṭa” iti śruteḥ // SamUpad_I,15.53 //
analyzed: kṣīyante ca asya karmāṇi tasmin dṛṣṭe iti śruteḥ

original: mamāham ity etad apohya sarvato vimuktadehaṃ padam ambaropamam /
analyzed: mama aham iti etat apohya sarvatas vimukta deham padam ambara upamam

original: sudṛṣṭaśāstrānumitibhya īritaṃ vimucyate 'smin yadi niścito naraḥ // SamUpad_I,15.54 //
analyzed: su dṛṣṭa śāstra anumitibhyaḥ īritam vimucyate smin yadi niścitaḥ naraḥ

original: iti nānyadanyatprakaraṇam // SamUpad_I,15 //
analyzed: iti na anyat anyat prakaraṇam

original: pārthivaḥ kaṭhino dhātur dravo dehe smṛto 'mmayaḥ /
analyzed: pārthivaḥ kaṭhinaḥ dhātuḥ dravaḥ dehe smṛtaḥ mmayaḥ

original: pakticeṣṭāvakāśāḥ syur vahnivāyvambarodbhavāḥ // SamUpad_I,16.1 //
analyzed: pakti ceṣṭā avakāśāḥ syuḥ vahni vāyu ambara udbhavāḥ

original: ghrāṇādīni tadarthāś ca pṛthivyādiguṇāḥ kramāt /
analyzed: ghrāṇa ādīni tad arthāḥ ca pṛthivī ādi guṇāḥ kramāt

original: rūpālokavad iṣṭaṃ hi sajātīyārtham indriyam // SamUpad_I,16.2 //
analyzed: rūpa āloka vat iṣṭam hi sajātīya artham indriyam

original: buddhyarthāny āhur etāni vākpāṇyādīni karmaṇe /
analyzed: buddhi arthāni āhuḥ etāni vāc pāṇi ādīni karmaṇe

original: tadvikalpārtham antasthaṃ mana ekādaśaṃ bhavet // SamUpad_I,16.3 //
analyzed: tad vikalpa artham anta stham manaḥ ekādaśam bhavet

original: niścayārthā bhaved buddhis tāṃ sarvārthānubhāvinīm /
analyzed: niścaya arthā bhavet buddhiḥ tām sarva artha anubhāvinīm

original: jñātātmoktaḥ svarūpeṇa jyotiṣā vyañjayan sadā // SamUpad_I,16.4 //
analyzed: jñātātmā uktaḥ sva rūpeṇa jyotiṣā vyañjayan sadā

original: vyañjakas tu yathāloko vyaṅgyasyākāratāṃ gataḥ /
analyzed: vyañjakaḥ tu yathā ālokaḥ vyaṅgyasya ākāra tām gataḥ

original: vyatikīrṇo 'py asaṃkīrṇas tadvaj jñaḥ pratyayaiḥ sadā // SamUpad_I,16.5 //
analyzed: vyatikīrṇaḥ u pi asaṃkīrṇaḥ tadvat jñaḥ pratyayaiḥ sadā

original: sthito dīpo yathāyatnaḥ prāptaṃ sarvaṃ prakāśayet /
analyzed: sthitaḥ dīpaḥ yathā yatnaḥ prāptam sarvam prakāśayet

original: śabdādyākārabuddhīr jñaḥ prāptās tadvat prapaśyati // SamUpad_I,16.6 //
analyzed: śabda ādi ākāra buddhīḥ jñaḥ prāptāḥ tadvat prapaśyati

original: śarīrendriyasaṃghāta ātmatvena gatāṃ dhiyam /
analyzed: śarīra indriya saṃghātaḥ ātma tvena gatām dhiyam

original: nityātmajyotiṣā dīptāṃ viśiṃṣanti sukhādayaḥ // SamUpad_I,16.7 //
analyzed: nitya ātma jyotiṣā dīptām viśiṃṣanti sukha ādayaḥ

original: śiroduḥkhādinātmānaṃ duḥkhy asmīti hi paśyati /
analyzed: śiraḥ duḥkha ādinā ātmānam duḥkhī asmi iti hi paśyati

original: draṣṭānyo duḥkhino dṛśyād draṣṭṛtvac ca na duḥkhy asau // SamUpad_I,16.8 //
analyzed: draṣṭā anyaḥ duḥkhinaḥ dṛśyāt draṣṭṛ tvat ca na duḥkhī asau

original: duḥkhī syād duḥkhyahaṃmānād duḥkhino darśanān na vā /
analyzed: duḥkhī syāt duḥkhi ahaṃmānāt duḥkhinaḥ darśanāt na vā

original: saṃhate 'ṅgādibhir draṣṭā duḥkhī duḥkhasya naiva saḥ // SamUpad_I,16.9 //
analyzed: saṃhate ṅga ādibhiḥ draṣṭā duḥkhī duḥkhasya nā eva saḥ

original: cakṣurvat karmakartṛtvaṃ syāc cen nānekam eva tat /
analyzed: cakṣuḥ vat karma kartṛ tvam syāt ced na anekam eva tat

original: saṃhataṃ ca tato nātmā draṣṭṛtvāt karmatāṃ vrajet // SamUpad_I,16.10 //
analyzed: saṃhatam ca tatas na ātmā draṣṭṛ tvāt karma tām vrajet

original: jñānayatnādyanekatvam ātmano 'pi mataṃ yadi /
analyzed: jñāna yatna ādi aneka tvam ātmanaḥ matam yadi

original: naikajñānaguṇatvāt tu jyotirvat tasya karmatā // SamUpad_I,16.11 //
analyzed: na eka jñāna guṇa tvāt tu jyotiḥ vat tasya karma tā

original: jyotiṣo dyotakatve 'pi yadvan nātmaprakāśanam /
analyzed: jyotiṣaḥ dyotaka tve yadvat na ātma prakāśanam

original: bhede 'py evaṃ samatvāj jña ātmānaṃ naiva paśyati // SamUpad_I,16.12 //
analyzed: bhede pi evam sama tvāt jñaḥ ātmānam na eva paśyati

original: yaddharmā yaḥ padārtho na tasyaiveyāt sa karmatām /
analyzed: yad dharmā yaḥ padārthaḥ na tasya eva iyāt sa karma tām

original: na hy ātmānaṃ dahaty agnis tathā naiva prakāśayet // SamUpad_I,16.13 //
analyzed: na hi ātmānam dahati agniḥ tathā na eva prakāśayet

original: etenaivātmanātmano graho buddher nirākṛtaḥ /
analyzed: etena eva ātmanā ātmanaḥ grahaḥ buddheḥ nirākṛtaḥ

original: aṃśo 'py evaṃ samatvād dhi nirbhedatvān na yujyate // SamUpad_I,16.14 //
analyzed: aṃśaḥ api evam sama tvāt hi nirbheda tvāt na yujyate

original: śūnyatāpi na yuktaivaṃ buddher anyena dṛśyatā /
analyzed: śūnyatā api na yuktā evam buddheḥ anyena dṛśya tā

original: uktāto ghaṭavat tasyāḥ prāk siddheś ca vikalpataḥ // SamUpad_I,16.15 //
analyzed: uktā atas ghaṭa vat tasyāḥ prāk siddheḥ ca vikalpataḥ

original: avikalpaṃ tad asty eva yat pūrvaṃ syād vikalpataḥ /
analyzed: avikalpam tat asti eva yat pūrvam syāt vikalpataḥ

original: vikalpotpattihetutvād yady asyaiva ca kāraṇam // SamUpad_I,16.16 //
analyzed: vikalpa utpatti hetu tvāt yadi asya eva ca kāraṇam

original: ajñānaṃ kalpanāmūlaṃ saṃsārasya niyāmakam /
analyzed: ajñānam kalpanā mūlam saṃsārasya niyāmakam

original: hitvātmānaṃ paraṃ brahma vidyān muktaṃ sadābhayam // SamUpad_I,16.17 //
analyzed: hitvā ātmānam param brahma vidyāt muktam sadā abhayam

original: jāgratsvapnau tayor bījaṃ suṣuptākhyaṃ tamomayam /
analyzed: jāgrat svapnau tayoḥ bījam suṣupta ākhyam tamaḥ mayam

original: anyonyasminn asattvāc ca nāstīty etat trayaṃ tyajet // SamUpad_I,16.18 //
analyzed: anyonyasmin asattvāt ca na asti iti etat trayam tyajet

original: ātmabuddhimanaścakṣurālokārthādisaṃkarāt
analyzed: ātma buddhi manaḥ cakṣuḥ āloka artha ādi saṃkarāt

original: bhrāntiḥ syād ātmakarmeti kriyāṇāṃ saṃnipātataḥ // SamUpad_I,16.19 //
analyzed: bhrāntiḥ syāt ātma karma iti kriyāṇām saṃnipātataḥ

original: nimīlonmīlane sthāne vāyavye te na cakṣuṣaḥ /
analyzed: nimīlā unmīlane sthāne vāyavye te na cakṣuṣaḥ

original: prakāśatvān manasy evaṃ buddhau na staḥ prakāśataḥ // SamUpad_I,16.20 //
analyzed: prakāśa tvāt manasi evam buddhau na staḥ prakāśataḥ

original: saṃkalpādhyavasāyau tu manobuddhyor yathākramāt /
analyzed: saṃkalpa adhyavasāyau tu manaḥ buddhyoḥ yathākramāt

original: netaretaradharmatvaṃ sarvaṃ cātmani kalpitam // SamUpad_I,16.21 //
analyzed: na itaretara dharma tvam sarvam ca ātmani kalpitam

original: sthānāvacchedadṛṣṭiḥ syād indriyāṇāṃ tadātmatām /
analyzed: sthāna avaccheda dṛṣṭiḥ syāt indriyāṇām tad ātma tām

original: gatā dhīs taṃ hi paśyañ jño dehamātra ivekṣyate // SamUpad_I,16.22 //
analyzed: gatā dhīḥ tam hi paśyam jñaḥ deha mātre iva īkṣyate

original: kṣaṇikaṃ hi tad atyarthaṃ dharmamātraṃ nirantaram /
analyzed: kṣaṇikam hi tat atyartham dharmamātram nirantaram

original: sādṛśyād dīpavat taddhīs tacchāntiḥ puruṣārthatā // SamUpad_I,16.23 //
analyzed: sādṛśyāt dīpa vat tad dhīḥ tad śāntiḥ puruṣa artha tā

original: svākārānyāvabhāsaṃ ca yeṣāṃ rūpādi vidyate /
analyzed: sva ākāra anya avabhāsam ca yeṣām rūpa ādi vidyate

original: yeṣāṃ nāsti tataś cānyat pūrvāsaṃgatir ucyate // SamUpad_I,16.24 //
analyzed: yeṣām na asti tatas ca anyat pūrvā saṃgatiḥ ucyate

original: bāhyākāratvato jñapteḥ smṛtyabhāvaḥ sadā kṣaṇāt /
analyzed: bāhya ākāra tvataḥ jñapteḥ smṛti abhāvaḥ sadā kṣaṇāt

original: kṣaṇikatvāc ca saṃskāraṃ naivādhatte kvacit tu dhiḥ // SamUpad_I,16.25 //
analyzed: kṣaṇika tvāt ca saṃskāram na eva ādhatte kvacid tu dhiḥ

original: ādhārasyāpy asattvāc ca tulyatānirnimittataḥ /
analyzed: ādhārasya api asattvāt ca tulya tā nirnimittataḥ

original: sthāne vā kṣaṇikatvasya hānaṃ syān na tad iṣyate // SamUpad_I,16.26 //
analyzed: sthāne vā kṣaṇika tvasya hānam syāt na tat iṣyate

original: śānteś cāyatnasiddhatvāt sādhanoktir anarthikā /
analyzed: śānteḥ ca ayatna siddha tvāt sādhana uktiḥ anarthikā

original: ekaikasmin samāptatvāc chānter anyānapekṣatā // SamUpad_I,16.27 //
analyzed: ekaikasmin samāpta tvāt śānteḥ anya an apekṣa tā

original: apekṣā yadi bhinne 'pi parasaṃtāna iṣyatām /
analyzed: apekṣā yadi bhinne pi para saṃtāne iṣyatām

original: sarvārthe kṣaṇike kasmiṃs tathāpy anyānapekṣatā // SamUpad_I,16.28 //
analyzed: sarva arthe kṣaṇike kasmin tathā api anya anapekṣa tā

original: tulyakālasamudbhūtāv itaretarayoginau /
analyzed: tulya kāla samudbhūtau itaretara yoginau

original: yogāc ca saṃskṛto yas tu so 'nyaṃ hīkṣitum arhati // SamUpad_I,16.29 //
analyzed: yogāt ca saṃskṛtaḥ yaḥ tu saḥ hi īkṣitum arhati

original: mṛṣādhyāsas tu yatra syāt tannāśas tatra no mataḥ /
analyzed: mṛṣā adhyāsaḥ tu yatra syāt tad nāśaḥ tatra no mataḥ

original: sarvanāśo bhaved yasya mokṣaḥ kasya phalaṃ vada // SamUpad_I,16.30 //
analyzed: sarva nāśaḥ bhavet yasya mokṣaḥ kasya phalam vada

original: asti tāvat svayaṃ nāma jñānaṃ vātmānyad eva vā /
analyzed: asti tāvat svayam nāma jñānam vā ātmā anyat eva vā

original: bhāvābhāvajñatas tasya nābhāvas tv adhigamyate // SamUpad_I,16.31 //
analyzed: bhāva abhāva jñataḥ tasya na abhāvaḥ tu adhigamyate

original: yenādhigamyate 'bhāvas tat sat syāt tan na ced bhavet /
analyzed: yena adhigamyate bhāvaḥ tat sat syāt tat na ced bhavet

original: bhāvābhāvānabhijñatvaṃ lokasya syān na ceṣyate // SamUpad_I,16.32 //
analyzed: bhāva abhāva anabhijña tvam lokasya syāt na ca iṣyate

original: sad asat sadasac ceti vikalpāt prāg yad iṣyate /
analyzed: sat asat sat asat ca iti vikalpāt prāk yat iṣyate

original: tad advaitaṃ samatvāt tu nityaṃ cānyad vikalpitāt // SamUpad_I,16.33 //
analyzed: tat advaitam sama tvāt tu nityam ca anyat vikalpitāt

original: vikalpodbhavato 'sattvaṃ svapnadṛśyavad iṣyatām /
analyzed: sattvam svapna dṛśya vat iṣyatām

original: dvaitasya prāg asattvāc ca sadasattvādikalpanāt // SamUpad_I,16.34 //
analyzed: dvaitasya prāk asattvāt ca sat asat tva ādi kalpanāt

original: vācārambhaṇaśāstrāc ca vikārāṇāṃ hy abhāvatā /
analyzed: vācā ārambhaṇa śāstrāt ca vikārāṇām hi abhāva tā

original: mṛtyoḥ sa mṛtyum ityāder mama māyeti ca smṛteḥ // SamUpad_I,16.35 //
analyzed: mṛtyoḥ sa mṛtyum ityādeḥ mama māyā iti ca smṛteḥ

original: viśuddhiś cāta evāsya vikalpāc ca vilakṣaṇāt /
analyzed: viśuddhiḥ ca atas eva asya vikalpāt ca vilakṣaṇāt

original: upādeyo na heyo 'ta ātmā nānyair akalpitaḥ // SamUpad_I,16.36 //
analyzed: upādeyaḥ na te ātmā na anyaiḥ akalpitaḥ

original: aprakāśo yathāditye nāsti jyotiḥsvabhāvataḥ /
analyzed: aprakāśaḥ yathā āditye na asti jyotiḥ svabhāvataḥ

original: nityabodhasvarūpatvān nājñānaṃ tadvad ātmani // SamUpad_I,16.37 //
analyzed: nitya bodha svarūpa tvāt na ajñānam tadvat ātmani

original: tathāvikriyarūpatvān nāvasthāntaram ātmanaḥ /
analyzed: tathā avikriya rūpa tvāt na avasthā antaram ātmanaḥ

original: avasthāntaravattve hi nāśo 'sya syān na saṃśayaḥ // SamUpad_I,16.38 //
analyzed: avasthā antaravat tve hi syāt na saṃśayaḥ

original: mokṣo 'vasthāntaraṃ yasya kṛtakaḥ sa calo hy ataḥ /
analyzed: mokṣaḥ vasthā antaram yasya kṛtakaḥ sa calaḥ hi atas

original: na saṃyogo viyogo vā mokṣo yuktaḥ kathaṃcana // SamUpad_I,16.39 //
analyzed: na saṃyogaḥ viyogaḥ vā mokṣaḥ yuktaḥ kathaṃcana

original: saṃyogasyāpy anityatvād viyogasya tathaiva ca /
analyzed: saṃyogasya api anitya tvāt viyogasya tathā eva ca

original: gamanāgamane caiva svarūpaṃ tu na hīyate // SamUpad_I,16.40 //
analyzed: gamana āgamane ca eva svarūpam tu na hīyate

original: svarūpasyānimittatvāt sanimittā hi cāpare /
analyzed: sva rūpasya animitta tvāt sa nimittāḥ hi ca apare

original: anupāttaṃ svarūpaṃ hi svenātyaktaṃ tathaiva ca // SamUpad_I,16.41 //
analyzed: anupāttam sva rūpam hi svena atyaktam tathā eva ca

original: svarūpatvān na sarvasya tyaktuṃ śakyo hy ananyataḥ /
analyzed: sva rūpa tvāt na sarvasya tyaktum śakyaḥ hi ananyatas

original: gṛhītuṃ vā tato nityo 'viṣayatvāpṛthaktvataḥ // SamUpad_I,16.42 //
analyzed: gṛhītum vā tatas nityaḥ viṣaya tva apṛthaktvataḥ

original: ātmārthatvāc ca sarvasya nitya ātmaiva kevalaḥ /
analyzed: ātma artha tvāt ca sarvasya nityaḥ ātmā eva kevalaḥ

original: tyajet tasmāt kriyāḥ sarvāḥ sādhanaiḥ saha mokṣavit // SamUpad_I,16.43 //
analyzed: tyajet tasmāt kriyāḥ sarvāḥ sādhanaiḥ saha mokṣa vid

original: ātmalābhaḥ paro lābha iti śāstropapattayaḥ /
analyzed: ātma lābhaḥ paraḥ lābhaḥ iti śāstra upapattayaḥ
