original: alābho 'nyātmalābhas tu tyajet tasmād anātmatām // SamUpad_I,16.44 //
analyzed: alābhaḥ tu tyajet tasmāt anātma tām

original: guṇānāṃ samabhāvasya bhraṃśo na hy upapadyate /
analyzed: guṇānām sama bhāvasya bhraṃśaḥ na hi upapadyate

original: avidyādeḥ prasuptatvān na cānyo hetur iṣyate // SamUpad_I,16.45 //
analyzed: avidyā ādeḥ prasupta tvāt na ca anyaḥ hetuḥ iṣyate

original: itaretarahetutve pravṛttiḥ syāt sadā na vā /
analyzed: itaretara hetu tve pravṛttiḥ syāt sadā na vā

original: niyamo na pravṛttīnāṃ guṇeṣv ātmani vā bhavet // SamUpad_I,16.46 //
analyzed: niyamaḥ na pravṛttīnām guṇeṣu ātmani vā bhavet

original: viśeṣo muktabaddhānāṃ tādarthye ca na yujyate /
analyzed: viśeṣaḥ mukta baddhānām tādarthye ca na yujyate

original: arthārthinoś ca saṃbandho nārthī jño netaro 'pi vā // SamUpad_I,16.47 //
analyzed: artha arthinoḥ ca saṃbandhaḥ na arthī jñaḥ vā

original: pradhānasya ca pārārthyaṃ puruṣasyāvikārataḥ /
analyzed: pradhānasya ca pārārthyam puruṣasya avikārataḥ

original: na yuktaṃ sāṃkhyaśāstre 'pi vikāre 'pi na yujyate // SamUpad_I,16.48 //
analyzed: na yuktam sāṃkhya śāstre vikāre na yujyate

original: saṃbandhānupapatteś ca prakṛteḥ puruṣasya ca /
analyzed: saṃbandha anupapatteḥ ca prakṛteḥ puruṣasya ca

original: mitho 'yuktaṃ tadarthatvaṃ pradhānasyācititvataḥ // SamUpad_I,16.49 //
analyzed: mithas yuktam tad artha tvam pradhānasya aciti tvataḥ

original: kriyotpattau vināśitvaṃ jñānamātre ca pūrvavat /
analyzed: kriyā utpattau vināśi tvam jñāna mātre ca pūrvavat

original: nirnimitte tv anirmokṣaḥ pradhānasya prasajyate // SamUpad_I,16.50 //
analyzed: nirnimitte tu anirmokṣaḥ pradhānasya prasajyate

original: na prakāśyaṃ yathoṣṇatvaṃ jñānenaivaṃ sukhādayaḥ /
analyzed: na prakāśyam yathā uṣṇa tvam jñānena evam sukha ādayaḥ

original: ekanīḍatvato 'grāhyāḥ syuḥ kaṇādādivartmanām // SamUpad_I,16.51 //
analyzed: eka nīḍa tvataḥ grāhyāḥ syuḥ kaṇāda ādi vartmanām

original: yugapac cāsametatvāt sukhavijñānayor api /
analyzed: yugapad ca a sameta tvāt sukha vijñānayoḥ api

original: manoyogaikahetutvād agrāhyatvaṃ sukhasya ca // SamUpad_I,16.52 //
analyzed: manaḥ yoga eka hetu tvāt agrāhya tvam sukhasya ca

original: tathānyeṣāṃ ca bhinnatvād yugapajjanma neṣyate /
analyzed: tathā anyeṣām ca bhinna tvāt yugapad janma na iṣyate

original: guṇānāṃ samavetatvaṃ jñānaṃ cen na viśeṣaṇāt // SamUpad_I,16.53 //
analyzed: guṇānām samaveta tvam jñānam ced na viśeṣaṇāt

original: jñānenaiva viśeṣyatvāj jñānāpyatvaṃ smṛtes tathā /
analyzed: jñānena eva viśeṣya tvāt jñāna āpya tvam smṛteḥ tathā

original: sukhaṃ jñātaṃ mayety evaṃ tavājñānātmakatvataḥ // SamUpad_I,16.54 //
analyzed: sukham jñātam mayā iti evam tava ajñāna ātmaka tvataḥ

original: sukhāder nātmadharmatvam ātmanas te 'vikārataḥ /
analyzed: sukha ādeḥ na ātma dharma tvam ātmanaḥ te vikārataḥ

original: bhedād anyasya kasmān na manaso vāviśeṣataḥ // SamUpad_I,16.55 //
analyzed: bhedāt anyasya kasmāt na manasaḥ vā aviśeṣataḥ

original: syān mālāparihāryā tu jñānaṃ cej jñeyatāṃ vrajet /
analyzed: syāt mālā parihāryā tu jñānam ced jñeya tām vrajet

original: yugapad vāpi cotpattir abhyupete 'nta iṣyate // SamUpad_I,16.56 //
analyzed: yugapad vā api ca utpattiḥ abhyupete nte iṣyate

original: anavasthāntaratvāc ca bandho nātmani vidyate /
analyzed: anavasthā antara tvāt ca bandhaḥ na ātmani vidyate

original: nāśuddhiś cāpy asaṅgatvād asaṅgo hīti ca śruteḥ // SamUpad_I,16.57 //
analyzed: na aśuddhiḥ ca api asaṅga tvāt asaṅgaḥ hi iti ca śruteḥ

original: sūkṣmaikāgocarebhyaś ca na lipyata iti śruteḥ /
analyzed: sūkṣma eka agocarebhyaḥ ca na lipyate iti śruteḥ

original: evaṃ tarhi na mokṣo 'sti bandhābhāvāt kathaṃcana // SamUpad_I,16.58 //
analyzed: evam tarhi na mokṣaḥ sti bandha abhāvāt kathaṃcana

original: śāstrānarthakyam evaṃ syān na buddher bhrāntir iṣyate /
analyzed: śāstra ānarthakyam evam syāt na buddheḥ bhrāntiḥ iṣyate

original: bandho mokṣaś ca tannāśaḥ sa yathokto na cānyathā // SamUpad_I,16.59 //
analyzed: bandhaḥ mokṣaḥ ca tad nāśaḥ sa yathā uktaḥ na ca anyathā

original: bodhātmajyotiṣā dīptā bodham ātmani manyate /
analyzed: bodha ātma jyotiṣā dīptā bodham ātmani manyate

original: buddhir nānyo 'sti boddheti seyaṃ bhrāntir hi dhīgatā // SamUpad_I,16.60 //
analyzed: buddhiḥ na anyaḥ sti boddhā iti sā iyam bhrāntiḥ hi dhī gatā

original: bodhasyātmasvarūpatvān nityaṃ tatropacaryate /
analyzed: bodhasya ātma svarūpa tvāt nityam tatra upacaryate

original: aviveko 'py anādyo 'yaṃ saṃsāro nānya iṣyate // SamUpad_I,16.61 //
analyzed: avivekaḥ pi anādyaḥ yam saṃsāraḥ na anyaḥ iṣyate

original: mokṣas tannāśa eva syān nānyathānupapattitaḥ /
analyzed: mokṣaḥ tad nāśaḥ eva syāt na anyathā anupapattitaḥ

original: yeṣāṃ vastvantarāpattir mokṣo nāśas tu tair mataḥ // SamUpad_I,16.62 //
analyzed: yeṣām vastu antara āpattiḥ mokṣaḥ nāśaḥ tu taiḥ mataḥ

original: avasthāntaram apy evam avikārān na yujyate /
analyzed: avasthā antaram api evam avikārāt na yujyate

original: vikāre 'vayavitvaṃ syāt tato nāśo ghaṭādivat // SamUpad_I,16.63 //
analyzed: vikāre vayavi tvam syāt tatas nāśaḥ ghaṭa ādi vat

original: tasmād bhrāntir ato 'nyā hi bandhamokṣādikalpanāḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt bhrāntiḥ atas nyāḥ hi bandha mokṣa ādi kalpanāḥ

original: sāṃkhyakāṇādabauddhānāṃ mīmāṃsāhatakalpanāḥ // SamUpad_I,16.64 //
analyzed: sāṃkhya kāṇāda bauddhānām mīmāṃsā hata kalpanāḥ

original: śāstrayuktivirodhāt tā nādartavyāḥ kadācana /
analyzed: śāstra yukti virodhāt tāḥ na ādartavyāḥ kadācana

original: śakyante śataśo vaktuṃ doṣās tāsāṃ sahasraśaḥ // SamUpad_I,16.65 //
analyzed: śakyante śataśas vaktum doṣāḥ tāsām sahasraśas

original: api nindopapatteś ca yāny ato 'nyāni cety ataḥ /
analyzed: api nindā upapatteḥ ca yāni atas nyāni ca iti atas

original: tyaktvāto hy anyaśāstroktīr matiṃ kuryād dṛḍhāṃ budhaḥ // SamUpad_I,16.66 //
analyzed: tyaktvā atas hi anya śāstra uktīḥ matim kuryāt dṛḍhām budhaḥ

original: śraddhābhaktī puraskṛtya hitvā sarvam anārjavam /
analyzed: śraddhā bhaktī puraskṛtya hitvā sarvam anārjavam

original: vedāntasyaiva tattvārthe vyāsasyāpi matau tathā // SamUpad_I,16.67 //
analyzed: vedāntasya eva tattva arthe vyāsasya api matau tathā

original: iti praṇunnā dvayavādakalpanā nirātmavādāś ca tathā hi yuktitaḥ /
analyzed: iti praṇunnāḥ dvaya vāda kalpanāḥ nirātma vādāḥ ca tathā hi yuktitaḥ

original: vyapetaśaṅkāḥ paravādataḥ sthirā mumukṣavo jñānapathe syur ity uta // SamUpad_I,16.63 //
analyzed: vyapeta śaṅkāḥ paravādataḥ sthirāḥ mumukṣavaḥ jñāna pathe syuḥ iti uta

original: svasākṣikaṃ jñānam atīva nirmalaṃ vikalpanābhyo viparītam advayam /
analyzed: sva sākṣikam jñānam atīva nirmalam vikalpanābhyaḥ viparītam advayam

original: avāpya samyag yadi niścito bhaven niranvayo nirvṛtim eti śāśvatīm // SamUpad_I,16.69 //
analyzed: avāpya samyak yadi niścitaḥ bhavet niranvayaḥ nirvṛtim eti śāśvatīm

original: idaṃ rahasyaṃ paramaṃ parāyaṇaṃ vyapetadoṣair abhimānavarjitaiḥ /
analyzed: idam rahasyam paramam parāyaṇam vyapeta doṣaiḥ abhimāna varjitaiḥ

original: samīkṣya kāryā matir ārjave sadā na tattvadṛk svānyamatir hi kaścana // SamUpad_I,16.70 //
analyzed: samīkṣya kāryā matiḥ ārjave sadā na tattva dṛś sva anya matiḥ hi kaścana

original: anekajanmāntarasaṃcitair naro vimucyate 'jñānanimittapātakaiḥ /
analyzed: aneka janma antara saṃcitaiḥ naraḥ vimucyate jñāna nimitta pātakaiḥ

original: idaṃ viditvā paramaṃ hi pāvanaṃ na lipyate vyoma iveha karmabhiḥ // SamUpad_I,16.71 //
analyzed: idam viditvā paramam hi pāvanam na lipyate vyoma iva iha karmabhiḥ

original: praśāntacittāya jitendriyāya ca prahīṇadoṣāya yathoktakāriṇe /
analyzed: praśānta cittāya jita indriyāya ca prahīṇa doṣāya yathā ukta kāriṇe

original: guṇānvitāyānugatāya sarvadā pradeyam etat satataṃ mumukṣave // SamUpad_I,16.72 //
analyzed: guṇa anvitāya anugatāya sarvadā pradeyam etat satatam mumukṣave

original: parasya dehe na yathābhimānitā parasya tadvat paramārtham īkṣya ca /
analyzed: parasya dehe na yathā abhimāni tā parasya tadvat parama artham īkṣya ca

original: idaṃ hi vijñānam atīva nirmalaṃ saṃprāpya mukto 'tha bhavec ca sarvataḥ // SamUpad_I,16.73 //
analyzed: idam hi vijñānam atīva nirmalam saṃprāpya bhavet ca sarvatas

original: na hīha lābho 'bhyadhiko 'sti kaścana svarūpalābhāt sa ita hi nānyataḥ /
analyzed: na hi iha lābhaḥ bhyadhikaḥ sti kaścana svarūpa lābhāt saḥ ita hi na anyatas

original: na deyam aindrād api rājyato 'dhikaṃ svarūpalābhaṃ tv aparīkṣya yatnataḥ // SamUpad_I,16.74 //
analyzed: na deyam aindrāt api rājyataḥ dhikam sva rūpa lābham tu a parīkṣya yatnataḥ

original: iti pārthivaprakaraṇam // SamUpad_I,16 //
analyzed: iti pārthiva prakaraṇam

original: ātmā jñeyaḥ paro hy ātmā yasmād anyan na vidyate /
analyzed: ātmā jñeyaḥ paraḥ hi ātmā yasmāt anyat na vidyate

original: sarvajñaḥ sarvadṛk śuddhas tasmai jñeyātmane namaḥ // SamUpad_I,17.1 //
analyzed: sarvajñaḥ sarva dṛś śuddhaḥ tasmai jñeya ātmane namaḥ

original: padavākyapramāṇajñair dīpabhūtaiḥ prakāśitam /
analyzed: pada vākya pramāṇa jñaiḥ dīpa bhūtaiḥ prakāśitam

original: brahma vedarahasyaṃ yais tān nityaṃ praṇato 'smy aham // SamUpad_I,17.2 //
analyzed: brahma veda rahasyam yaiḥ tān nityam praṇataḥ smi aham

original: yadvāksūryāṃśusaṃpātapraṇaṣṭadhvāntakalmaṣaḥ /
analyzed: yat vāc sūrya aṃśu saṃpāta praṇaṣṭa dhvānta kalmaṣaḥ

original: praṇamya tān gurūn vakṣye brahmavidyāviniścayam // SamUpad_I,17.3 //
analyzed: praṇamya tān gurūn vakṣye brahma vidyā viniścayam

original: ātmalābhāt paro nānyo lābhaḥ kaścana vidyate /
analyzed: ātma lābhāt paraḥ nā anyaḥ lābhaḥ kaścana vidyate

original: yadarthā vedavādāś ca smārtāś cāpi tu yāḥ kriyāḥ // SamUpad_I,4 //
analyzed: yad arthāḥ veda vādāḥ ca smārtāḥ ca api tu yāḥ kriyāḥ

original: ātmārtho 'pi hi yo lābhaḥ sukhāyeṣṭo viparyayaḥ /
analyzed: ātma arthaḥ hi yaḥ lābhaḥ sukhāya iṣṭaḥ viparyayaḥ

original: ātmalābhaḥ paraḥ prokto nityatvād brahmavedibhiḥ // SamUpad_I,17.5 //
analyzed: ātma lābhaḥ paraḥ proktaḥ nitya tvāt brahma vedibhiḥ

original: svayaṃ labdhasvabhāvatvāl lābhas tasya na cānyataḥ /
analyzed: svayam labdha svabhāva tvāt lābhaḥ tasya na ca anyatas

original: anyāpekṣas tu yo lābhaḥ so 'nyadṛṣṭisamudbhavaḥ // SamUpad_I,17.6 //
analyzed: anya apekṣaḥ tu yaḥ lābhaḥ saḥ nyadṛṣṭi samudbhavaḥ

original: anyadṛṣṭis tv avidyā syāt tannāśo mokṣa ucyate /
analyzed: anya dṛṣṭiḥ tu avidyā syāt tad nāśaḥ mokṣaḥ ucyate

original: jñānenaiva tu so 'pi syād virodhitvān na karmaṇā // SamUpad_I,17.7 //
analyzed: jñānena eva tu saḥ syāt virodhi tvāt na karmaṇā

original: karmakāryas tv anityaḥ syād avidyākāmakāraṇaḥ /
analyzed: karma kāryaḥ tu anityaḥ syāt avidyā kāma kāraṇaḥ

original: pramāṇaṃ veda evātra jñānasyādhigame smṛtaḥ // SamUpad_I,17.8 //
analyzed: pramāṇam vedaḥ eva atra jñānasya adhigame smṛtaḥ

original: jñānaikārthaparatvāt taṃ vākyam ekaṃ tato viduḥ /
analyzed: jñāna eka artha para tvāt tam vākyam ekam tatas viduḥ

original: ekatvaṃ hy ātmano jñeyaṃ vākyārthapratipattitaḥ // SamUpad_I,17.9 //
analyzed: eka tvam hi ātmanaḥ jñeyam vākya artha pratipattitaḥ

original: vācyabhedāt tu tadbhedaḥ kalpyo vācyo 'pi tacchruteḥ /
analyzed: vācya bhedāt tu tad bhedaḥ kalpyaḥ tad śruteḥ

original: trayaṃ tv etat tataḥ proktaṃ rūpaṃ nāma ca karma ca // SamUpad_I,17.10 //
analyzed: trayam tu etat tatas proktam rūpam nāma ca karma ca

original: asad etat trayaṃ tasmād anyonyena hi kalpitam /
analyzed: asat etat trayam tasmāt anyonyena hi kalpitam

original: kṛto varṇo yathā śabdāc chruto 'nyatra dhiyā bahiḥ // SamUpad_I,17.11 //
analyzed: kṛtaḥ varṇaḥ yathā śabdāt śrutaḥ nyatra dhiyā bahis

original: dṛṣṭaṃ cāpi yathā rūpaṃ buddheḥ śabdāya kalpate /
analyzed: dṛṣṭam ca api yathā rūpam buddheḥ śabdāya kalpate

original: evam etaj jagat sarvaṃ bhrāntibuddhivikalpitam // SamUpad_I,17.12 //
analyzed: evam etat jagat sarvam bhrānti buddhi vikalpitam

original: asad etat tato yuktaṃ saccinmātraṃ na kalpitam /
analyzed: asat etat tatas yuktam sat cit mātram na kalpitam

original: vedaś cāpi sa evādyo vedyaś cānyas tu kalpitaḥ // SamUpad_I,17.13 //
analyzed: vedaḥ ca api saḥ evā ādyaḥ vedyaḥ ca anyaḥ tu kalpitaḥ

original: yena vetti sa vedaḥ syāt svapne sarvaṃ tu māyayā /
analyzed: yena vetti sa vedaḥ syāt svapne sarvam tu māyayā

original: yena paśyati tac cakṣuḥ śṛṇoti śrotram ucyate // SamUpad_I,17.14 //
analyzed: yena paśyati tat cakṣuḥ śṛṇoti śrotram ucyate

original: yena svapnagato vakti sā vāg ghrāṇaṃ tathaiva ca /
analyzed: yena svapna gataḥ vakti sā vāc ghrāṇam tathā eva ca

original: rasanasparśane caiva manaś cānyat tathendriyam // SamUpad_I,17.15 //
analyzed: rasana sparśane ca eva manaḥ ca anyat tathā indriyam

original: kalpyopādhibhir evaitad bhinnaṃ jñānam anekadhā /
analyzed: kalpya upādhibhiḥ eva etat bhinnam jñānam anekadhā

original: ādhibhedād yathā bhedo maṇer ekasya jāyate // SamUpad_I,17.16 //
analyzed: ādhi bhedāt yathā bhedaḥ maṇeḥ ekasya jāyate

original: jāgrataś ca tathā bhedo jñānasyāsya vikalpitaḥ /
analyzed: jāgrataḥ ca tathā bhedaḥ jñānasya asya vikalpitaḥ

original: buddhisthaṃ vyākaroty arthaṃ bhrāntyā tṛṣṇodbhavakriyaḥ // SamUpad_I,17.17 //
analyzed: buddhi stham vyākaroti artham bhrāntyā tṛṣṇā udbhava kriyaḥ

original: svapne yadvat prabodhe ca bahiś cāntas tathaiva ca /
analyzed: svapne yadvat prabodhe ca bahis ca antar tathā eva ca

original: ālekhyādhyayane yadvat tad anyonyadhiyodbhavam // SamUpad_I,17.18 //
analyzed: ālekhya adhyayane yadvat tat anyonya dhiyā udbhavam

original: yadāyaṃ kalpayed bhedaṃ tatkāmaḥ san yathākratuḥ /
analyzed: yadā ayam kalpayet bhedam tad kāmaḥ san yathākratuḥ

original: yatkāmas tatkratur bhūtvā kṛtaṃ yat tat prapadyate // SamUpad_I,17.19 //
analyzed: yad kāmaḥ tad kratuḥ bhūtvā kṛtam yat tat prapadyate

original: avidyāprabhavaṃ sarvam asat tasmād idaṃ jagat /
analyzed: avidyā prabhavam sarvam asat tasmāt idam jagat

original: tadvatā dṛśyate yasmāt suṣupte na ca gṛhyate // SamUpad_I,17.20 //
analyzed: tadvatā dṛśyate yasmāt suṣupte na ca gṛhyate

original: vidyāvidye śrutiprokte ekatvānyadhiyau hi naḥ /
analyzed: vidyā avidye śruti prokte eka tva anya dhiyau hi naḥ

original: tasmāt sarvaprayatnena śāstre vidyā vidhīyate // SamUpad_I,17.21 //
analyzed: tasmāt sarva prayatnena śāstre vidyā vidhīyate

original: citte hy ādarśavad yasmāc chuddhe vidyā prakāśate /
analyzed: citte hi ādarśa vat yasmāt śuddhe vidyā prakāśate

original: yamair nityaiś ca yajñaiś ca tapobhis tasya śodhanam // SamUpad_I,17.22 //
analyzed: yamaiḥ nityaiḥ ca yajñaiḥ ca tapobhiḥ tasya śodhanam

original: śārīrāditapaḥ kuryāt tadviśuddhyartham uttamam /
analyzed: śārīra ādi tapaḥ kuryāt tad viśuddhi artham uttamam

original: manaādisamādhānaṃ tattaddehaviśoṣaṇam // SamUpad_I,17.23 //
dṛṣṭaṃ jāgaritaṃ vidyāt smṛtaṃ svapnaṃ tad eva tu /
analyzed: dṛṣṭam jāgaritam vidyāt smṛtam svapnam tat eva tu

original: suṣuptaṃ tadabhavaṃ ca svam ātmānaṃ paraṃ padam // SamUpad_I,17.24 //
analyzed: suṣuptam tat abhavam ca svam ātmānam param padam

original: suṣuptākhyaṃ tamo 'jñānaṃ bījaṃ svapnaprabodhayoḥ /
analyzed: suṣupta ākhyam tamaḥ jñānam bījam svapna prabodhayoḥ

original: svātmabodhapradagdhaṃ syād bījaṃ dagdhaṃ yathābhavam // SamUpad_I,17.25 //
analyzed: sva ātma bodha pradagdham syāt bījam dagdham yathābhavam

original: tad evaikaṃ tridhā jñeyaṃ māyābījaṃ punaḥ kramāt /
analyzed: tat eva ekam tridhā jñeyam māyābījam punar kramāt

original: māyāvy ātmāvikāro 'pi bahudhaiko jalārkavat // SamUpad_I,17.26 //
analyzed: māyāvī ātmā avikāraḥ bahudhā ekaḥ jala arka vat

original: bījaṃ caikaṃ yathā bhinnaṃ prāṇasvapnādibhis tathā /
analyzed: bījam ca ekam yathā bhinnam prāṇa svapna ādibhiḥ tathā

original: svapnajāgraccharīreṣu tadvac cātmā jalenduvat // SamUpad_I,17.27 //
analyzed: svapna jāgrat śarīreṣu tadvat ca ātmā jala indu vat

original: māyāhastinam āruhya māyāvy eko yathā vrajet /
analyzed: māyā hastinam āruhya māyāvī ekaḥ yathā vrajet

original: āgacchaṃs tadvad evātmā prāṇasvapnādigo 'calaḥ // SamUpad_I,17.28 //
analyzed: āgacchan tadvat eva ātmā prāṇa svapna ādi gaḥ calaḥ

original: na hastī na tadārūḍho māyāvy anyo yathā sthitaḥ /
analyzed: na hastī na tad ārūḍhaḥ māyāvī anyaḥ yathā sthitaḥ

original: na prāṇādi na taddraṣṭā tathā jño 'nyaḥ sadā dṛśiḥ // SamUpad_I,17.29 //
analyzed: na prāṇa ādi na tad draṣṭā tathā jñaḥ nyaḥ sadā dṛśiḥ

original: abaddhacakṣuṣo nāsti māyā māyāvino 'pi vā /
analyzed: a baddha cakṣuṣaḥ na asti māyā māyāvinaḥ vā

original: baddhākṣasyaiva sā māyāmāyāvy eva tato bhavet // SamUpad_I,17.30 //
analyzed: baddha akṣasya eva sā māyā māyāvī eva tatas bhavet

original: sākṣād eva sa vijñeyaḥ sākṣād ātmeti ca śruteḥ /
analyzed: sākṣāt eva sa vijñeyaḥ sākṣāt ātmā iti ca śruteḥ

original: bhidyate hṛdayagranthir na ced ityāditaḥ śruteḥ // SamUpad_I,17.31 //
analyzed: bhidyate hṛdaya granthiḥ na ced ityāditaḥ śruteḥ

original: aśabdāditvato nāsya grahaṇaṃ cendriyair bhavet /
analyzed: a śabda ādi tvataḥ na asya grahaṇam ca indriyaiḥ bhavet

original: sukhādibhyas tathānyatvād buddhyā vāpi kathaṃ bhavet // SamUpad_I,17.32 //
analyzed: sukha ādibhyaḥ tathā anyatvāt buddhyā vā api katham bhavet

original: adṛśyo 'pi yathā rāhuś candre bimbaṃ yathāmbhasi /
analyzed: adṛśyaḥ pi yathā rāhuḥ candre bimbam yathā ambhasi

original: sarvago 'pi tathaivātmā buddhāv eva sa gṛhyate // SamUpad_I,17.33 //
analyzed: sarva gaḥ tathā eva ātmā buddhau eva sa gṛhyate

original: bhānor bimbaṃ yathā cauṣṇyaṃ jale dṛṣṭaṃ na cāmbhasaḥ /
analyzed: bhānoḥ bimbam yathā ca auṣṇyam jale dṛṣṭam na ca ambhasaḥ

original: buddhau bodho na taddharmas tathaiva syād vidharmataḥ // SamUpad_I,17.34 //
analyzed: buddhau bodhaḥ na tad dharmaḥ tathā eva syāt vidharmataḥ

original: cakṣuryuktā dhiyo vṛttir yā tāṃ paśyann aluptadṛk /
analyzed: cakṣuḥ yuktā dhiyaḥ vṛttiḥ yā tām paśyan a lupta dṛś

original: dṛṣṭer draṣṭā bhaved ātmā śruteḥ śrotā tathā śruteḥ // SamUpad_I,17.35 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭeḥ draṣṭā bhavet ātmā śruteḥ śrotā tathā śruteḥ

original: kevalāṃ manaso vṛttiṃ paśyan mantā mater ajaḥ /
analyzed: kevalām manasaḥ vṛttim paśyan mantā mateḥ ajaḥ

original: vijñātāluptaśaktitvāt tathā śāstraṃ na hīty ataḥ // SamUpad_I,17.36 //
analyzed: vijñāta alupta śakti tvāt tathā śāstram na hi iti atas

original: dhyāyatīty avikāritvaṃ tathā lelāyatīty api /
analyzed: dhyāyati iti avikāri tvam tathā lelāyati iti api

original: atra steneti śuddhatvaṃ tathānanvāgataṃ śruteḥ // SamUpad_I,17.37 //
analyzed: atra stena iti śuddha tvam tathā an anvāgatam śruteḥ

original: śaktyalopāt suṣupte jñas tathā bodhe 'vikārataḥ /
analyzed: śakti alopāt suṣupte jñaḥ tathā bodhe vikārataḥ

original: jñeyasyaiva viśeṣas tu yatra veti śruter mataḥ // SamUpad_I,17.38 //
analyzed: jñeyasya eva viśeṣaḥ tu yatra vā iti śruteḥ mataḥ

original: vyavadhānād dhi pārokṣyaṃ lokadṛṣṭer anātmanaḥ /
analyzed: vyavadhānāt hi pārokṣyam loka dṛṣṭeḥ anātmanaḥ

original: dṛṣṭer ātmasvarūpatvāt pratyakṣaṃ brahma tat smṛtam // SamUpad_I,17.39 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭeḥ ātma svarūpa tvāt pratyakṣam brahma tat smṛtam

original: na hi dīpāntarāpekṣā yadvad dīpaprakāśane /
analyzed: na hi dīpa antara apekṣā yadvat dīpa prakāśane

original: bodhasyātmasvarūpatvān na bodho 'nyas tatheṣyate // SamUpad_I,17.40 //
analyzed: bodhasya ātma svarūpa tvāt na bodhaḥ tathā iṣyate

original: viṣayatvaṃ vikāritvaṃ nānātvaṃ vā na hīṣyate /
analyzed: viṣaya tvam vikāri tvam nānātvam vā na hi iṣyate

original: na heyo nāpy upādeya ātmā nānyena vā tataḥ // SamUpad_I,17.41 //
analyzed: na heyaḥ nā api upādeyaḥ ātmā nā anyena vā tatas

original: sabāhyābhyantaro 'jīrṇo janmamṛtyujarātigaḥ /
analyzed: sa bāhya abhyantaraḥ jīrṇaḥ janma mṛtyu jarā atigaḥ

original: aham ātmeti yo vetti kuto nv eva bibheti saḥ // SamUpad_I,17.42 //
analyzed: aham ātmā iti yaḥ vetti kutas nu eva bibheti saḥ

original: prāg evaitadvidheḥ karma varṇitvāder apohanāt /
analyzed: prāk eva etat vidheḥ karma varṇi tva ādeḥ apohanāt

original: tad asthūlādiśāstrebhyas tat tvam eveti niścayāt // SamUpad_I,17.43 //
analyzed: tat a sthūla ādi śāstrebhyaḥ tat tvam eva iti niścayāt

original: pūrvadehaparityāge jātyādīnāṃ prahāṇataḥ /
dehasyaiva tu jātyādis tasyāpy evaṃ hy anātmatā // SamUpad_I,17.44 //
analyzed: dehasya eva tu jāti ādiḥ tasya api evam hi anātma tā

original: mamāhaṃ cety ato 'vidyā śarīrādiṣv anātmasu /
analyzed: mama aham ca iti atas vidyā śarīra ādiṣu anātmasu

original: ātmajñānena heyā syād asurāṇām iti śruteḥ // SamUpad_I,17.45 //
analyzed: ātma jñānena heyā syāt asurāṇām iti śruteḥ

original: daśāhāśaucakāryāṇāṃ pārivrājye nivartanam /
analyzed: daśa aha āśauca kāryāṇām pārivrājye nivartanam

original: yathā jñānasya saṃprāptau tadvaj jātyādikarmaṇām // SamUpad_I,17.46 //
analyzed: yathā jñānasya saṃprāptau tadvat jāti ādi karmaṇām

original: yatkāmas tatkratur bhūtvā kṛtaṃ tv ajñaḥ prapadyate /
analyzed: yad kāmaḥ tad kratuḥ bhūtvā kṛtam tu ajñaḥ prapadyate

original: yadā svātmadṛśaḥ kāmāḥ pramucyante 'mṛtas tadā // SamUpad_I,17.47 //
analyzed: yadā sva ātma dṛśaḥ kāmāḥ pramucyante mṛtaḥ tadā

original: ātmarūpavidheḥ kāryaṃ kriyādibhyo nivartanam /
analyzed: ātma rūpa vidheḥ kāryam kriyā ādibhyaḥ nivartanam

original: na sādhyaṃ sādhanaṃ vātmā nityatṛptaḥ śruter mataḥ // SamUpad_I,17.48 //
analyzed: na sādhyam sādhanam vā ātmā nitya tṛptaḥ śruteḥ mataḥ

original: utpādyāpyavikāryāṇi saṃskāryaṃ ca kriyāphalam /
analyzed: utpādya āpya vikāryāṇi saṃskāryam ca kriyā phalam

original: nāto 'nyat karmaṇaḥ kāryaṃ tyajet tasmāt sasādhanam // SamUpad_I,17.49 //
analyzed: na atas karmaṇaḥ kāryam tyajet tasmāt sa sādhanam

original: tāpāntatvād anityatvād ātmārthatvāc ca yā bahiḥ /
analyzed: tāpa anta tvāt anitya tvāt ātma artha tvāt ca yā bahis

original: saṃhṛtyātmani tāṃ prītiṃ satyārthī gurum āśrayet // SamUpad_I,17.50 //
analyzed: saṃhṛtya ātmani tām prītim satya arthī gurum āśrayet

original: śāntaṃ prājñaṃ tathā muktaṃ niṣkriyaṃ brahmaṇi sthitam /
analyzed: śāntam prājñam tathā muktam niṣkriyam brahmaṇi sthitam

original: śruter ācāryavān veda tad viddhīti smṛtes tathā // SamUpad_I,17.51 //
analyzed: śruteḥ ācāryavān veda tat viddhi iti smṛteḥ tathā

original: sa gurus tārayed yuktaṃ śiṣyaṃ śiṣyaguṇānvitam /
analyzed: sa guruḥ tārayet yuktam śiṣyam śiṣya guṇa anvitam

original: brahmavidyāplavenāśu svāntadhvāntamahodadhim // SamUpad_I,17.52 //
analyzed: brahma vidyā plavena āśu svānta dhvānta mahā udadhim

original: dṛṣṭiḥ spṛṣṭiḥ śrutir ghrātir matir vijñātir eva ca /
analyzed: dṛṣṭiḥ spṛṣṭiḥ śrutiḥ ghrātiḥ matiḥ vijñātiḥ eva ca

original: śaktayo 'nyāś ca bhidyante cidrūpatve 'py upādhibhiḥ // SamUpad_I,17.53 //
analyzed: śaktayaḥ nyāḥ ca bhidyante cit rūpa tve pi upādhibhiḥ

original: apāyodbhūtihīnābhir nityaṃ dīpyan ravir yathā /
analyzed: apāya udbhūti hīnābhiḥ nityam dīpyan raviḥ yathā

original: sarvagaḥ sarvadṛk śuddhaḥ sarvaṃ jānāti sarvadā // SamUpad_I,17.54 //
analyzed: sarvagaḥ sarva dṛś śuddhaḥ sarvam jānāti sarvadā

original: anyadṛṣṭiḥ śarīrasthas tāvanmātro hy avidyayā /
analyzed: anya dṛṣṭiḥ śarīra sthaḥ tāvat mātraḥ hi avidyayā

original: jalendvādyupamābhis tu taddharmā ca vibhāvyate // SamUpad_I,17.55 //
analyzed: jala indu ādi upamābhiḥ tu tad dharmā ca vibhāvyate

original: dṛṣṭvā bāhyaṃ nimīlyātha smṛtvā tat pravihāya ca /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā bāhyam nimīlya atha smṛtvā tat pravihāya ca

original: athonmīlyātmano dṛṣṭiṃ brahma prāpnoty anadhvagaḥ // SamUpad_I,17.56 //
analyzed: atha unmīlya ātmanaḥ dṛṣṭim brahma prāpnoti anadhvagaḥ

original: prāṇādy evaṃ trikaṃ hitvā tīrṇo 'jñānamahodadhim /
analyzed: prāṇa ādi evam trikam hitvā tīrṇaḥ jñāna mahā udadhim

original: svātmastho nirguṇaḥ śuddho buddho muktaḥ svato hi saḥ // SamUpad_I,17.57 //
analyzed: sva ātma sthaḥ nirguṇaḥ śuddhaḥ buddhaḥ muktaḥ svatas hi saḥ

original: ajo 'haṃ cāmaro 'mṛtyur ajaro 'bhaya eva ca /
analyzed: ajaḥ ham ca amaraḥ mṛtyuḥ ajaraḥ bhayaḥ eva ca

original: sarvajñaḥ sarvadṛk śuddha iti buddho na jāyate // SamUpad_I,17.58 //
analyzed: sarvajñaḥ sarva dṛś śuddhaḥ iti buddhaḥ na jāyate

original: pūrvoktaṃ yat tamobījaṃ tan nāstīti viniścayaḥ /
analyzed: pūrva uktam yat tamaḥ bījam tat na asti iti viniścayaḥ

original: tadabhāve kuto janma brahmaikatvaṃ vijānataḥ // SamUpad_I,17.59 //
analyzed: tad abhāve kutas janma brahma eka tvam vijānataḥ

original: kṣīrāt sarpir yathoddhṛtya kṣiptaṃ tasmin na pūrvavat /
analyzed: kṣīrāt sarpiḥ yathā uddhṛtya kṣiptam tasmin na pūrvavat

original: buddhyāder jñas tathāsatyān na dehī pūrvavad bhavet // SamUpad_I,17.60 //
analyzed: buddhi ādeḥ jñaḥ tathā asatyāt na dehī pūrvavat bhavet

original: satyaṃ jñānam anantaṃ ca rasādeḥ pañcakāt param /
analyzed: satyam jñānam anantam ca rasa ādeḥ pañcakāt param

original: syām adṛśyādiśāstroktam ahaṃ brahmeti nirbhayaḥ // SamUpad_I,17.61 //
analyzed: syām adṛśya ādi śāstra uktam aham brahma iti nirbhayaḥ

original: yasmād bhītāḥ pravartante vāṅmanaḥpāvakādayaḥ /
analyzed: yasmāt bhītāḥ pravartante vāc manaḥ pāvaka ādayaḥ

original: tadātmānandatattvajño na bibheti kutaścana // SamUpad_I,17.62 //
analyzed: tadā ātma ānanda tattva jñaḥ na bibheti kutaścana

original: nāmādibhyaḥ pare bhūmni svārājye cet sthito 'dvaye /
analyzed: nāma ādibhyaḥ pare bhūmni svārājye ced sthitaḥ dvaye

original: praṇamet kaṃ tadātmajño na kāryaṃ karmaṇā tadā // SamUpad_I,17.63 //
analyzed: praṇamet kam tadā ātma jñaḥ na kāryam karmaṇā tadā

original: virāḍ vaiśvānaro bāhyaḥ smarann antaḥ prajāpatiḥ /
analyzed: virāj vaiśvānaraḥ bāhyaḥ smaran antar prajāpatiḥ

original: pravilīne tu sarvasmin prājño 'vyākṛtam ucyate // SamUpad_I,17.64 //
analyzed: pravilīne tu sarvasmin prājñaḥ vyākṛtam ucyate

original: vācārambhaṇamātratvāt suṣuptāditrikaṃ tv asat /
analyzed: vācā ārambhaṇa mātra tvāt suṣupta ādi trikam tu asat

original: satyo jñaś cāham ity evaṃ satyasandho vimucyate // SamUpad_I,17.65 //
analyzed: satyaḥ jñaḥ ca aham iti evam satya sandhaḥ vimucyate

original: bhārūpatvād yathā bhānor nāhorātre tathaiva tu /
analyzed: bhā rūpa tvāt yathā bhānoḥ na ahar rātre tathā eva tu

original: jñānājñāne na me syātāṃ cidrūpatvāviśeṣataḥ // SamUpad_I,17.66 //
analyzed: jñāna ajñāne na me syātām cit rūpa tva aviśeṣataḥ

original: śāstrasyānatiśaṅkyatvād brahmaiva syām ahaṃ sadā /
analyzed: śāstrasya anatiśaṅkya tvāt brahmā eva syām aham sadā

original: brahmaṇo me na heyaṃ syād grāhyaṃ veti ca saṃsmaret // SamUpad_I,17.67 //
analyzed: brahmaṇaḥ me na heyam syāt grāhyam vā iti ca saṃsmaret

original: aham eva ca bhūteṣu sarveṣv eko nabho yathā /
analyzed: aham eva ca bhūteṣu sarveṣu ekaḥ nabhaḥ yathā

original: mayi sarvāṇi bhūtāni paśyann evaṃ na jāyate // SamUpad_I,17.68 //
analyzed: mayi sarvāṇi bhūtāni paśyan evam na jāyate

original: na bāhyaṃ madhyato vāntar vidyate 'nyat svataḥ kvacit /
analyzed: na bāhyam madhyatas vā antar vidyate svatas kvacid

original: abāhyāntaḥśruteḥ kiṃcit tasmāc chuddhaḥ svayaṃprabhaḥ // SamUpad_I,17.69 //
analyzed: abāhya antar śruteḥ kiṃcid tasmāt śuddhaḥ svayaṃprabhaḥ

original: netinetyādiśāstrebhyaḥ prapañcopaśamo 'dvayaḥ /
analyzed: na iti na ityādi śāstrebhyaḥ prapañca upaśamaḥ

original: avijñātādiśāstrāc ca naiva jñeyo hy ato 'nyathā // SamUpad_I,17.70 //
analyzed: avijñāta ādi śāstrāt ca nā eva jñeyaḥ hi atas nyathā

original: sarvasyātmāham eveti brahma ced viditaṃ param /
analyzed: sarvasya ātmā aham eva iti brahma ced viditam param

original: sa ātmā sarvabhūtānām ātmā hy eṣām iti śruteḥ // SamUpad_I,17.71 //
analyzed: saḥ ātmā sarva bhūtānām ātmā hi eṣām iti śruteḥ

original: jīvaś cet param ātmānaṃ svātmānaṃ devam añjasā /
analyzed: jīvaḥ ced param ātmānam sva ātmānam devam añjasā

original: devopāsyaḥ sa devānāṃ paśutvāc ca nivartate // SamUpad_I,17.72 //
analyzed: deva upāsyaḥ sa devānām paśu tvāt ca nivartate

original: aham eva sadātmajñaḥ śūnyas tv anyair yathāmbaram /
analyzed: aham eva sat ātma jñaḥ śūnyaḥ tu anyaiḥ yathā ambaram

original: ity evaṃ satyasaṃdhatvād asaddhātā na badhyate // SamUpad_I,17.73 //
analyzed: iti evam satya saṃdhā tvāt asat dhātā na badhyate

original: kṛpaṇās te 'nyathaivāto vidur brahma paraṃ hi ye /
analyzed: kṛpaṇāḥ te nyathā eva atas viduḥ brahma param hi ye

original: svarāḍ yo 'nanyadṛk svasthas tasya devā asan vaśe // SamUpad_I,17.74 //
analyzed: svarāj yaḥ nanyadṛś svasthaḥ tasya devāḥ asan vaśe

original: hitvā jātyādisaṃbandhaṃ vāco 'nyāḥ saha karmabhiḥ /
analyzed: hitvā jāti ādi saṃbandham vācaḥ nyāḥ saha karmabhiḥ

original: om ity evaṃ svam ātmānaṃ sarvaṃ śuddhaṃ prapadyatha // SamUpad_I,17.75 //
analyzed: om iti evam svam ātmānam sarvam śuddham prapadyatha

original: setuṃ sarvavyavasthānām ahorātrādivarjitam /
analyzed: setum sarva vyavasthānām ahar rātra ādi varjitam

original: tiryag ūrdhvam adhaḥ sarvaṃ sakṛjjyotir anāmayam // SamUpad_I,17.76 //
analyzed: tiryak ūrdhvam adhas sarvam sakṛt jyotiḥ anāmayam

original: dharmādharmavinirmuktaṃ bhūtabhavyāt kṛtākṛtāt /
analyzed: dharma adharma vinirmuktam bhūta bhavyāt kṛta akṛtāt

original: svam ātmānaṃ paraṃ vidyād vimuktaṃ sarvabandhanaiḥ // SamUpad_I,17.77 //
analyzed: svam ātmānam param vidyāt vimuktam sarva bandhanaiḥ

original: akurvan sarvakṛc chuddhas tiṣṭhann atyeti dhāvataḥ /
analyzed: a kurvan sarva kṛt śuddhaḥ tiṣṭhan atyeti dhāvataḥ

original: māyayā sarvaśaktitvād ajaḥ san bahudhā mataḥ // SamUpad_I,17.78 //
analyzed: māyayā sarva śakti tvāt ajaḥ san bahudhā mataḥ

original: rājavat sākṣimātratvāt saṃnidhyād bhrāmako yathā /
analyzed: rāja vat sākṣi mātra tvāt saṃnidhyāt bhrāmakaḥ yathā

original: bhrāmayañ jagad ātmāhaṃ niṣkriyo 'kārako 'dvayaḥ // SamUpad_I,17.79 //
analyzed: bhrāmayam jagat ātmā aham niṣkriyaḥ kārakaḥ

original: nirguṇaṃ niṣkriyaṃ nityaṃ nirdvandvaṃ yan nirāmayam /
analyzed: nirguṇam niṣkriyam nityam nirdvandvam yat nirāmayam

original: śuddhaṃ buddhaṃ tathā muktaṃ tad brahmāsmīti dhārayet // SamUpad_I,17.80 //
analyzed: śuddham buddham tathā muktam tat brahma asmi iti dhārayet

original: bandhaṃ mokṣaṃ ca sarvaṃ yata idam ubhayaṃ heyam ekaṃ dvayaṃ ca /
analyzed: bandham mokṣam ca sarvam yatas idam ubhayam heyam ekam dvayam ca

original: jñeyājñeyābhyatītaṃ paramam adhigataṃ tattvam ekaṃ viśuddham /
analyzed: jñeya ajñeya abhyatītam paramam adhigatam tattvam ekam viśuddham

original: vijñāyaitad yathāvac chrutimunigaditaṃ śokamohāv atītaḥ /
analyzed: vijñāya etat yathāvat śruti muni gaditam śoka mohau atītaḥ

original: sarvajñaḥ sarvakṛt syād bhavabhayarahito brāhmaṇo 'vāptakṛtyaḥ // SamUpad_I,17.81 //
analyzed: sarvajñaḥ sarva kṛt syāt bhava bhaya rahitaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ vā āpta kṛtyaḥ

original: na svayaṃ svasya nānyaś ca nānyasyātmā ca heyagaḥ /
analyzed: na svayam svasya na anyaḥ ca na anyasya ātmā ca heya gaḥ

original: upādeyo na cāpy evam iti samyaṅmatiḥ smṛtā // SamUpad_I,17.82 //
analyzed: upādeyaḥ na ca api evam iti samyak matiḥ smṛtā

original: ātmapratyāyikā hy eṣā sarvavedāntagocarā /
analyzed: ātma pratyāyikā hi eṣā sarva vedānta gocarā

original: jñātvaitāṃ hi vimucyante sarvasaṃsārabandhanaiḥ // SamUpad_I,17.83 //
analyzed: jñātvā etām hi vimucyante sarva saṃsāra bandhanaiḥ

original: rahasyaṃ sarvavedānāṃ devānāṃ cāpi yat param /
analyzed: rahasyam sarva vedānām devānām ca api yat param

original: pavitraṃ paramaṃ hy etat tad etat saṃprakāśitam // SamUpad_I,17.84 //
analyzed: pavitram paramam hi etat tat etat saṃprakāśitam

original: naitad deyam aśāntāya rahasyaṃ jñānam uttamam /
analyzed: na etat deyam aśāntāya rahasyam jñānam uttamam

original: viraktāya pradātavyaṃ śiṣyāyānugatāya ca // SamUpad_I,17.85 //
analyzed: viraktāya pradātavyam śiṣyāya anugatāya ca

original: dadataś cātmano jñānaṃ niṣkriyo 'nyo na vidyate /
analyzed: dadataḥ ca ātmanaḥ jñānam niṣkriyaḥ nyaḥ na vidyate

original: jñānam icchan bhavet tasmād yuktaḥ śiṣyaguṇaiḥ sadā // SamUpad_I,17.86 //
analyzed: jñānam icchan bhavet tasmāt yuktaḥ śiṣya guṇaiḥ sadā

original: jñānaṃ jñeyaṃ tathā jñātā yasmād anyan na vidyate /
analyzed: jñānam jñeyam tathā jñātā yasmāt anyat na vidyate

original: sarvajñaḥ sarvaśaktir yas tasmai jñānātmane namaḥ // SamUpad_I,17.87 //
analyzed: sarvajñaḥ sarva śaktiḥ yaḥ tasmai jñāna ātmane namaḥ

original: vidyayā tāritāḥ smo yair janmamṛtyumahodadhim /
analyzed: vidyayā tāritāḥ smaḥ yaiḥ janma mṛtyu mahā udadhim

original: sarvajñebhyo namas tebhyo gurubhyo 'jñānasaṃkulam // SamUpad_I,17.88 //
analyzed: sarvajñebhyaḥ namaḥ tebhyaḥ gurubhyaḥ jñāna saṃkulam

original: iti samyaṅmatiprakaraṇam // SamUpad_I,17 //
analyzed: iti samyaṅmati prakaraṇam

original: yenātmanā vilīyanta udbhavanti ca vṛttayaḥ /
analyzed: yena ātmanā vilīyante udbhavanti ca vṛttayaḥ

original: nityāvagataye tasmai namo dhīpratyayātmane // SamUpad_I,18.1 //
analyzed: nitya avagataye tasmai namaḥ dhī pratyaya ātmane

original: pramathya vajropamayuktisaṃbhṛtaiḥ śruter arātiñ śataśo vaco 'sibhiḥ /
analyzed: pramathya vajra upama yukti saṃbhṛtaiḥ śruteḥ arātim śataśas sibhiḥ

original: rarakṣa vedārthanidhiṃ viśāladhīr namo yatīndrāya guror garīyase // SamUpad_I,18.2 //
analyzed: rarakṣa veda artha nidhim viśāla dhīḥ namaḥ yati indrāya guroḥ garīyase

original: nityamuktaḥ sad evāsmīty evaṃ cen na bhaven matiḥ /
analyzed: nitya muktaḥ sat evā asmi iti evam ced na bhavet matiḥ

original: kimarthaṃ śrāvayaty evaṃ mātṛvac chrutir ādṛtā // SamUpad_I,18.3 //
analyzed: kimartham śrāvayati evam mātṛ vat śrutiḥ ādṛtā

original: siddhād evāham ity asmād yuṣmaddharmo niṣidhyate /
analyzed: siddhāt eva aham iti asmāt yuṣmad dharmaḥ niṣidhyate

original: rajjvām ivāhidhīr yuktyā tat tvam ityādiśāsanaiḥ // SamUpad_I,18.4 //
analyzed: rajjvām iva ahi dhīḥ yuktyā tat tvam iti ādi śāsanaiḥ

original: śāstraprāmāṇyato jñeyā dharmāder astitā yathā /
analyzed: śāstra prāmāṇyataḥ jñeyā dharma ādeḥ astitā yathā

original: viṣāpoho yathā dhyānād dhnutiḥ syāt pāpmanas tathā // SamUpad_I,18.5 //
analyzed: viṣa apohaḥ yathā dhyānāt dhnutiḥ syāt pāpmanaḥ tathā

original: sad brahmāhaṃ karomīti pratyayāv ātmasākṣikau /
analyzed: sat brahma aham karomi iti pratyayau ātma sākṣikau

original: tayor ajñānajasyaiva tyāgo yuktataro mataḥ // SamUpad_I,18.6 //
analyzed: tayoḥ ajñāna jasya eva tyāgaḥ yuktataraḥ mataḥ

original: sad asmīti pramāṇotthā dhīr anyā tannibhodbhavā /
analyzed: sat asmi iti pramāṇa utthā dhīḥ anyā tad nibha udbhavā

original: pratyakṣādinibhā vāpi bādhyate digbhramādivat // SamUpad_I,18.7 //
analyzed: pratyakṣa ādi nibhā vā api bādhyate diś bhrama ādi vat

original: kartā bhokteti yac chāstraṃ lokabuddhyanuvādi tat /
analyzed: kartā bhoktā iti yat śāstram loka buddhi anuvādi tat

original: sad asmīti śruter jātā bādhyate 'nyaitayaiva dhīḥ // SamUpad_I,18.8 //
analyzed: sat asmi iti śruteḥ jātā bādhyate nyaitayā eva dhīḥ

original: sad eva tvam asīty ukte nātmano muktatāṃ sthirām /
analyzed: sat eva tvam asi iti ukte na ātmanaḥ mukta tām sthirām

original: prapadyate prasaṃcakṣām ato yuktyānucintayet // SamUpad_I,18.9 //
analyzed: prapadyate prasaṃcakṣām atas yuktyā anucintayet

original: sakṛd uktaṃ na gṛhṇāti vākyārthajño 'pi yo bhavet /
analyzed: sakṛt uktam na gṛhṇāti vākya artha jñaḥ yaḥ bhavet

original: apekṣate 'ta evānyad avocāma dvayaṃ hi tat // SamUpad_I,18.10 //
analyzed: apekṣate te eva anyat avocāma dvayam hi tat

original: niyogo 'pratipannatvāt karmaṇāṃ sa yathā bhavet /
analyzed: niyogaḥ pratipanna tvāt karmaṇām sa yathā bhavet

original: aviruddho bhavet tāvad yāvat saṃvedyatādṛḍhā // SamUpad_I,18.11 //
analyzed: a viruddhaḥ bhavet tāvat yāvat saṃvedya tā dṛḍhā

original: ceṣṭitaṃ ca tathā mithyā svacchandaḥ pratipadyate /
analyzed: ceṣṭitam ca tathā mithyā svacchandaḥ pratipadyate

original: prasaṃkhyānam ataḥ kāryaṃ yāvad ātmānubhūyate // SamUpad_I,18.12 //
analyzed: prasaṃkhyānam atas kāryam yāvat ātmā anubhūyate

original: sad asmīti ca vijñānam akṣajo bādhate dhruvam /
analyzed: sat asmi iti ca vijñānam akṣajaḥ bādhate dhruvam

original: śabdotthaṃ dṛḍhasaṃskāro doṣaiś cākrṣyate bahiḥ // SamUpad_I,18.13 //
analyzed: śabda uttham dṛḍha saṃskāraḥ doṣaiḥ ca ākrṣyate bahis

original: śrutānumānajanmānau sāmānyaviṣayau yataḥ /
analyzed: śruta anumāna janmānau sāmānya viṣayau yatas

original: pratyayāv akṣajo 'vaśyaṃ viśeṣārtho nivārayet // SamUpad_I,18.14 //
analyzed: pratyayau akṣa jaḥ vaśyam viśeṣa arthaḥ nivārayet

original: vākyārthapratyayi kaścin nirduḥkho nopalabhyate /
analyzed: vākya artha pratyayi kaścid nirduḥkhaḥ nā upalabhyate

original: yadi vā dṛśyate kaścid vākyārthaśrutimātrataḥ // SamUpad_I,18.15 //
analyzed: yadi vā dṛśyate kaścid vākya artha śruti mātrataḥ

original: nirduḥkho 'tītadeheṣu kṛtabhāvo 'numīyate /
analyzed: nirduḥkhaḥ tīta deheṣu kṛta bhāvaḥ numīyate

original: caryā no 'śāstrasaṃvedyā syād aniṣṭaṃ tathā sati // SamUpad_I,18.16 //
analyzed: caryā no śāstra saṃvedyā syāt aniṣṭam tathā sati

original: sad asīti phalaṃ coktvā vidheyaṃ sādhanaṃ yataḥ /
analyzed: sat asi iti phalam ca uktvā vidheyam sādhanam yatas

original: na tad anyat prasaṃkhyānāt prasiddhārtham iheṣyate // SamUpad_I,18.17 //
analyzed: na tat anyat prasaṃkhyānāt prasiddha artham iha iṣyate

original: tasmād anubhavāyaiva prasaṃcakṣīta yatnataḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt anubhavāya eva prasaṃcakṣīta yatnataḥ

original: tyajan sādhanatatsādhyaviruddhaṃ śamanādimān // SamUpad_I,18.18 //
analyzed: tyajan sādhana tad sādhya viruddham śamana ādimān

original: naitad evaṃ rahasyānāṃ netinetyavasānataḥ /
analyzed: na etat evam rahasyānām na iti na iti avasānataḥ

original: kriyāsādhyaṃ purā śrāvyaṃ na mokṣo nityasiddhataḥ // SamUpad_I,18.19 //
analyzed: kriyā sādhyam purā śrāvyam na mokṣaḥ nitya siddhataḥ

original: putraduḥkhaṃ yathādhyastaṃ pitrāduḥkhe sva ātmani /
analyzed: putra duḥkham yathā adhyastam pitrā aduḥkhe sve ātmani

original: ahaṃkartrā tathādhyastaṃ nityāduḥkhe sva ātmani // SamUpad_I,18.20 //
analyzed: ahaṃkartrā tathā adhyastam nitya aduḥkhe sve ātmani

original: so 'dhyāso neti netīti prāptavat pratiṣidhyate /
analyzed: saḥ dhyāsaḥ na iti na iti iti prāpta vat pratiṣidhyate

original: bhūyo 'dhyāsavidhiḥ kaścit kutaścin nopapadyate // SamUpad_I,18.21 //
analyzed: bhūyas dhyāsa vidhiḥ kaścid kutaścid nā upapadyate

original: ātmanīha yathādhyāsaḥ pratiṣedhas tathaiva ca /
analyzed: ātmani iha yathā adhyāsaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ tathā eva ca

original: malādhyāsaniṣedhau khe kriyete ca yathābudhaiḥ // SamUpad_I,18.22 //
analyzed: mala adhyāsa niṣedhau khe kriyete ca yathā budhaiḥ

original: prāptaś cet pratiṣidhyeta mokṣo 'nityo bhaved dhruvam /
analyzed: prāptaḥ ced pratiṣidhyeta mokṣaḥ nityaḥ bhavet dhruvam

original: ato 'prāptaniṣedho 'yaṃ divy agnicayanādivat // SamUpad_I,18.23 //
analyzed: prāpta niṣedhaḥ yam divi agni cayana ādi vat

original: saṃbhāvyo gocare śabdaḥ pratyayo vā na cānyathā /
analyzed: saṃbhāvyaḥ gocare śabdaḥ pratyayaḥ vā na ca anyathā

original: na saṃbhāvyau tadātmatvād ahaṃkartus tathaiva ca // SamUpad_I,18.24 //
analyzed: na saṃbhāvyau tad ātma tvāt ahaṃkartuḥ tathā eva ca

original: ahaṃkartrātmani nyastaṃ caitanye kartṛtādi yat /
analyzed: ahaṃkartṛ ātmani nyastam caitanye kartṛ tā ādi yat

original: neti netīti tat sarvaṃ sāhaṃkartrā niṣidhyate // SamUpad_I,18.25 //
analyzed: na iti na iti iti tat sarvam sa ahaṃkartrā niṣidhyate

original: upalabdhiḥ svayaṃjyotir dṛśiḥ pratyaksadakriyaḥ /
sākṣāt sarvāntaraḥ sākṣī cetā nityo 'guṇo 'dvayaḥ // SamUpad_I,18.26 //
analyzed: sākṣāt sarva antaraḥ sākṣī cetā nityaḥ guṇaḥ dvayaḥ

original: saṃnidhau sarvadā tasya syāt tadābho 'bhimānakṛt /
analyzed: saṃnidhau sarvadā tasya syāt tad ābhaḥ bhimāna kṛt

original: ātmātmīyaṃ dvayaṃ cātaḥ syād ahaṃmamagocaraḥ // SamUpad_I,18.27 //
analyzed: ātma ātmīyam dvayam ca atas syāt aham mama gocaraḥ

original: jātikarmādimattvād dhi tasmiñ śabdās tv ahaṃkṛti /
analyzed: jāti karma ādimat tvāt hi tasmin śabdāḥ tu ahaṃkṛti

original: na kaścid vartate śabdas tadabhāvāt sva ātmani // SamUpad_I,18.28 //
analyzed: na kaścid vartate śabdaḥ tad abhāvāt sve ātmani

original: ābhāso yatra tatraiva śabdāḥ pratyagdṛśiṃ sthitāḥ /
analyzed: ābhāsaḥ yatra tatra eva śabdāḥ pratyak dṛśim sthitāḥ

original: lakṣayeyur na sākṣāt tam abhidadhyuḥ kathaṃcana // SamUpad_I,18.29 //
analyzed: lakṣayeyuḥ na sākṣāt tam abhidadhyuḥ kathaṃcana

original: nahy ajātyādimān kaścid arthaḥ śabdair nirūpyate /
analyzed: nahi ajāti ādimān kaścid arthaḥ śabdaiḥ nirūpyate

original: ātmābhāso yato 'haṃkṛd ātmaśabdais tathocyate // SamUpad_I,18.30 //
analyzed: ātma ābhāsaḥ yatas haṃkṛt ātma śabdaiḥ tathā ucyate

original: ulmukādau yathāgnyarthāḥ parārthatvān na cāñjasā /
analyzed: ulmuka ādau yathā agni arthāḥ parārtha tvāt na ca añjasā

original: mukhād anyo mukhābhāso yathādarśānukārataḥ // SamUpad_I,18.31 //
analyzed: mukhāt anyaḥ mukha ābhāsaḥ yathā ādarśa anukārataḥ

original: ābhāsān mukham apy evam ādarśānanuvartanāt /
analyzed: ābhāsāt mukham api evam ādarśa an anuvartanāt

original: ahaṃkṛty ātmanirbhāso mukhābhāsavad iṣyate // SamUpad_I,18.32 //
analyzed: ahaṃkṛtī ātma nirbhāsaḥ mukha ābhāsa vat iṣyate

original: mukhavat sthita ātmānyo 'viviktau tau tathaiva ca /
analyzed: mukha vat sthitaḥ ātmā anyaḥ viviktau tau tathā eva ca

original: saṃsārī ca sa ity eka ābhāso yas tv ahaṃkṛti // SamUpad_I,18.33 //
analyzed: saṃsārī ca saḥ iti ekaḥ ābhāsaḥ yaḥ tu ahaṃkṛti

original: vastu cchāyā smṛter anyan mādhuryādi ca kāraṇam /
analyzed: vastu chāyā smṛteḥ anyat mādhurya ādi ca kāraṇam

original: jñaikadeśo vikāro vā tadābhāsāśrayaḥ pare // SamUpad_I,18.34 //
analyzed: jñā eka deśaḥ vikāraḥ vā tad ābhāsa āśrayaḥ pare

original: ahaṃkartaiva saṃsārī svatantra iti kecana /
analyzed: ahaṃkartā eva saṃsārī svatantraḥ iti kecana

original: ahaṃkārādisaṃtānaḥ saṃsārī nānvayi pṛthak // SamUpad_I,18.35 //
analyzed: ahaṃkāra ādi saṃtānaḥ saṃsārī na anvayi pṛthak

original: ity evaṃ saugatā āhus tatra nyāyo vicāryatām /
analyzed: iti evam saugatāḥ āhuḥ tatra nyāyaḥ vicāryatām

original: saṃsāriṇāṃ kathā tv āstāṃ prakṛtaṃ tv adhunocyate // SamUpad_I,18.36 //
analyzed: saṃsāriṇām kathā tu āstām prakṛtam tu adhunā ucyate

original: mukhābhāso ya ādarśe dharmo nānyatarasya saḥ /
analyzed: mukha ābhāsaḥ yaḥ ādarśe dharmaḥ na anyatarasya saḥ

original: dvayor ekasya ced dharmo viyukte 'nyatare bhavet // SamUpad_I,18.37 //
analyzed: dvayoḥ ekasya ced dharmaḥ viyukte nyatare bhavet

original: mukhena vyapadeśāt sa mukhasyaiveti cen matam /
analyzed: mukhena vyapadeśāt sa mukhasya evā iti ced matam

original: nādarśānuvidhānāc ca mukhe saty avibhāvataḥ // SamUpad_I,18.38 //
analyzed: na ādarśa anuvidhānāt ca mukhe sati avibhāvataḥ

original: dvayor eveti cet tan na dvayor evāpy adarśanāt /
analyzed: dvayoḥ eva iti ced tat na dvayoḥ eva api adarśanāt

original: adṛṣṭasya sato dṛṣṭiḥ syād rāhoś candrasūryayoḥ // SamUpad_I,18.39 //
analyzed: adṛṣṭasya sataḥ dṛṣṭiḥ syāt rāhoḥ candra sūryayoḥ

original: rāhoḥ prāg eva vastutvaṃ siddhaṃ śāstrapramāṇataḥ /
analyzed: rāhoḥ prāk eva vastu tvam siddham śāstra pramāṇataḥ

original: chāyāpakṣe tv avastutvaṃ tasya syāt pūrvayuktitaḥ // SamUpad_I,18.40 //
analyzed: chāyā pakṣe tu avastu tvam tasya syāt pūrva yuktitaḥ

original: chāyākrānter niṣedho 'yaṃ na tu vastutvasādhakaḥ /
na hy arthāntaraniṣṭhaṃ sad vākyam arthāntaraṃ vadet // SamUpad_I,18.41 //
analyzed: na hi artha antara niṣṭham sat vākyam artha antaram vadet

original: mādhuryādi ca yat kāryam uṣṇadravyādyasevanāt /
analyzed: mādhurya ādi ca yat kāryam uṣṇa dravya ādi asevanāt

original: chāyāyā na tv adṛṣṭatvād apām eva ca darśanāt // SamUpad_I,18.42 //
analyzed: chāyāyāḥ na tu a dṛṣṭa tvāt apām eva ca darśanāt

original: ātmābhāsāśrayāś caivaṃ mukhābhāsāśrayā yathā /
analyzed: ātma ābhāsa āśrayāḥ ca evam mukha ābhāsa āśrayāḥ yathā

original: gamyate śāstrayuktibhyām ābhāsāsattvam eva ca // SamUpad_I,18.43 //
analyzed: gamyate śāstra yuktibhyām ābhāsa asattvam eva ca

original: na dṛśer avikāritvād ābhāsasyāpy avastutaḥ /
analyzed: na dṛśeḥ avikāri tvāt ābhāsasya api avastutaḥ

original: nācititvād ahaṃkartuḥ kasya saṃsāritā bhavet // SamUpad_I,18.44 //
analyzed: na aciti tvāt ahaṃkartuḥ kasya saṃsāritā bhavet

original: avidyāmātra evātaḥ saṃsāro 'stv avivekataḥ /
analyzed: avidyā mātraḥ eva atas saṃsāraḥ astu avivekataḥ

original: kūṭasthenātmanā nityam ātmavān ātmanīva saḥ // SamUpad_I,18.45 //
analyzed: kūṭasthena ātmanā nityam ātmavān ātmani iva saḥ

original: rajjusarpo yathā rajjvā sātmakaḥ prāg vivekataḥ /
analyzed: rajju sarpaḥ yathā rajjvā sātmakaḥ prāk vivekataḥ

original: avastusann api hy eṣa kūṭasthenātmanā tathā // SamUpad_I,18.46 //
analyzed: a vastu san api hi eṣa kūṭasthena ātmanā tathā

original: ātmābhāsāśrayaś cātmā pratyayaiḥ svair vikāravān /
analyzed: ātma ābhāsa āśrayaḥ ca ātmā pratyayaiḥ svaiḥ vikāravān

original: sukhī duḥkhī ca saṃsārī nitya eveti kecana // SamUpad_I,18.47 //
analyzed: sukhī duḥkhī ca saṃsārī nityaḥ evā iti kecana

original: ātmābhāsāparijñānād yāthātmyena vimohitāḥ /
analyzed: ātma ābhāsa aparijñānāt yāthātmyena vimohitāḥ

original: ahaṃkartāram ātmeti manyante te nirāgamāḥ // SamUpad_I,18.48 //
analyzed: ahaṃkartāram ātmā iti manyante te nirāgamāḥ

original: saṃsāro vastusaṃs teṣāṃ kartṛbhoktṛtvalakṣaṇaḥ /
analyzed: saṃsāraḥ vastu san teṣām kartṛ bhoktṛ tva lakṣaṇaḥ

original: ātmābhāsāśrayājñānāt saṃsaranty avivekataḥ // SamUpad_I,18.49 //
analyzed: ātma ābhāsa āśraya ajñānāt saṃsaranti avivekataḥ

original: caitanyābhāsatā buddher ātmanas tatsvarūpatā /
analyzed: caitanya ābhāsa tā buddheḥ ātmanaḥ tad svarūpa tā

original: syāc cet taṃ jñānaśabdaiś ca vedaḥ śāstīti yujyate // SamUpad_I,18.50 //
analyzed: syāt ced tam jñāna śabdaiḥ ca vedaḥ śāsti iti yujyate

original: prakṛtipratyayārthau yau bhinnāv ekāśrayau yathā /
analyzed: prakṛti pratyaya arthau yau bhinnau eka āśrayau yathā

original: karoti gacchatītyādau dṛṣṭau lokaprasiddhitaḥ // SamUpad_I,18.51 //
analyzed: karoti gacchati ityādau dṛṣṭau loka prasiddhitaḥ

original: nānayor dvyāśrayatvaṃ tu loke dṛṣṭaṃ smṛtau tathā /
analyzed: na anayoḥ dvi āśraya tvam tu loke dṛṣṭam smṛtau tathā

original: jānātyartheṣu ko hetur dvyāśrayatve nigadyatām // SamUpad_I,18.52 //
analyzed: jānāti artheṣu kaḥ hetuḥ dvi āśraya tve nigadyatām

original: ātmābhāsas tu tiṅvācyo dhātvarthaś ca dhiyaḥ kriyā /
analyzed: ātma ābhāsaḥ tu tiṅ vācyaḥ dhātvarthaḥ ca dhiyaḥ kriyā

original: ubhayaṃ cāvivekena jānātīty ucyate mṛṣā // SamUpad_I,18.53 //
analyzed: ubhayam ca avivekena jānāti iti ucyate mṛṣā

original: na buddher avabodho 'sti nātmano vidyate kriyā /
analyzed: na buddheḥ avabodhaḥ sti na ātmanaḥ vidyate kriyā

original: ato nānyatarasyāpi jānātīti ca yujyate // SamUpad_I,18.54 //
analyzed: atas na anyatarasya api jānāti iti ca yujyate

original: nāpy ato bhāvaśabdena jñaptir ity api yujyate /
analyzed: nā api atas bhāva śabdena jñaptiḥ iti api yujyate

original: na hy ātmā vikriyāmātro nitya ātmetiśāsanāt // SamUpad_I,18.55 //
analyzed: na hi ātmā vikriyā mātraḥ nityaḥ ātmā iti śāsanāt

original: na buddher buddhivācyatvaṃ karaṇaṃ na hy akartṛkam /
analyzed: na buddheḥ buddhi vācya tvam karaṇam na hi akartṛkam

original: nāpi jñāyata ity evaṃ karmaśabdair nirucyate // SamUpad_I,18.56 //
analyzed: na api jñāyate iti evam karma śabdaiḥ nirucyate

original: na yeṣām eka evātmā nirduḥkho 'vikriyaḥ sadā /
analyzed: na yeṣām ekaḥ eva ātmā nirduḥkhaḥ vikriyaḥ sadā

original: teṣāṃ syāc chabdavācyatvaṃ jñeyatvaṃ cātmanaḥ sadā // SamUpad_I,18.57 //
analyzed: teṣām syāt śabda vācya tvam jñeya tvam ca ātmanaḥ sadā

original: yadāhaṃkartur ātmatvaṃ tadā śabdārthamukhyatā /
analyzed: yadā ahaṃkartuḥ ātma tvam tadā śabda artha mukhya tā

original: nāśanāyādimattvāt tu śrutau tasyātmateṣyate // SamUpad_I,18.58 //
analyzed: na aśanāya ādimat tvāt tu śrutau tasya ātmatā iṣyate

original: hanta tarhi na mukhyārtho nāpi gauṇaḥ kathaṃcana /
analyzed: hanta tarhi na mukhya arthaḥ nā api gauṇaḥ kathaṃcana

original: jānātītyādiśabdasya gatir vācyā tathāpi tu // SamUpad_I,18.59 //
analyzed: jānāti ityādi śabdasya gatiḥ vācyā tathā api tu

original: śabdānām ayathārthatve vedasyāpy apramāṇatā /
analyzed: śabdānām ayathā artha tve vedasya api apramāṇa tā

original: sā ca neṣṭā tato grāhyā gatir asya prasiddhitaḥ // SamUpad_I,18.60 //
analyzed: sā ca nā iṣṭā tatas grāhyā gatiḥ asya prasiddhitaḥ

original: prasiddhir mūḍhalokasya yadi grāhyā nirātmatā /
analyzed: prasiddhiḥ mūḍha lokasya yadi grāhyā nirātma tā

original: lokāyatikasiddhāntaḥ sa cāniṣṭaḥ prasajyate // SamUpad_I,18.61 //
analyzed: lokāyatika siddhāntaḥ sa ca aniṣṭaḥ prasajyate

original: abhiyuktaprasiddhiś cet pūrvavad durvivekatā /
analyzed: abhiyukta prasiddhiḥ ced pūrvavat durviveka tā

original: gatiśūnyaṃ na vedo 'yaṃ pramāṇaṃ saṃvadaty uta // SamUpad_I,18.62 //
analyzed: gati śūnyam na vedaḥ yam pramāṇam saṃvadati uta

original: ādarśamukhasāmānyaṃ mukhasyeṣṭaṃ hi mānavaiḥ /
analyzed: ādarśa mukha sāmānyam mukhasya iṣṭam hi mānavaiḥ

original: mukhasya pratibimbo hi mukhākāreṇa dṛśyate // SamUpad_I,18.63 //
analyzed: mukhasya pratibimbaḥ hi mukha ākāreṇa dṛśyate

original: yatra yasyāvabhāsas tu tayor evāvivekataḥ /
analyzed: yatra yasya avabhāsaḥ tu tayoḥ eva avivekataḥ

original: jānātīti kriyāṃ sarvo loko vakti svabhavataḥ // SamUpad_I,18.64 //
analyzed: jānāti iti kriyām sarvaḥ lokaḥ vakti sva bhavataḥ

original: buddheḥ kartṛtvam adhyasya jānātīti jña ucyate /
analyzed: buddheḥ kartṛ tvam adhyasya jānāti iti jñaḥ ucyate

original: tathā caitanyam adhyasya jñatvaṃ buddher ihocyate // SamUpad_I,18.65 //
analyzed: tathā caitanyam adhyasya jña tvam buddheḥ iha ucyate

original: svarūpaṃ cātmano jñānaṃ nityaṃ jyotiḥ śruter yataḥ /
analyzed: svarūpam ca ātmanaḥ jñānam nityam jyotiḥ śruteḥ yatas

original: na buddhyā kriyate tasmān nātmanānyena vā sadā // SamUpad_I,18.66 //
analyzed: na buddhyā kriyate tasmāt na ātmanā anyena vā sadā

original: dehe 'haṃpratyayo yadvaj jānātīti ca laukikāḥ /
analyzed: dehe haṃpratyayaḥ yadvat jānāti iti ca laukikāḥ

original: vadanti jñānakartṛtvaṃ tadvad buddhes tathātmanaḥ // SamUpad_I,18.67 //
analyzed: vadanti jñāna kartṛ tvam tadvat buddheḥ tathā ātmanaḥ

original: bauddhais tu pratyayair evaṃ kriyamāṇaiś ca cinnibhaiḥ /
analyzed: bauddhaiḥ tu pratyayaiḥ evam kriyamāṇaiḥ ca cit nibhaiḥ

original: mohitāḥ kriyate jñānam ity āhus tārkikā janāḥ // SamUpad_I,18.68 //
analyzed: mohitāḥ kriyate jñānam iti āhuḥ tārkikāḥ janāḥ

original: tasmāj jñābhāsabuddhīnām avivekāt pravartitāḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt jña ābhāsa buddhīnām avivekāt pravartitāḥ

original: jānātītyādiśabdaś ca pratyayo yā ca tatsmṛtiḥ // SamUpad_I,18.69 //
analyzed: jānāti ityādi śabdaḥ ca pratyayaḥ yā ca tad smṛtiḥ

original: ādarśānuvidhāyitvaṃ chāyāyā asyate mukhe /
analyzed: ādarśa anuvidhāyi tvam chāyāyāḥ asyate mukhe

original: buddhidharmānukāritvaṃ jñābhāsasya tatheṣyate // SamUpad_I,18.70 //
analyzed: buddhi dharma anukāri tvam jñā ābhāsasya tathā iṣyate

original: buddhes tu pratyayās tasmād ātmābhāsena dīpitāḥ /
analyzed: buddheḥ tu pratyayāḥ tasmāt ātma ābhāsena dīpitāḥ

original: grāhakā iva bhāsante dahantīvolmukādayaḥ // SamUpad_I,18.71 //
analyzed: grāhakāḥ iva bhāsante dahanti iva ulmuka ādayaḥ

original: svayam evāvabhāsyante grāhakāḥ svayam eva ca /
analyzed: svayam eva avabhāsyante grāhakāḥ svayam eva ca

original: ity evaṃ grāhakāstitvaṃ pratiṣedhanti saugatāḥ // SamUpad_I,18.72 //
analyzed: iti evam grāhaka astitvam pratiṣedhanti saugatāḥ

original: yady evaṃ nānyadṛśyās te kiṃ tadvāraṇam ucyatām /
analyzed: yadi evam na anya dṛśyāḥ te kim tad vāraṇam ucyatām

original: bhāvābhāvau hi teṣāṃ yau nānyagrāhyau sadā yadi // SamUpad_I,18.73 //
analyzed: bhāva abhāvau hi teṣām yau na anya grāhyau sadā yadi

original: anvayī grāhakas teṣām ity etad api tatsamam /
analyzed: anvayī grāhakaḥ teṣām iti etat api tad samam

original: acititvasya tulyatvād anyasmin grāhake sati // SamUpad_I,18.74 //
analyzed: aciti tvasya tulya tvāt anyasmin grāhake sati

original: adhyakṣasya samīpe tu siddhiḥ syād iti cen matam /
analyzed: adhyakṣasya samīpe tu siddhiḥ syāt iti ced matam

original: nādhyakṣe 'nupakāritvād anyatrāpi prasaṅgataḥ // SamUpad_I,18.75 //
analyzed: na adhyakṣe n upakāri tvāt anyatra api prasaṅgataḥ

original: arthī duḥkhī ca yaḥ śrotā sa tv adhyakṣo 'thavetaraḥ /
analyzed: arthī duḥkhī ca yaḥ śrotā sa tu

original: adhyakṣasya ca duḥkhitvam arthitvaṃ ca na te matam // SamUpad_I,18.76 //
analyzed: adhyakṣasya ca duḥkhi tvam arthi tvam ca na te matam

original: kartādhyakṣaṃ sad asmīti naiva sadgraham arhati /
analyzed: kartā adhyakṣam sat asmi iti na eva sadgraham arhati

original: sad evāsīti mithyoktiḥ śruter api na yujyate // SamUpad_I,18.77 //
analyzed: sat evā asi iti mithyā uktiḥ śruteḥ api na yujyate

original: avivicyobhayaṃ vakti śrutiś cet syād grahas tathā /
analyzed: a vivicya ubhayam vakti śrutiḥ ced syāt grahaḥ tathā

original: asmadas tu vivicyaiva tvam eveti vaded yadi // SamUpad_I,18.78 //
analyzed: asmadaḥ tu vivicya eva tvam evā iti vadet yadi

original: pratyayānvayiniṣṭhatvam ukto doṣaḥ prasajyate /
analyzed: pratyaya anvayi niṣṭha tvam uktaḥ doṣaḥ prasajyate

original: tvam ity adhyakṣaniṣṭhaś ced ahamadhyakṣayoḥ katham // SamUpad_I,18.79 //
analyzed: tvam iti adhyakṣa niṣṭhaḥ ced aham adhyakṣayoḥ katham

original: saṃbandho vācya evātra yena tvam iti lakṣayet /
analyzed: saṃbandhaḥ vācyaḥ eva atra yena tvam iti lakṣayet

original: draṣṭṛdṛśyatvasaṃbandho yady adhyakṣe 'kriye katham // SamUpad_I,18.80 //
analyzed: draṣṭṛ dṛśya tva saṃbandhaḥ yadi adhyakṣe kriye katham

original: akriyatve 'pi tādātmyam adhyakṣasya bhaved yadi /
analyzed: akriya tve pi tādātmyam adhyakṣasya bhavet yadi

original: ātmādhyakṣo mamāstīti saṃbandhāgrahaṇe na dhīḥ // SamUpad_I,18.81 //
analyzed: ātma adhyakṣaḥ mama asti iti saṃbandha agrahaṇe na dhīḥ

original: saṃbandhagrahaṇaṃ śāstrād iti cen manyase na hi /
analyzed: saṃbandha grahaṇam śāstrāt iti ced manyase na hi

original: pūrvoktāḥ syus tridhā doṣā graho vā syān mameti ca // SamUpad_I,18.82 //
analyzed: pūrva uktāḥ syuḥ tridhā doṣāḥ grahaḥ vā syāt mama iti ca

original: adṛśir dṛśirūpeṇa bhāti buddhir yadā sadā /
analyzed: adṛśiḥ dṛśi rūpeṇa bhāti buddhiḥ yadā sadā

original: pratyayā api tasyāḥ syus taptāyovisphuliṅgavat // SamUpad_I,18.83 //
analyzed: pratyayāḥ api tasyāḥ syuḥ tapta ayaḥ visphuliṅga vat

original: ābhāsas tadabhāvaś ca dṛśeḥ sīmno na cānyathā /
analyzed: ābhāsaḥ tad abhāvaḥ ca dṛśeḥ sīmnaḥ na ca anyathā

original: lokasya yuktitaḥ syātāṃ tadgrahaś ca tathā sati // SamUpad_I,18.84 //
analyzed: lokasya yuktitaḥ syātām tad grahaḥ ca tathā sati

original: nanv evaṃ dṛśisaṃkrāntir ayaḥpiṇḍe 'gnivad bhavet /
analyzed: nanu evam dṛśi saṃkrāntiḥ ayaḥ piṇḍe gni vat bhavet

original: mukhābhāsavad ity etad ādarśe tan nirākṛtam // SamUpad_I,18.85 //
analyzed: mukha ābhāsa vat iti etat ādarśe tat nirākṛtam

original: kṛṣṇāyo rohitābhāsam ity etad dṛṣṭam ucyate /
analyzed: kṛṣṇa ayaḥ rohita ābhāsam iti etat dṛṣṭam ucyate

original: dṛṣṭadārṣṭāntatulyatvaṃ na tu sarvātmanā kvacit // SamUpad_I,18.86 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭa dārṣṭānta tulya tvam na tu sarva ātmanā kvacid

original: tathaiva cetanābhāsaṃ cittaṃ caitanyavad bhavet /
analyzed: tathā eva cetanā ābhāsam cittam caitanya vat bhavet

original: mukhābhāso yathādarśa ābhāsaś codito mṛṣā // SamUpad_I,18.87 //
analyzed: mukha ābhāsaḥ yathā ādarśaḥ ābhāsaḥ coditaḥ mṛṣā

original: cittaṃ cetanam ity etac chāstrayuktivivarjitam /
analyzed: cittam cetanam iti etat śāstra yukti vivarjitam

original: dehasyāpi prasaṅgaḥ syāc cakṣurādes tathaiva ca // SamUpad_I,18.88 //
analyzed: dehasya api prasaṅgaḥ syāt cakṣuḥ ādeḥ tathā eva ca

original: tad apy astv iti cet tan na lokāyatikasaṃgateḥ /
analyzed: tat api astu iti ced tat na lokāyatika saṃgateḥ

original: na ca dhīr dṛśir asmīti yady ābhāso na cetasi // SamUpad_I,18.89 //
analyzed: na ca dhīḥ dṛśiḥ asmi iti yadi ābhāsaḥ na cetasi

original: sad asmīti dhiyo 'bhāve vyarthaṃ syāt tat tvam asy api /
analyzed: sat asmi iti dhiyaḥ bhāve vyartham syāt tat tvam asi api

original: yuṣmadasmadvivekajñe syād arthavad idaṃ vacaḥ // SamUpad_I,18.90 //
analyzed: yuṣmad asmad viveka jñe syāt arthavat idam vacaḥ

original: mamedaṃpratyayau jñeyau yuṣmady eva na saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: mama idaṃpratyayau jñeyau yuṣmadi eva na saṃśayaḥ

original: aham ity asmadīṣṭaḥ syād ayam asmīti cobhayoḥ // SamUpad_I,18.91 //
analyzed: aham iti asmadīṣṭaḥ syāt ayam asmi iti ca ubhayoḥ

original: anyonyāpekṣayā teṣāṃ pradhānaguṇateṣyate /
analyzed: anyonya apekṣayā teṣām pradhāna guṇa tā iṣyate

original: viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyatvaṃ tathā grāhyaṃ hi yuktitaḥ // SamUpad_I,18.92 //
analyzed: viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya tvam tathā grāhyam hi yuktitaḥ

original: mamedaṃ dvayam apy etan madhyamasya viśeṣaṇam /
analyzed: mama idam dvayam api etat madhyamasya viśeṣaṇam

original: dhanī gomān yathā tadvad deho 'haṃkartur eva ca // SamUpad_I,18.93 //
analyzed: dhanī gomān yathā tadvat dehaḥ haṃkartuḥ eva ca

original: buddhyārūḍhaṃ sadā sarvaṃ sāhaṃkartrā ca sākṣiṇaḥ /
analyzed: buddhi ārūḍham sadā sarvam sa ahaṃkartrā ca sākṣiṇaḥ

original: tasmāt sarvāvabhāso jñaḥ kiṃcid apy aspṛśan sadā // SamUpad_I,18.94 //
analyzed: tasmāt sarva avabhāsaḥ jñaḥ kiṃcid api a spṛśan sadā

original: pratilomam idaṃ sarvaṃ yathoktaṃ lokabuddhitaḥ /
analyzed: pratilomam idam sarvam yathā uktam loka buddhitaḥ

original: avivekadhiyām asti nāsti sarvaṃ vivekinām // SamUpad_I,18.95 //
analyzed: a viveka dhiyām asti nā asti sarvam vivekinām

original: anvayavyatirekau hi padārthasya padasya ca /
analyzed: anvaya vyatirekau hi padārthasya padasya ca

original: syād etad aham ity atra yuktir evāvadhāraṇe // SamUpad_I,18.96 //
analyzed: syāt etat aham iti atra yuktiḥ eva avadhāraṇe

original: nādrākṣam aham iti asmin suṣupte 'nyan manāg api /
analyzed: na adrākṣam aham iti asmin suṣupte manāk api

original: na vārayati dṛṣṭiṃ svāṃ pratyayaṃ tu niṣedhati // SamUpad_I,18.97 //
analyzed: na vārayati dṛṣṭim svām pratyayam tu niṣedhati

original: svayaṃjyotir na hi draṣṭur ity evaṃ saṃvido 'stitām /
analyzed: svayam jyotiḥ na hi draṣṭuḥ iti evam saṃvidaḥ stitām

original: kauṭasthyaṃ ca tathā tasyāḥ pratyayasya ca luptatām /
analyzed: kauṭasthyam ca tathā tasyāḥ pratyayasya ca lupta tām

original: svayam evābravīc chāstraṃ pratyayāvagatī pṛthak // SamUpad_I,18.98 //
analyzed: svayam evā bravīt śāstram pratyaya avagatī pṛthak

original: evaṃ vijñātavākyārthe śrutilokaprasiddhitaḥ /
analyzed: evam vijñāta vākya arthe śruti loka prasiddhitaḥ

original: śrutis tat tvam asīty āha śrotur mohāpanuttaye // SamUpad_I,18.99 //
analyzed: śrutiḥ tat tvam asi iti āha śrotuḥ moha apanuttaye

original: brahmā dāśarather yadvad uktyaivāpānudat tamaḥ /
analyzed: brahmā dāśaratheḥ yadvat uktyā evā apānudat tamaḥ

original: tasya viṣṇutvasaṃbodhe na yatnāntaram ūcivān // SamUpad_I,18.100 //
analyzed: tasya viṣṇu tva saṃbodhe na yatna antaram ūcivān

original: ahaṃśabdasya yā niṣṭhā jyotiṣi pratyagātmani /
analyzed: ahaṃśabdasya yā niṣṭhā jyotiṣi pratyagātmani

original: saivoktā sad asīty evaṃ phalaṃ tatra vimuktatā // SamUpad_I,18.101 //
analyzed: sā eva uktā sat asi iti evam phalam tatra vimukta tā

original: śrutamātre na cet tat syāt kāryaṃ tatra bhaved dhruvam /
analyzed: śruta mātre na ced tat syāt kāryam tatra bhavet dhruvam

original: vyavahārāt purāpīṣṭaḥ sadbhāvaḥ svayam ātmanaḥ // SamUpad_I,18.102 //
analyzed: vyavahārāt purā api iṣṭaḥ sadbhāvaḥ svayam ātmanaḥ

original: aśanāyādinirmuktyai tatkālā jāyate pramā /
analyzed: aśanāya ādi nirmuktyai tad kālā jāyate pramā

original: tattvamasyādivākyārthe triṣu kāleṣv asaṃśayaḥ // SamUpad_I,18.103 //
analyzed: tattvamasi ādi vākya arthe triṣu kāleṣu asaṃśayaḥ

original: pratibandhavihīnatvāt svayaṃ cānubhavātmanaḥ /
analyzed: pratibandha vihīna tvāt svayam ca anubhava ātmanaḥ

original: jāyetaiva pramā tatra svātmany eva na saṃśayaḥ // SamUpad_I,18.104 //
analyzed: jāyeta eva pramā tatra sva ātmani eva na saṃśayaḥ

original: kiṃ sad evāham asmīti kiṃ vānyat pratipadyate /
analyzed: kim sat eva aham asmi iti kim vā anyat pratipadyate

original: sad eva ced ahaṃśabdaḥ satā mukhyārtha iṣyatām // SamUpad_I,18.105 //
analyzed: sat eva ced ahaṃśabdaḥ satā mukhya arthaḥ iṣyatām

original: anyac cet sadahaṃgrāhapratipattir mṛṣaiva sā /
analyzed: anyat ced sat ahaṃgrāha pratipattiḥ mṛṣā eva sā

original: tasmān mukhyagrahe nāsti vāraṇāvagater iha // SamUpad_I,18.106 //
analyzed: tasmāt mukhya grahe na asti vāraṇa avagateḥ iha

original: pratyayī pratyayaś caiva yadābhāsau tadarthatā /
analyzed: pratyayī pratyayaḥ ca eva yad ābhāsau tad artha tā

original: tayor acitimattvāc ca caitanye kalpyate phalam // SamUpad_I,18.107 //
analyzed: tayoḥ acitimat tvāt ca caitanye kalpyate phalam

original: kūṭasthe 'pi phalaṃ yogyaṃ rājanīva jayādikam /
analyzed: kūṭasthe pi phalam yogyam rājani iva jaya ādikam

original: tadanātmatvahetubhyāṃ kriyāyāḥ pratyayasya ca // SamUpad_I,18.108 //
analyzed: tad anātma tva hetubhyām kriyāyāḥ pratyayasya ca

original: ādarśas tu yadābhāso mukhākāraḥ sa eva saḥ /
analyzed: ādarśaḥ tu yad ābhāsaḥ mukha ākāraḥ saḥ eva saḥ

original: yathaivaṃ pratyayādarśo yadābhāsas tadā hy aham // SamUpad_I,18.109 //
analyzed: yathā evam pratyaya ādarśaḥ yad ābhāsaḥ tadā hi aham

original: ity evaṃ pratipattiḥ syāt sad asmīti ca nānyathā /
analyzed: iti evam pratipattiḥ syāt sat asmi iti ca na anyathā

original: tat tvam ity upadeśo 'pi dvārābhāvād anarthakaḥ // SamUpad_I,18.110 //
analyzed: tat tvam iti dvāra abhāvāt anarthakaḥ

original: śrotuḥ syād upadeśaś ced arthavattvaṃ tathā bhavet /
analyzed: śrotuḥ syāt upadeśaḥ ced arthavat tvam tathā bhavet

original: adhyakṣasya na ced iṣṭaṃ śrotṛtvaṃ kasya tad bhavet // SamUpad_I,18.111 //
analyzed: adhyakṣasya na ced iṣṭam śrotṛ tvam kasya tat bhavet

original: adhyakṣasya samīpe buddher eveti cen matam /
analyzed: adhyakṣasya samīpe buddheḥ evā iti ced matam

original: na tatkṛtopakāro 'sti kāṣṭhād yadvan na kalpyate // SamUpad_I,18.112 //
analyzed: na tad kṛta upakāraḥ sti kāṣṭhāt yadvat na kalpyate

original: buddhau cet tatkṛtaḥ kaścin nanv evaṃ pariṇāmitā /
analyzed: buddhau ced tad kṛtaḥ kaścid nanu evam pariṇāmitā

original: ābhāse 'pi ca ko doṣaḥ sati śrutyādyanugrahe // SamUpad_I,18.113 //
analyzed: ābhāse ca kaḥ doṣaḥ sati śruti ādi anugrahe

original: ābhāse pariṇāmaś cen na rajjvādinibhatvavat /
analyzed: ābhāse pariṇāmaḥ ced na rajju ādi nibha tva vat

original: sarpādeś ca tathāvocam ādarśe ca mukhatvavat // SamUpad_I,18.114 //
analyzed: sarpa ādeḥ ca tathā avocam ādarśe ca mukha tva vat

original: nātmābhāsatvasiddhiś ced ātmano grahaṇāt pṛthak /
analyzed: na ātma ābhāsa tva siddhiḥ ced ātmanaḥ grahaṇāt pṛthak

original: mukhādes tu pṛthaksiddhir iha tv anyonyasaṃśrayaḥ // SamUpad_I,18.115 //
analyzed: mukha ādeḥ tu pṛthak siddhiḥ iha tu anyonya saṃśrayaḥ

original: adhyakṣasya pṛthaksiddhāv ābhāsasya tadīyatā /
analyzed: adhyakṣasya pṛthak siddhau ābhāsasya tadīya tā

original: ābhāsasya tadīyatve hy adhyakṣavyatiriktatā // SamUpad_I,18.116 //
analyzed: ābhāsasya tadīya tve hi adhyakṣa vyatirikta tā

original: naivaṃ svapne pṛthaksiddheḥ pratyayasya dṛśes tathā /
analyzed: nā evam svapne pṛthak siddheḥ pratyayasya dṛśeḥ tathā

original: rathādes tatra śūnyatvāt pratyayasyātmanā grahaḥ // SamUpad_I,18.117 //
analyzed: ratha ādeḥ tatra śūnya tvāt pratyayasya ātmanā grahaḥ

original: avagatyā hi saṃvyāptaḥ pratyayo viṣayākṛtiḥ /
analyzed: avagatyā hi saṃvyāptaḥ pratyayaḥ viṣaya ākṛtiḥ

original: jāyate sa yadākāraḥ sa bāhyo viṣayo mataḥ // SamUpad_I,18.118 //
analyzed: jāyate sa yad ākāraḥ sa bāhyaḥ viṣayaḥ mataḥ

original: karmepsitatamatvāt sa tadvān kārye niyujyate /
analyzed: karma īpsitatama tvāt sa tadvān kārye niyujyate

original: ākāro yatra cārpyeta karaṇaṃ tad ihocyate // SamUpad_I,18.119 //
analyzed: ākāraḥ yatra ca arpyeta karaṇam tat iha ucyate

original: yadābhāsena saṃvyāptaḥ sa jñāteti nigadyate /
analyzed: yad ābhāsena saṃvyāptaḥ sa jñātā iti nigadyate

original: trayam etad vivicyātra yo jānāti sa ātmavit // SamUpad_I,18.120 //
analyzed: trayam etat vivicya atra yaḥ jānāti saḥ ātma vid

original: samyaksaṃśayamithyoktāḥ pratyayā vyabhicāriṇaḥ /
analyzed: samyak saṃśaya mithyā uktāḥ pratyayāḥ vyabhicāriṇaḥ

original: ekaivāvagatis teṣu bhedas tu pratyayārpitaḥ // SamUpad_I,18.121 //
analyzed: ekā eva avagatiḥ teṣu bhedaḥ tu pratyaya arpitaḥ

original: ādhibhedād yathā bhedo maṇer avagates tathā /
analyzed: ādhi bhedāt yathā bhedaḥ maṇeḥ avagateḥ tathā

original: aśuddhiḥ pariṇāmaś ca sarvaṃ pratyayasaṃśrayāt // SamUpad_I,18.122 //
analyzed: aśuddhiḥ pariṇāmaḥ ca sarvam pratyaya saṃśrayāt

original: prathanaṃ grahaṇaṃ siddhiḥ pratyayānām ihānyataḥ /
analyzed: prathanam grahaṇam siddhiḥ pratyayānām iha anyatas

original: āparokṣyāt tad evoktam anumānaṃ pradīpavat // SamUpad_I,18.123 //
analyzed: āparokṣyāt tat eva uktam anumānam pradīpa vat

original: kim ajñaṃ grāhayet kaścit pramāṇena tu kenacit /
analyzed: kim ajñam grāhayet kaścid pramāṇena tu kenacid

original: vinaiva tu pramāṇena nivṛttyānyasya śeṣataḥ // SamUpad_I,18.124 //
analyzed: vinā eva tu pramāṇena nivṛttyā anyasya śeṣatas

original: śabdenaiva pramāṇena nivṛttiś ced ihocyate /
analyzed: śabdena eva pramāṇena nivṛttiḥ ced iha ucyate

original: adhyakṣasyāprasiddhatvāc chūnyataiva prasajyate // SamUpad_I,18.125 //
analyzed: adhyakṣasya aprasiddha tvāt śūnyatā eva prasajyate

original: cetanas tvaṃ kathaṃ deha iti cen nāprasiddhitaḥ /
analyzed: cetanaḥ tvam katham dehaḥ iti ced na aprasiddhitaḥ

original: cetanasyānyatāsiddhāv evaṃ syād anyahānataḥ // SamUpad_I,18.126 //
analyzed: cetanasya anya tā siddhau evam syāt anya hānataḥ

original: adhyakṣaḥ svayam asty eva cetanasyāparokṣataḥ /
analyzed: adhyakṣaḥ svayam asti eva cetanasya aparokṣataḥ

original: tulya evaṃ prabodhaḥ syād ajñasyāsattvavādinā // SamUpad_I,18.127 //
analyzed: tulyaḥ evam prabodhaḥ syāt ajñasya asattva vādinā

original: aham ajñāsiṣaṃ cedam iti lokasmṛter iha /
analyzed: aham ajñāsiṣam ca idam iti loka smṛteḥ iha

original: karaṇaṃ karma kartā ca siddhās tv ekakṣaṇe kila // SamUpad_I,18.128 //
analyzed: karaṇam karma kartā ca siddhāḥ tu eka kṣaṇe kila

original: prāmāṇye 'pi smṛteḥ śaighryād yaugapadyaṃ vibhāvyate /
analyzed: prāmāṇye pi smṛteḥ śaighryāt yaugapadyam vibhāvyate

original: krameṇa grahaṇaṃ pūrvaṃ smṛteḥ paścāt tathaiva ca // SamUpad_I,18.129 //
analyzed: krameṇa grahaṇam pūrvam smṛteḥ paścāt tathā eva ca

original: ajñāsiṣam idaṃ māṃ cety apekṣā jāyate dhruvam /
analyzed: ajñāsiṣam idam mām ca iti apekṣā jāyate dhruvam

original: viśeṣo 'pekṣyate yatra tatra naivaikakālatā // SamUpad_I,18.130 //
analyzed: viśeṣaḥ u pekṣyate yatra tatra na eva eka kāla tā

original: ātmano grahaṇe cāpi trayāṇām iha saṃbhavāt /
analyzed: ātmanaḥ grahaṇe ca api trayāṇām iha saṃbhavāt

original: ātmany āsaktakartṛtvaṃ na syāt karaṇakarmaṇoḥ // SamUpad_I,18.131 //
analyzed: ātmani āsakta kartṛ tvam na syāt karaṇa karmaṇoḥ

original: vyāptum iṣṭaṃ ca yat kartuḥ kriyayā karma tat smṛtam /
analyzed: vyāptum iṣṭam ca yat kartuḥ kriyayā karma tat smṛtam

original: ato hi kartṛtantratvaṃ tasyeṣṭaṃ nānyatantratā // SamUpad_I,18.132 //
analyzed: atas hi kartṛ tantra tvam tasya iṣṭam na anya tantra tā

original: śabdād vānumiter vāpi pramāṇād vā tato 'nyataḥ /
analyzed: śabdāt vā anumiteḥ vā api pramāṇāt vā tatas

original: siddhiḥ sarvapadārthānāṃ syād ajñaṃ prati nānyathā // SamUpad_I,18.133 //
analyzed: siddhiḥ sarva padārthānām syāt ajñam prati nā anyathā

original: adhyakṣasyāpi siddhiḥ syāt pramāṇena vinaiva vā /
analyzed: adhyakṣasya api siddhiḥ syāt pramāṇena vinā eva vā

original: vinā svasya prasiddhis tu nājñaṃ praty upayujyate // SamUpad_I,18.134 //
analyzed: vinā svasya prasiddhiḥ tu na ajñam prati upayujyate

original: tasyaivājñatvam iṣṭaṃ cej jñātatve 'nyā mitir bhavet /
analyzed: tasya eva ajña tvam iṣṭam ced jñāta tve nyā mitiḥ bhavet

original: anyasyaivājñatāyāṃ ca tadvijñāne dhruvā bhavet // SamUpad_I,18.135 //
analyzed: anyasya eva ajña tāyām ca tad vijñāne dhruvā bhavet

original: jñātatā svātmalābho vā siddhiḥ syād anyad eva vā /
analyzed: jñāta tā sva ātma lābhaḥ vā siddhiḥ syāt anyat eva vā

original: jñātatve 'nantaroktau tvaṃ pakṣau saṃsmartum arhasi // SamUpad_I,18.136 //
analyzed: jñāta tve nantara uktau tvam pakṣau saṃsmartum arhasi

original: siddhiḥ syāt svātmalābhaś ced yatnas tatra nirarthakaḥ /
analyzed: siddhiḥ syāt sva ātma lābhaḥ ced yatnaḥ tatra nirarthakaḥ

original: sarvalokaprasiddhatvāt svahetubhyas tu vastunaḥ // SamUpad_I,18.137 //
analyzed: sarva loka prasiddha tvāt sva hetubhyaḥ tu vastunaḥ

original: jñānajñeyādivāde 'taḥ siddhir jñātatvam ucyate /
analyzed: jñāna jñeya ādi vāde siddhiḥ jñāta tvam ucyate

original: adhyakṣādhyakṣyayoḥ siddhir jñeyatvaṃ nātmalābhatā // SamUpad_I,18.138 //
analyzed: adhyakṣa ādhyakṣyayoḥ siddhiḥ jñeya tvam na ātmalābha tā

original: spaṣṭatvaṃ karmakartrādeḥ siddhatā yadi kalpyate /
analyzed: spaṣṭa tvam karma kartṛ ādeḥ siddha tā yadi kalpyate

original: spaṣṭatāspaṣṭate syātām anyasyaiva na cātmanaḥ // SamUpad_I,18.139 //
analyzed: spaṣṭa tā a spaṣṭa te syātām anyasya eva na ca ātmanaḥ

original: adraṣṭur naiva cāndhasya spaṣṭībhāvo ghaṭasya tu /
analyzed: adraṣṭuḥ nā eva ca andhasya spaṣṭībhāvaḥ ghaṭasya tu

original: kartrādeḥ spaṣṭateṣṭā ced draṣṭṛtādhyakṣakartṛkā // SamUpad_I,18.140 //
analyzed: kartṛ ādeḥ spaṣṭa tā iṣṭā ced draṣṭṛ tā adhyakṣa kartṛkā

original: anubhūteḥ kim antasmin syāt tavāpekṣayā vada /
analyzed: anubhūteḥ kim antasmin syāt tava apekṣayā vada

original: anubhavitarīṣṭā syāt so 'py anubhūtir eva naḥ // SamUpad_I,18.141 //
analyzed: anubhavitari iṣṭā syāt sā u pi anubhūtiḥ eva naḥ

original: “abhinno 'pi hi buddhyātmā viparyāsitadarśanaiḥ /
analyzed: abhinnaḥ pi hi buddhi ātmā viparyāsita darśanaiḥ

original: grāhyagrāhakasaṃvittibhedavān iva lakṣyate” // SamUpad_I,18.142 //
analyzed: grāhya grāhaka saṃvitti bhedavān iva lakṣyate

original: [bhūtir yeṣāṃ kriyā saiva kārakaṃ saiva cocyate / ]
analyzed: bhūtiḥ yeṣām kriyā sā eva kārakam sā eva ca ucyate

original: sattvaṃ nāśitvam asyāś cet sakartṛtvaṃ tatheṣyatām /
analyzed: sattvam nāśi tvam asyāḥ ced sa kartṛ tvam tathā iṣyatām

original: na kaścic ceṣyate dharma iti cet pakṣahānatā // SamUpad_I,18.143 //
analyzed: na kaścid ceṣyate dharmaḥ iti ced pakṣa hāna tā

original: nanv astitvādayo dharmā nāstitvādinivṛttayaḥ /
analyzed: nanu astitva ādayaḥ dharmāḥ nāstitva ādi nivṛttayaḥ

original: na bhūtes tarhi nāśitvaṃ svālakṣaṇyaṃ hi te // SamUpad_I,18.144 //
analyzed: na bhūteḥ tarhi nāśi tvam svālakṣaṇyam hi te

original: svalakṣaṇāvadhir nāśo nāśo 'nāśanivṛttitā /
agor asattvaṃ gotvaṃ te na tu tad goḥ svalakṣaṇam // SamUpad_I,18.145 //
analyzed: agoḥ asattvam go tvam te na tu tat goḥ sva lakṣaṇam

original: kṣaṇavācyo 'pi yo 'rthaḥ syāt so 'py anyābhāva eva te /
analyzed: kṣaṇa vācyaḥ pi yaḥ rthaḥ syāt saḥ pi anya abhāve eva te

original: bhedābhāve 'py abhāvasya bhedo nāmabhir iṣyate // SamUpad_I,18.146 //
analyzed: bheda abhāve pi abhāvasya bhedaḥ nāmabhiḥ iṣyate

original: nāmabhedair anekatvam ekasya syāt kathaṃ tava /
analyzed: nāma bhedaiḥ aneka tvam ekasya syāt katham tava

original: apoho yadi bhinnānāṃ vṛttis tasya kathaṃ gavi // SamUpad_I,18.147 //
analyzed: apohaḥ yadi bhinnānām vṛttiḥ tasya katham gavi

original: nābhāvā bhedakāḥ sarve viśeṣā vā kadācana /
analyzed: na abhāvāḥ bhedakāḥ sarve viśeṣāḥ vā kadācana

original: nāmajātyādayo yadvat saṃvidas te 'viśeṣataḥ // SamUpad_I,18.148 //
analyzed: nāma jāti ādayaḥ yadvat saṃvidaḥ te viśeṣataḥ

original: pratyakṣam anumānaṃ vā vyavahāre yadīcchasi /
analyzed: pratyakṣam anumānam vā vyavahāre yadi icchasi

original: kriyākārakabhedais tad abhyupeyaṃ dhruvaṃ bhavet // SamUpad_I,18.149 //
analyzed: kriyā kāraka bhedaiḥ tat abhyupeyam dhruvam bhavet

original: tasmān nīlaṃ tathā pītaṃ ghaṭādir vā viśeṣaṇam /
analyzed: tasmāt nīlam tathā pītam ghaṭa ādiḥ vā viśeṣaṇam

original: saṃvidas tad upetyaṃ syād yena cāpy anubhūyate // SamUpad_I,18.150 //
analyzed: saṃvidaḥ tat upetyam syāt yena ca api anubhūyate

original: rūpādīnāṃ yathānyaḥ syād grāhyatvād grāhakas tathā /
analyzed: rūpa ādīnām yathā anyaḥ syāt grāhya tvāt grāhakaḥ tathā

original: pratyayasya tathānyaṃ syād vyañjakatvāc ca dīpavat // SamUpad_I,18.151 //
analyzed: pratyayasya tathā anyam syāt vyañjaka tvāt ca dīpa vat

original: adhyakṣasya dṛśeḥ kīdṛk saṃbandhaḥ saṃbhaviṣyati /
analyzed: adhyakṣasya dṛśeḥ kīdṛś saṃbandhaḥ saṃbhaviṣyati

original: adhyakṣyeṇa tu dṛśyena muktvānyo draṣṭṛdṛśyatām // SamUpad_I,18.152 //
analyzed: adhyakṣyeṇa tu dṛśyena muktvā anyaḥ draṣṭṛ dṛśya tām

original: adhyakṣeṇa kṛtā dṛṣṭir dṛśyaṃ vyāpnoty athāpi vā /
analyzed: adhyakṣeṇa kṛtā dṛṣṭiḥ dṛśyam vyāpnoti atha api vā

original: nityādhyakṣakṛtaḥ kaścid upakāro bhaved dhiyām // SamUpad_I,18.153 //
analyzed: nitya adhyakṣa kṛtaḥ kaścid upakāraḥ bhavet dhiyām

original: sa coktas tannibhatvaṃ prāk saṃvyāptiś ca ghaṭādiṣu /
analyzed: sa ca uktaḥ tad nibha tvam prāk saṃvyāptiḥ ca ghaṭa ādiṣu

original: yathālokādisaṃvyāptir vyañjakatvād dhiyas tathā // SamUpad_I,18.154 //
analyzed: yathā āloka ādi saṃvyāptiḥ vyañjaka tvāt dhiyaḥ tathā

original: ālokastho ghaṭo yadvad buddhyārūḍho bhavet tathā /
analyzed: āloka sthaḥ ghaṭaḥ yadvat buddhi ārūḍhaḥ bhavet tathā

original: dhīvyāptiḥ syād ghaṭāroho dhiyo vyāptau kramo bhavet // SamUpad_I,18.155 //
analyzed: dhīvyāptiḥ syāt ghaṭa ārohaḥ dhiyaḥ vyāptau kramaḥ bhavet

original: pūrvaṃ syāt pratyayavyāptis tato 'nugraha ātmanaḥ /
analyzed: pūrvam syāt pratyaya vyāptiḥ tatas nugrahaḥ ātmanaḥ

original: kṛtsnādhyakṣasya so 'yuktaḥ kālākāśādivat kramaḥ // SamUpad_I,18.156 //
analyzed: kṛtsna adhyakṣasya saḥ yuktaḥ kāla ākāśa ādi vat kramaḥ

original: viṣayagrahaṇaṃ yasya kāraṇāpekṣayā bhavet /
analyzed: viṣaya grahaṇam yasya kāraṇa apekṣayā bhavet

original: saty eva grāhyaśeṣe ca pariṇāmī sa cittavat // SamUpad_I,18.157 //
analyzed: sati eva grāhya śeṣe ca pariṇāmī sa citta vat

original: adhyakṣo 'ham iti jñānaṃ buddher eva viniścayaḥ /
analyzed: adhyakṣaḥ ham iti jñānam buddheḥ eva viniścayaḥ

original: nādhyakṣasyāviśeṣatvān na tasyāsti paro yataḥ // SamUpad_I,18.158 //
analyzed: na adhyakṣasya aviśeṣa tvāt na tasya asti paraḥ yatas

original: kartrā ced aham ity evam anubhūyeta muktatā /
analyzed: kartrā ced aham iti evam anubhūyeta mukta tā

original: sukhaduḥkhavinirmoko nāhaṃkartari yujyate // SamUpad_I,18.159 //
analyzed: sukha duḥkha vinirmokaḥ na ahaṃkartari yujyate

original: dehādāv abhimānottho duḥkhīti pratyayo dhruvam /
kuṇḍalipratyayo yadvat pratyagātmābhimāninā // SamUpad_I,18.160 //
analyzed: kuṇḍali pratyayaḥ yadvat pratyagātma abhimāninā

original: bādhyate pratyayeneha vivekenāvivekavān /
analyzed: bādhyate pratyayena iha vivekena a vivekavān

original: viparyaye 'sadantaṃ syāt pramāṇasyāpramāṇataḥ // SamUpad_I,18.161 //
analyzed: viparyaye sat antam syāt pramāṇasya apramāṇataḥ

original: dāhacchedavināśeṣu duḥkhitvaṃ nānyathātmanaḥ /
analyzed: dāha cheda vināśeṣu duḥkhi tvam na anyathā ātmanaḥ

original: naiva hy anyasya dāhādāv anyo duḥkhī bhavet kvacit // SamUpad_I,18.162 //
analyzed: na eva hi anyasya dāha ādau anyaḥ duḥkhī bhavet kvacid

original: asparśatvād adehatvān nāhaṃ dāhyo yataḥ sadā /
analyzed: asparśa tvāt adeha tvāt na aham dāhyaḥ yatas sadā

original: tasmān mithyābhimānotthaṃ mṛte putre mṛtir yathā // SamUpad_I,18.163 //
analyzed: tasmāt mithyā abhimāna uttham mṛte putre mṛtiḥ yathā

original: kuṇḍaly aham iti hy etad bādhyetaiva vivekinā /
analyzed: kuṇḍalī aham iti hi etat bādhyeta eva vivekinā

original: duḥkhīti pratyayas tadvat kevalāhaṃdhiyā sadā // SamUpad_I,18.164 //
analyzed: duḥkhī iti pratyayaḥ tadvat kevala ahaṃdhiyā sadā

original: siddhe suḥkhitva iṣṭaṃ syāt taccaktitvaṃ sadātmanaḥ /
analyzed: siddhe suḥkhi tve iṣṭam syāt tad cakti tvam sat ātmanaḥ

original: mithyābhimānato duḥkhī tenārthāpādanakṣayaḥ // SamUpad_I,18.165 //
analyzed: mithyā abhimānataḥ duḥkhī tena artha āpādana kṣayaḥ

original: asparśo 'pi yathā sparśam acalaś calanādi ca /
analyzed: a sparśaḥ yathā sparśam a calaḥ calana ādi ca

original: avivekāt tathā duḥkhaṃ mānasaṃ cātmanīkṣate // SamUpad_I,18.166 //
analyzed: avivekāt tathā duḥkham mānasam ca ātmani īkṣate

original: vivekātmadhiyā duḥkhaṃ nudyate calanādivat /
analyzed: viveka ātma dhiyā duḥkham nudyate calana ādi vat

original: avivekasvabhāvena mano gacchaty anicchataḥ // SamUpad_I,18.167 //
analyzed: aviveka svabhāvena manaḥ gacchati an icchataḥ

original: tadānudṛśyate duḥkhaṃ naiścalye naiva tasya tat /
analyzed: tadā anudṛśyate duḥkham naiścalye nā eva tasya tat

original: pratyagātmani tasmāt tad duḥkhaṃ naivopapadyate // SamUpad_I,18.168 //
analyzed: pratyagātmani tasmāt tat duḥkham na eva upapadyate

original: tvaṃsatos tulyanīḍatvān nīlāśvavad idaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: tvaṃsatoḥ tulya nīḍa tvāt nīlāśva vat idam bhavet

original: nirduḥkhavācinā yogāt tvaṃśabdasya tadarthatā // SamUpad_I,18.169 //
analyzed: nirduḥkha vācinā yogāt tvam śabdasya tad artha tā

original: pratyagātmābhidhānena tacchabdasya yutes tathā /
analyzed: pratyagātma abhidhānena tad śabdasya yuteḥ tathā

original: daśamas tvam asīty evaṃ vākyaṃ syāt pratyagātmani // SamUpad_I,18.170 //
analyzed: daśamaḥ tvam asi iti evam vākyam syāt pratyagātmani

original: svārthasya hy aprahāṇena viśiṣṭārthasamarpakau /
analyzed: sva arthasya hi a prahāṇena viśiṣṭa artha samarpakau

original: pratyagātmāvagatyantau nānyo 'rtho 'rthād virodhy ataḥ // SamUpad_I,18.171 //
navabuddhyapahārād dhi svātmānaṃ daśapūraṇam /
analyzed: nava buddhi apahārāt hi sva ātmānam daśa pūraṇam

original: apaśyañ jñātum evecchet svam ātmānaṃ janas tathā // SamUpad_I,18.172 //
analyzed: apaśyam jñātum evā icchet svam ātmānam janaḥ tathā

original: avidyābaddhacakṣuṣṭvāt kāmāpahṛtadhīḥ sadā /
analyzed: avidyā baddha cakṣuṣṭvāt kāma apahṛta dhīḥ sadā

original: viviktaṃ dṛśim ātmānaṃ nekṣate daśamaṃ yathā // SamUpad_I,18.173 //
analyzed: viviktam dṛśim ātmānam na īkṣate daśamam yathā

original: daśamas tvam asīty evaṃ tattvamasyādivākyataḥ /
analyzed: daśamaḥ tvam asi iti evam tattvamasi ādi vākyataḥ

original: svam ātmānaṃ vijānāti kṛtsnāntaḥkaraṇekṣaṇam // SamUpad_I,18.174 //
analyzed: svam ātmānam vijānāti kṛtsna antaḥkaraṇa īkṣaṇam

original: idaṃ pūrvam idaṃ paścāt padaṃ vākye bhaved iti /
analyzed: idam pūrvam idam paścāt padam vākye bhavet iti

original: niyamo naiva vede 'sti padasāṃgatyam arthataḥ // SamUpad_I,18.175 //
analyzed: niyamaḥ nā eva vede sti pada sāṃgatyam arthataḥ

original: vākye hi śrūyamāṇānāṃ padānām arthasaṃsmṛtiḥ /
analyzed: vākye hi śrūyamāṇānām padānām artha saṃsmṛtiḥ

original: anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ tato vākyārthabodhanam // SamUpad_I,18.176 //
analyzed: anvaya vyatirekābhyām tatas vākya artha bodhanam

original: yadā nityeṣu vākyeṣu padārthas tu vivicyate /
analyzed: yadā nityeṣu vākyeṣu padārthaḥ tu vivicyate

original: vākyārthajñānasaṃkrāntyai tadā praśno na yujyate // SamUpad_I,18.177 //
analyzed: vākya artha jñāna saṃkrāntyai tadā praśnaḥ na yujyate

original: anvayavyatirekoktiḥ padārthasmaraṇāya tu /
analyzed: anvaya vyatireka uktiḥ padārtha smaraṇāya tu

original: smṛtyabhāve na vākyārtho jñātuṃ śakyo bi kenacit // SamUpad_I,18.178 //
analyzed: smṛti abhāve na vākya arthaḥ jñātum śakyaḥ kenacid

original: tattvamasyādivākyeṣu tvaṃpadārthāvivekataḥ /
analyzed: tattvam asi ādi vākyeṣu tvam padārtha avivekataḥ

original: vyajyate naiva vākyārtho nityamukto 'ham ity ataḥ // SamUpad_I,18.179 //
analyzed: vyajyate nā eva vākya arthaḥ nitya muktaḥ ham iti atas

original: anvayavyatirekoktis tadvivekāya nānyathā /
tvaṃpadārthaviveke hi pāṇāv arpitavilvavat // SamUpad_I,18.180 //
analyzed: tvaṃ padārtha viveke hi pāṇau arpita vilva vat

original: vākyārtho vyajyate caivaṃ kevalo 'haṃpadārthataḥ /
analyzed: vākya arthaḥ vyajyate ca evam kevalaḥ haṃ padārthataḥ

original: duḥkhīty etadapohena pratyagātmaviniścayāt // SamUpad_I,18.181 //
analyzed: duḥkhī iti etad apohena pratyagātma viniścayāt

original: tatraivaṃ saṃbhavaty arthe śrutahānāśrutārthadhīḥ /
analyzed: tatra evam saṃbhavati arthe śruta hāna aśruta artha dhīḥ

original: naivaṃ kalpayituṃ yuktā padavākyārthakovidaiḥ // SamUpad_I,18.182 //
analyzed: nā evam kalpayitum yuktā pada vākya artha kovidaiḥ

original: pratyakṣādīni bādheran kṛṣṇalādiṣu pākavat /
analyzed: pratyakṣa ādīni bādheran kṛṣṇala ādiṣu pāka vat

original: akṣajādinibhair etaiḥ kathaṃ syād vākyabādhanam // SamUpad_I,18.183 //
analyzed: akṣaja ādi nibhaiḥ etaiḥ katham syāt vākya bādhanam

original: duḥkhy asmīti sati jñāne nirduḥkhīti na jāyate /
analyzed: duḥkhī asmi iti sati jñāne nirduḥkhī iti na jāyate

original: pratyakṣādinibhatve 'pi vākyān na vyabhicārataḥ // SamUpad_I,18.184 //
analyzed: pratyakṣa ādi nibha tve vākyāt na vyabhicārataḥ

original: svapne duḥkhy aham adyāsaṃ dāhacchedādihetutaḥ /
analyzed: svapne duḥkhī aham adyā āsam dāha cheda ādi hetutaḥ
