original: tatkālabhāvibhir vākyair na bādhaḥ kriyate yadi // SamUpad_I,18.185 //
analyzed: tad kāla bhāvibhiḥ vākyaiḥ na bādhaḥ kriyate yadi

original: samāptes tarhi duḥkhasya prāk ca tadbādha iṣyatām /
analyzed: samāpteḥ tarhi duḥkhasya prāk ca tad bādhaḥ iṣyatām

original: na hi duḥkhasya saṃtāno bhrānter vā dṛśyate kvacit // SamUpad_I,18.186 //
analyzed: na hi duḥkhasya saṃtānaḥ bhrānteḥ vā dṛśyate kvacid

original: pratyagātmana ātmatvaṃ duḥkhy asmīty asya bādhayā /
analyzed: pratyagātmanaḥ ātma tvam duḥkhī asmi iti asya bādhayā

original: daśamaṃ navam asyeva veda ced aviruddhatā // SamUpad_I,18.187 //
analyzed: daśamam navam asya iva veda ced a viruddha tā

original: nityamuktatvavijñānaṃ vākyād bhavati nānyataḥ /
analyzed: nitya mukta tva vijñānam vākyāt bhavati na anyatas

original: vākyārthasyāpi vijñānaṃ padārthasmṛtipūrvakam // SamUpad_I,18.188 //
analyzed: vākya arthasya api vijñānam padārtha smṛti pūrvakam

original: anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ padārthaḥ smaryate dhruvam /
analyzed: anvaya vyatirekābhyām padārthaḥ smaryate dhruvam

original: evaṃ nirduḥkham ātmānam akriyaṃ pratipadyate // SamUpad_I,18.189 //
analyzed: evam nirduḥkham ātmānam akriyam pratipadyate

original: sad evetyādivākyebhyaḥ pramā sphuṭatarā bhavet /
analyzed: sat eva ityādi vākyebhyaḥ pramā sphuṭatarā bhavet

original: daśamas tvam asīty asmād yathaivaṃ pratyagātmani // SamUpad_I,18.190 //
analyzed: daśamaḥ tvam asi iti asmāt yathā evam pratyagātmani

original: prabodhena yathā svāpnaṃ sarvaṃ duḥkhaṃ nivartate /
analyzed: prabodhena yathā svāpnam sarvam duḥkham nivartate

original: pratyagātmadhiyā tadvad duḥkhitvaṃ sarvadātmanaḥ // SamUpad_I,18.191 //
analyzed: pratyagātma dhiyā tadvat duḥkhi tvam sarvadā ātmanaḥ

original: kṛṣṇalādau pramājanma tadanyārthāmṛdutvataḥ /
tattvamasyādivākyeṣu na tv evam avirodhataḥ // SamUpad_I,18.192 //
analyzed: tattvamasi ādi vākyeṣu na tu evam avirodhataḥ

original: vākye tat tvam asīty asmiñ jñātārthaṃ tadasidvayam /
analyzed: vākye tat tvam asi iti asmin jñāta artham tat asi dvayam

original: tvamarthasmṛtyasāhāyyād vākyaṃ notpādayet pramām // SamUpad_I,18.193 //
analyzed: tvam artha smṛti asāhāyyāt vākyam nā utpādayet pramām

original: tattvamos tulyanīḍārtham asīty etat padaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: tat tvamoḥ tulya nīḍa artham asi iti etat padam bhavet

original: tacchabdaḥ pratyagātmārthas tacchabdārthas tvamas tathā // SamUpad_I,18.194 //
analyzed: tad śabdaḥ pratyagātma arthaḥ tad śabda arthaḥ tu amaḥ tathā

original: duḥkhitvāpratyagātmatvaṃ vārayetām ubhāv api /
analyzed: duḥkhi tva apratyagātma tvam vārayetām ubhau api

original: evaṃ ca netinetyarthaṃ gamayetāṃ parasparam // SamUpad_I,18.195 //
analyzed: evam ca neti neti artham gamayetām parasparam

original: evaṃ tat tvam asīty asya gamyamāne phale katham /
analyzed: evam tat tvam asi iti asya gamyamāne phale katham

original: apramāṇatvam asyoktvā kriyāpekṣatvam ucyate // SamUpad_I,18.196 //
analyzed: apramāṇa tvam asya uktvā kriyā apekṣa tvam ucyate

original: tasmād ādyantamadhyeṣu kurv ity etad virodhy ataḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt ādi anta madhyeṣu kuru iti etat virodhi atas

original: na kalpyam aśrutatvāc ca śrutatyāgo 'py anarthakaḥ // SamUpad_I,18.197 //
analyzed: na kalpyam a śruta tvāt ca śruta tyāgaḥ u pi anarthakaḥ

original: yathānubhūyate tṛptir bhujer vākyān na gamyate /
analyzed: yathā anubhūyate tṛptiḥ bhujeḥ vākyāt na gamyate

original: vākyasya vidhṛtis tadvad gośakṛtpāyasīkriyā // SamUpad_I,18.198 //
analyzed: vākyasya vidhṛtiḥ tadvat go śakṛt pāyasīkriyā

original: satyam evam anātmārthe vākyāt pārokṣyabodhanam /
analyzed: satyam evam anātma arthe vākyāt pārokṣya bodhanam

original: pratyagātmani na tv evaṃ saṃkhyāprāptivad adhruvam // SamUpad_I,18.199 //
analyzed: pratyagātmani na tu evam saṃkhyā prāpti vat adhruvam

original: svasaṃvedyatvaparyāyaḥ /
analyzed: sva saṃvedya tva paryāyaḥ

original: svapramāṇaka iṣyatām /
analyzed: sva pramāṇakaḥ iṣyatām

original: nivṛttāv ahamaḥ siddhaḥ svātmano 'nubhavaś ca naḥ // SamUpad_I,18.200 //
analyzed: nivṛttau ahamaḥ siddhaḥ sva ātmanaḥ nubhavaḥ ca naḥ

original: buddhīnāṃ viṣayo duḥkhaṃ tā yasya viṣayā matāḥ /
analyzed: buddhīnām viṣayaḥ duḥkham tāḥ yasya viṣayāḥ matāḥ

original: kuto 'sya duḥkhasaṃbandho dṛśeḥ syāt pratyagātmanaḥ // SamUpad_I,18.201 //
analyzed: kutas sya duḥkha saṃbandhaḥ dṛśeḥ syāt pratyagātmanaḥ

original: dṛśir evānubhūyeta svenaivānubhavātmanā /
analyzed: dṛśiḥ eva anubhūyeta svena eva anubhava ātmanā

original: tadābhāsatayā janma dhiyo 'syānubhavaḥ smṛtaḥ // SamUpad_I,18.202 //
analyzed: tad ābhāsa tayā janma dhiyaḥ sya anubhavaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: aśanāyādinirmuktaḥ siddho mokṣas tvam eva saḥ /
analyzed: aśanāya ādi nirmuktaḥ siddhaḥ mokṣaḥ tvam eva saḥ

original: śrotavyādi tavety etad viruddhaṃ katham ucyate // SamUpad_I,18.203 //
analyzed: śrotavya ādi tava iti etat viruddham katham ucyate

original: setsyatīty eva cet tat syāc chravaṇādi tadā bhavet /
analyzed: setsyati iti eva ced tat syāt śravaṇa ādi tadā bhavet

original: mokṣasyānityataivaṃ syād virodhy evānyathā vacaḥ // SamUpad_I,18.204 //
analyzed: mokṣasya anitya tā evam syāt virodhi evā anyathā vacaḥ

original: śrotṛśrotavyayor bhedo yadīṣṭaḥ syād bhaved idam /
analyzed: śrotṛ śrotavyayoḥ bhedaḥ yadi iṣṭaḥ syāt bhavet idam

original: iṣṭārthakopa evaṃ syān na yuktaṃ sarvathā vacaḥ // SamUpad_I,18.205 //
analyzed: iṣṭa artha kopaḥ evam syāt na yuktam sarvathā vacaḥ

original: siddho mokṣo 'ham ity evaṃ jñātvātmānaṃ bhaved yadi /
analyzed: siddhaḥ mokṣaḥ ham iti evam jñātvā ātmānam bhavet yadi

original: cikīrṣur yaḥ sa mūḍhātmā śāstraṃ codghāṭayaty api // SamUpad_I,18.206 //
analyzed: cikīrṣuḥ yaḥ sa mūḍha ātmā śāstram ca udghāṭayati api

original: na hi siddhasya kartavyaṃ sakāryasya na siddhatā /
analyzed: na hi siddhasya kartavyam sa kāryasya na siddha tā

original: ubhayālambanaṃ kurvann ātmānaṃ vañcayaty asau // SamUpad_I,18.207 //
analyzed: ubhaya ālambanam kurvan ātmānam vañcayati asau

original: siddho mokṣas tvam ity etad vastumātraṃ pradarśyate /
analyzed: siddhaḥ mokṣaḥ tvam iti etat vastu mātram pradarśyate

original: śrotus tathātvavijñāne pravṛttiḥ syāt kathaṃ tv iti // SamUpad_I,18.208 //
analyzed: śrotuḥ tathātva vijñāne pravṛttiḥ syāt katham tu iti

original: kartā duḥkhy aham asmīti pratyakṣeṇānubhūyate /
analyzed: kartā duḥkhī aham asmi iti pratyakṣeṇa anubhūyate

original: kartā duḥkhī ca mā bhūvam iti yatno bhavet tataḥ // SamUpad_I,18.209 //
analyzed: kartā duḥkhī ca mā bhūvam iti yatnaḥ bhavet tatas

original: tadvijñānāya yuktyādi kartavyaṃ śrutir abravīt /
analyzed: tad vijñānāya yukti ādi kartavyam śrutiḥ abravīt

original: kartṛtvādyanuvādena siddhatvānubhavāya tu // SamUpad_I,18.210 //
analyzed: kartṛ tva ādi anuvādena siddha tva anubhavāya tu

original: nirduḥkho niṣkriyo 'kāmaḥ siddho mokṣo 'ham ity api /
analyzed: nirduḥkhaḥ kāmaḥ siddhaḥ mokṣaḥ ham iti api

original: gṛhītvaiva viruddhārtham ādadhyāt katham eva saḥ // SamUpad_I,18.211 //
analyzed: gṛhītvā eva viruddha artham ādadhyāt katham eva saḥ

original: sakāmaḥ sakriyo 'siddha iti me 'nubhavaḥ katham /
analyzed: sa kāmaḥ sa kriyaḥ siddhaḥ iti me nubhavaḥ katham

original: ato me viparītasya tad bhavān vaktum arhati // SamUpad_I,18.212 //
analyzed: atas me viparītasya tat bhavān vaktum arhati

original: ihaiva ghaṭate praśno na muktatvānubhūtaye /
analyzed: iha eva ghaṭate praśnaḥ na mukta tva anubhūtaye

original: pramāṇena virodhī yaḥ so 'trārthaḥ praśnam arhati // SamUpad_I,18.213 //
analyzed: pramāṇena virodhī yaḥ saḥ trā arthaḥ praśnam arhati

original: ahaṃ nirmukta ity eṣa sad asīty anyamānajaḥ /
analyzed: aham nirmuktaḥ iti eṣa sat asi iti anya māna jaḥ

original: pratyakṣābhāsajanyatvād duḥkhitvaṃ praśnam arhati // SamUpad_I,18.214 //
analyzed: pratyakṣa ābhāsa janya tvāt duḥkhi tvam praśnam arhati

original: pṛṣṭam ākāṅkṣitaṃ vācyaṃ duḥkhābhāvam abhīpsitam /
analyzed: pṛṣṭam ākāṅkṣitam vācyam duḥkha abhāvam abhīpsitam

original: kathaṃ hīdaṃ nivarteta duḥkhaṃ sarvātmanā mama // SamUpad_I,18.215 //
analyzed: katham hi idam nivarteta duḥkham sarva ātmanā mama

original: iti praśnānurūpaṃ yad vācyaṃ duḥkhanivartakam /
analyzed: iti praśna anurūpam yat vācyam duḥkha nivartakam

original: śruteḥ svātmani nāśaṅkā prāmāṇye sati vidyate // SamUpad_I,18.216 //
analyzed: śruteḥ svātmani nā āśaṅkā prāmāṇye sati vidyate

original: tasmād ātmavimuktatvaṃ pratyāyayati tadvacaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt ātma vimukta tvam pratyāyayati tat vacaḥ

original: vaktavyaṃ tu tathārthaṃ syād virodhe 'sati kenacit // SamUpad_I,18.217 //
analyzed: vaktavyam tu tathā artham syāt virodhe sati kenacid

original: ito 'nyo 'nubhavaḥ kaścid ātmano nopapadyate /
analyzed: itas nyaḥ nubhavaḥ kaścid ātmanaḥ na upapadyate

original: avijñātaṃ vijānatāṃ vijñātāram iti śruteḥ // SamUpad_I,18.218 //
analyzed: a vijñātam vijānatām vijñātāram iti śruteḥ

original: tvaṃpadārthavivekāya saṃnyāsaḥ sarvakarmaṇām /
analyzed: tvam padārtha vivekāya saṃnyāsaḥ sarva karmaṇām

original: sādhanatvaṃ vrajaty eva śānto dāntādiśāsanāt // SamUpad_I,18.219 //
analyzed: sādhana tvam vrajati eva śāntaḥ dānta ādi śāsanāt

original: tvamarthaṃ pratyagātmānaṃ paśyed ātmānam ātmani /
analyzed: tvamartham pratyagātmānam paśyet ātmānam ātmani

original: vākyārthaṃ tata ātmānaṃ sarvaṃ paśyati kevalam // SamUpad_I,18.220 //
analyzed: vākya artham tatas ātmānam sarvam paśyati kevalam

original: sarvam ātmeti vākyārthe vijñāte 'sya pramāṇataḥ /
analyzed: sarvam ātmā iti vākya arthe vijñāte sya pramāṇataḥ

original: asattve hy anyamānasya vidhis taṃ yojayet katham // SamUpad_I,18.221 //
analyzed: a sattve hi anya mānasya vidhiḥ tam yojayet katham

original: tasmād vākyārthavijñānān nordhvaṃ karmavidhir bhavet /
analyzed: tasmāt vākya artha vijñānāt na ūrdhvam karma vidhiḥ bhavet

original: na hi brahmāsmi karteti viruddhe bhavato dhiyau // SamUpad_I,18.222 //
analyzed: na hi brahmā asmi kartā iti viruddhe bhavataḥ dhiyau

original: brahmāsmīti hi vidyeyaṃ naiva karteti bādhyate /
analyzed: brahmā asmi iti hi vidyā iyam na eva kartā iti bādhyate

original: sakāmo baddha ity evaṃ pramāṇābhāsajātayā // SamUpad_I,18.223 //
analyzed: sa kāmaḥ baddhaḥ iti evam pramāṇa ābhāsa jātayā

original: śāstrād brahmāsmi nānyo 'ham iti buddhir bhaved dṛḍhā /
analyzed: śāstrāt brahmā asmi na anyaḥ ham iti buddhiḥ bhavet dṛḍhā

original: yadāyuktā tadaivaṃ dhīr yathā dehātmadhīr iti // SamUpad_I,18.224 //
analyzed: yadā a yuktā tadā evam dhīḥ yathā deha ātma dhīḥ iti

original: sabhayād abhayaṃ prāptas tadarthaṃ yatate ca yaḥ /
analyzed: sa bhayāt abhayam prāptaḥ tad artham yatate ca yaḥ

original: sa punaḥ sabhayaṃ gantuṃ svatantraś cen na hīcchati // SamUpad_I,18.225 //
analyzed: sa punar sabhayam gantum svatantraḥ ced na hi icchati

original: yatheṣṭācaraṇaprāptiḥ saṃnyāsādividhau kutaḥ /
padārthājñānabuddhasya vākyārthānubhavārthinaḥ // SamUpad_I,18.226 //
analyzed: padārtha ajñāna buddhasya vākya artha anubhava arthinaḥ

original: ataḥ sarvam idaṃ siddhaṃ yat prāg asmābhir īritam // SamUpad_I,18.227 //
analyzed: atas sarvam idam siddham yat prāk asmābhiḥ īritam

original: yo hi yasmād viraktaḥ syān nāsau tasmai pravartate /
analyzed: yaḥ hi yasmāt viraktaḥ syāt na asau tasmai pravartate

original: lokatrayād viraktatvān mumukṣuḥ kim itīhate // SamUpad_I,18.228 //
kṣudhayā pīḍyamāno 'pi na viṣaṃ hy attum icchati /
analyzed: kṣudhayā pīḍyamānaḥ pi na viṣam hi attum icchati

original: miṣṭānnadhvastatṛḍ jānan nāmūḍhas taj jighatsati // SamUpad_I,18.229 //
analyzed: miṣṭānna dhvasta tṛṣ jānan na amūḍhaḥ tat jighatsati

original: vedāntavākyapuṣpebhyo jñānāmṛtamadhūttamam /
ujjahārālivad yo nas tasmai sadgurave namaḥ // SamUpad_I,18.230 //
analyzed: ujjahāra ali vat yaḥ naḥ tasmai sat gurave namaḥ

original: iti tattvamasiprakaraṇam // SamUpad_I,18 //
analyzed: iti tattvam asi prakaraṇam

original: prayujya tṛṣṇājvaranāśakāraṇaṃ cikitsitaṃ jñānavirāgabheṣajam /
analyzed: prayujya tṛṣṇā jvara nāśa kāraṇam cikitsitam jñāna virāga bheṣajam

original: na yāti kāmajvarasannipātajāṃ śarīramālāśatayogaduḥkhitām // SamUpad_I,19.1 //
analyzed: na yāti kāma jvara sannipāta jām śarīra mālā śata yoga duḥkhi tām

original: ahaṃ mameti tvam anartham īhase parārtham icchanti tavānya īhitam /
analyzed: aham mama iti tvam anartham īhase parārtham icchanti tava anye īhitam

original: na te 'rthabodho na hi me 'sti cārthitā tataś ca yuktaḥ śama eva te manaḥ // SamUpad_I,19.2 //
analyzed: na te ṛtha bodhaḥ na hi me sti ca arthi tā tatas ca yuktaḥ śamaḥ eva te manaḥ

original: yato na cānyaḥ paramāt sanātanāt sadaiva tṛpto 'ham ato na me 'rthitā /
analyzed: yatas na ca anyaḥ paramāt sanātanāt sadā eva tṛptaḥ ham atas na me rthitā

original: sadaiva muktaś ca na kāmaye hitaṃ yatasva cetaḥ praśamāya te 'dhikam // SamUpad_I,19.3 //
analyzed: sadā eva muktaḥ ca na kāmaye hitam yatasva cetaḥ praśamāya te dhikam

original: ṣaḍūrmimālābhyativṛtta eva yaḥ sa eva cātmā jagataś ca naḥ śruteḥ /
analyzed: ṣaṣ ūrmi mālā abhyativṛttaḥ eva yaḥ saḥ eva ca ātmā jagataḥ ca naḥ śruteḥ

original: pramāṇataś cāpi mayā pravedyate mudhaiva tasmāc ca manas tavehitam // SamUpad_I,19.4 //
analyzed: pramāṇataḥ ca api mayā pravedyate mudhā eva tasmāt ca manaḥ tava īhitam

original: tvayi praśānte na hi sāsti bhedadhīr yato jagan moham upaiti māyayā /
analyzed: tvayi praśānte na hi sā asti bheda dhīḥ yatas jagat moham upaiti māyayā

original: graho hi māyāprabhavasya kāraṇaṃ grahād vimoke na hi sāsti kasyacit // SamUpad_I,19.5 //
analyzed: grahaḥ hi māyā prabhavasya kāraṇam grahāt vimoke na hi sā asti kasyacid

original: na me 'sti mohas tava ceṣṭitena hi prabuddhatattvas tv asito hy avikriyaḥ /
analyzed: na me sti mohaḥ tava ceṣṭitena hi prabuddha tattvaḥ tu asitaḥ hi avikriyaḥ

original: na pūrvatattvottarabhedatā hi no vṛthaiva tasmāc ca manas tavehitam // SamUpad_I,19.6 //
analyzed: na pūrva tattva uttara bheda tā hi naḥ vṛthā eva tasmāt ca manaḥ tava īhitam

original: yataś ca nityo 'ham ato na cānyathā vikārayoge hi bhaved anityatā /
analyzed: yatas ca nityaḥ ham atas na ca anyathā vikāra yoge hi bhavet anitya tā

original: sadā prabhāto 'ham ato hi cādvayo vikalpitaṃ cāpy asad ity avasthitam // SamUpad_I,19.7 //
analyzed: sadā prabhātaḥ ham atas hi ca advayaḥ vikalpitam ca api asat iti avasthitam

original: abhāvarūpaṃ tvam asīha he mano nirīkṣyamāṇe na hi yuktito 'stitā /
analyzed: abhāva rūpam tvam asi iha he manaḥ nirīkṣyamāṇe na hi yuktitaḥ stitā

original: sato hy anāśād asato 'py ajanmato dvayaṃ ca te 'tas tava nāstiteṣyate // SamUpad_I,19.8 //
analyzed: sataḥ hi anāśāt asataḥ pi a janmataḥ dvayam ca te tava nāstitā iṣyate

original: draṣṭā ca dṛśyaṃ ca tathā ca darśanaṃ bhramaḥ sa sarvas tava kalpito hi saḥ /
analyzed: draṣṭā ca dṛśyam ca tathā ca darśanam bhramaḥ sa sarvaḥ tava kalpitaḥ hi saḥ

original: dṛśeś ca bhinnaṃ na hi dṛśyam īkṣyate svapan vibodhe ca tathā na bhidyate // SamUpad_I,19.9 //
analyzed: dṛśeḥ ca bhinnam na hi dṛśyam īkṣyate svapan vibodhe ca tathā na bhidyate

original: vikalpanā cāpi tathādvayā bhaved avastuyogāt tad alātacakravat /
analyzed: vikalpanā ca api tathā advayā bhavet avastu yogāt tat alāta cakra vat

original: na śaktibhedo 'sti yato na cātmanāṃ tato 'dvayatvaṃ śrutito 'vasīyate // SamUpad_I,19.10 //
analyzed: na śakti bhedaḥ u sti yatas na ca ātmanām tatas dvaya tvam śrutitaḥ vasīyate

original: mithaś ca bhinnā yadi te hi cetanāḥ kṣayas tu teṣāṃ parimāṇayogataḥ /
analyzed: mithas ca bhinnāḥ yadi te hi cetanāḥ kṣayaḥ tu teṣām parimāṇa yogataḥ

original: dhruvo bhaved bhedavatāṃ hi dṛṣṭato jagatkṣayaś cāpi samastamokṣataḥ // SamUpad_I,19.11 //
analyzed: dhruvaḥ bhavet bhedavatām hi dṛṣṭataḥ jagat kṣayaḥ ca api samasta mokṣataḥ

original: na me 'sti kaścin na ca so 'smi kasyacid yato 'dvayo 'haṃ na hi cāsti kalpitam /
analyzed: na me sti kaścid na ca saḥ smi kasyacid yatas ham na hi ca asti kalpitam

original: akalpitaś cāsmi purā prasiddhito vikalpanāyā dvayam eva kalpitam // SamUpad_I,19.12 //
analyzed: akalpitaḥ ca asmi purā prasiddhitaḥ vikalpanāyāḥ dvayam eva kalpitam

original: vikalpanā cāpy abhave na vidyate sad anyad ity evam ato na nāstitā /
analyzed: vikalpanā ca api abhave na vidyate sat anyat iti evam atas na nāstitā

original: yataḥ pravṛttā tava cāpi kalpanā purā prasiddher na ca tad vikalpitam // SamUpad_I,19.13 //
analyzed: yatas pravṛttā tava ca api kalpanā purā prasiddheḥ na ca tat vikalpitam

original: asad dvayaṃ te 'pi hi yad yad īkṣyate na dṛṣṭam ity eva na caiva nāstitā /
analyzed: asat dvayam te hi yat yat īkṣyate na dṛṣṭam iti eva na ca eva na astitā

original: yataḥ pravṛttā sadasadvikalpanā vicāravac cāpi tathādvayaṃ ca sat // SamUpad_I,19.14 //
analyzed: yatas pravṛttā sat asat vikalpanā vicāravat ca api tathā advayam ca sat

original: sad abhyupetaṃ bhavatopakalpitaṃ vicārahetor yadi tasya nāstitā /
analyzed: sat abhyupetam bhavatā upakalpitam vicāra hetoḥ yadi tasya na astitā

original: vicārahānāc ca tathaiva saṃsthitaṃ na cet tad iṣṭaṃ nitarāṃ sad iṣyate // SamUpad_I,19.15 //
analyzed: vicāra hānāt ca tathā eva saṃsthitam na ced tat iṣṭam nitarām sat iṣyate

original: asatsamaṃ caiva sad ity apīti ced anarthavattvāt kharaśṛṅgatulyataḥ /
analyzed: asat samam ca eva sat iti api iti ced anarthavat tvāt khara śṛṅga tulyataḥ

original: anarthavattvaṃ tv asati hy akāraṇaṃ na caiva tasmān na viparyaye 'nyathā // SamUpad_I,19.16 //
analyzed: anarthavat tvam tu asati hi akāraṇam na ca eva tasmāt na viparyaye nyathā

original: asiddhataś cāpi vicārakāraṇād dvayaṃ ca tasmāt prasṛtaṃ hi māyayā /
analyzed: asiddhataḥ ca api vicāra kāraṇāt dvayam ca tasmāt prasṛtam hi māyayā

original: śruteḥ smṛteś cāpi tathā hi yuktitaḥ prasiddhyatītthaṃ na tu yujyate 'nyathā // SamUpad_I,19.17 //
analyzed: śruteḥ smṛteḥ ca api tathā hi yuktitaḥ prasiddhi ati ittham na tu yujyate nyathā

original: vikalpanāc cāpi vidharmakaṃ śruteḥ purā prasiddheś ca vikalpato 'dvayam /
analyzed: vikalpanāt ca api vidharmakam śruteḥ purā prasiddheḥ ca vikalpataḥ dvayam

original: na ceti netīti tathā vikalpitaṃ niṣidhyate 'trāpy avaśeṣasiddhaye // SamUpad_I,19.18 //
analyzed: na ca iti na iti iti tathā vikalpitam niṣidhyate avaśeṣa siddhaye

original: akalpite 'py evam ajādvayākṣare vikalpayantaḥ sad asac ca janmabhiḥ /
analyzed: akalpite pi evam aja advaya akṣare vikalpayantaḥ sat asat ca janmabhiḥ

original: svacittamāyāprabhavaṃ ca te bhavaṃ jarāṃ ca mṛtyuṃ ca niyānti saṃtatam // SamUpad_I,19.19 //
analyzed: sva citta māyā prabhavam ca te bhavam jarām ca mṛtyum ca niyānti saṃtatam

original: bhavābhavatvaṃ tu na ced avasthitir na tasya cānyas tv iti janma nānyathā /
analyzed: bhava abhava tvam tu na ced avasthitiḥ na tasya ca anyaḥ tu iti janma nā anyathā

original: sato hy asattvād asataś ca sattvato na ca kriyā kārakam ity ato 'py ajam // SamUpad_I,19.20 //
analyzed: sataḥ hi a sattvāt asataḥ ca sattvataḥ na ca kriyā kārakam iti atas pi ajam

original: akurvad iṣṭaṃ yadi vāsya kārakaṃ na kiṃcid anyan nanu nāsty akārakam /
analyzed: akurvat iṣṭam yadi vā asya kārakam na kiṃcid anyat nanu nā asti akārakam

original: sato 'viśeṣād asataś ca saccyutau tulāntayor yadvad aniścayān na hi // SamUpad_I,19.21 //
analyzed: sataḥ viśeṣāt asataḥ ca sat cyutau tulā antayoḥ yadvat aniścayāt na hi

original: na cet sa iṣṭaḥ sadasadviparyayaḥ kathaṃ bhavaḥ syāt sadasadvyavasthitau /
analyzed: na ced saḥ iṣṭaḥ sat asat viparyayaḥ katham bhavaḥ syāt sat asat vyavasthitau

original: vibhaktam etad dvayam apy avasthitaṃ na janma tasmāc ca mano hi kasyacit // SamUpad_I,19.22 //
analyzed: vibhaktam etat dvayam api avasthitam na janma tasmāt ca manaḥ hi kasyacid

original: athābhyupetyāpi bhavaṃ tavecchato bravīmi nārthas tava ceṣṭitena me /
analyzed: athā abhyupetya api bhavam tava icchataḥ bravīmi nā arthaḥ tava ceṣṭitena me

original: na hānavṛddhī na yataḥ svato 'sato bhavo 'nyato vā yadi vāstitā tayoḥ // SamUpad_I,19.23 //
analyzed: na hāna vṛddhī na yatas svatas sataḥ bhavaḥ nyatas vā yadi vā astitā tayoḥ

original: dhruvā hy anityāś ca na cānyayogino mithaś ca kāryaṃ na ca teṣu yujyate /
analyzed: dhruvāḥ hi anityāḥ ca na ca anya yoginaḥ mithas ca kāryam na ca teṣu yujyate

original: ato na kasyāpi hi kiṃcid iṣyate svayaṃ hi tattvaṃ na niruktigocaram // SamUpad_I,19.24 //
analyzed: atas na kasya api hi kiṃcid iṣyate svayam hi tattvam na nirukti gocaram

original: samaṃ tu tasmāt satataṃ vibhātavad dvayād vimuktaṃ sadasadvikalpitāt /
analyzed: samam tu tasmāt satatam vibhāta vat dvayāt vimuktam sat asat vikalpitāt

original: nirīkṣya yuktyā śrutitaś ca buddhimān aśeṣanirvāṇam upaiti dīpavat // SamUpad_I,19.25 //
analyzed: nirīkṣya yuktyā śrutitaḥ ca buddhimān aśeṣa nirvāṇam upaiti dīpa vat

original: avedyam ekaṃ yad ananyavedināṃ kutārkikāṇāṃ ca suvedyam anyathā /
analyzed: avedyam ekam yat an anya vedinām ku tārkikāṇām ca su vedyam anyathā

original: nirīkṣya cetthaṃ tv aguṇagraho 'guṇaṃ na yāti mohaṃ grahadoṣamuktitaḥ // SamUpad_I,19.26 //
analyzed: nirīkṣya ca ittham tu aguṇa grahaḥ guṇam na yāti moham graha doṣa muktitaḥ

original: ato 'nyathā na grahanāśa iṣyate vimohabuddher graha eva kāraṇam /
analyzed: atas nyathā na graha nāśaḥ iṣyate vimoha buddheḥ grahaḥ eva kāraṇam

original: graho 'py ahetur hy analas tv anindhano yathā praśāntiṃ paramāṃ tathā vrajet // SamUpad_I,19.27 //
analyzed: grahaḥ u pi ahetuḥ hi analaḥ tu anindhanaḥ yathā praśāntim paramām tathā vrajet

original: vimathya vedodadhitaḥ samuddhṛtaṃ surair mahābdhes tu yathā mahātmabhiḥ /
analyzed: vimathya veda udadhitaḥ samuddhṛtam suraiḥ mahā abdheḥ tu yathā mahātmabhiḥ

original: tathāmṛtaṃ jñānam idaṃ hi yaiḥ purā namo gurubhyaḥ param īkṣitaṃ ca yaiḥ // SamUpad_I,19.28 //
analyzed: tathā amṛtam jñānam idam hi yaiḥ purā namaḥ gurubhyaḥ param īkṣitam ca yaiḥ

original: iti jvaranāśaprakaraṇam // SamUpad_I,19 //
analyzed: iti jvara nāśa prakaraṇam

original: atha mokṣasādhanopadeśavidhiṃ vyākhyāsyāmo mumukṣūṇāṃ śraddadhānānām arthinām arthāya // SamUpad_II,1.1 //
analyzed: atha mokṣa sādhana upadeśa vidhim vyākhyāsyāmaḥ mumukṣūṇām śraddadhānānām arthinām arthāya

original: tad idaṃ mokṣasādhanaṃ jñānaṃ sādhanasādhyād anityāt sarvasmād viraktāya tyaktaputravittalokaiṣaṇāya
analyzed: tat idam mokṣa sādhanam jñānam sādhana sādhyāt anityāt sarvasmāt viraktāya tyakta putra vitta loka eṣaṇāya

original: pratipannaparamahaṃsapārivrājyāya śamadamadayādiyuktāya śāstraprasiddhaśiṣyaguṇasampannāya
analyzed: pratipanna paramahaṃsa pārivrājyāya śama dama dayā ādi yuktāya śāstra prasiddha śiṣya guṇa sampannāya

original: śucaye brāhmaṇāya vidhivad upasannāya śiṣyāya jātikarmavṛttavidyābhijanaiḥ parīkṣitāya
analyzed: śucaye brāhmaṇāya vidhivat upasannāya śiṣyāya jāti karma vṛtta vidyā abhijanaiḥ parīkṣitāya

original: brūyat punaḥ punar yāvad grahaṇaṃ dṛḍhībhavati // SamUpad_II,1.2 //
analyzed: brūyat punar punar yāvat grahaṇam dṛḍhībhavati

original: śrutiś ca -- “parīkṣya ... tattvato brahmavidyām” iti /
analyzed: śrutiḥ ca parīkṣya tattvataḥ brahma vidyām iti

original: dṛḍhagṛhītā hi vidyātmanaḥ śreyase santatyai ca bhavati /
analyzed: dṛḍha gṛhītā hi vidyā ātmanaḥ śreyase santatyai ca bhavati

original: vidyāsantatiś ca prāṇyanugrahāya bhavati naur iva nadīṃ titīrṣoḥ /
analyzed: vidyā santatiḥ ca prāṇi anugrahāya bhavati nauḥ iva nadīm titīrṣoḥ

original: śāstraṃ ca -- “yady apy asmā imām adbhiḥ parigṛhītāṃ dhanasya pūrṇāṃ dadyād etad eva tato bhūyaḥ” iti /
analyzed: śāstram ca  yadi api asmai imām adbhiḥ parigṛhītām dhanasya pūrṇām dadyāt etat eva tatas bhūyaḥ iti

original: anyathā ca jñānaprāptyabhāvāt -- “ācāryavān puruṣo veda“,
analyzed: anyathā ca jñāna prāpti abhāvāt ācāryavān puruṣaḥ veda

original: “ācāryād dhaiva vidyā viditā [sādhiṣṭhaṃ prāpat]“,
analyzed: ācāryāt dha eva vidyā viditā sā adhiṣṭham prāpat

original: “ācāryaḥ plāvayitā tasya [samyag]jñānaṃ plava ihocyate” ityādiśrutibhyaḥ smṛtibhyaś ca // SamUpad_II,1.3 //
analyzed: ācāryaḥ plāvayitā tasya samyak jñānam plavaḥ iha ucyate ityādi śrutibhyaḥ smṛtibhyaḥ ca

original: śiṣyasya jñānāgrahaṇaṃ ca liṅgair buddhvā tadagrahaṇahetūn adharmalaukikapramādanityānitya[vastu]vivekaviṣayāsaṃjātadṛḍhapūrvaśrutatvalokacintāvekṣaṇajātyādyabhimānādīṃs
analyzed: śiṣyasya jñāna agrahaṇam ca liṅgaiḥ buddhvā tad agrahaṇa hetūn adharma laukika pramāda nitya anitya vastu viveka viṣaya asaṃjāta dṛḍha pūrva śruta tva loka cintā avekṣaṇa jāti ādi abhimāna ādīn

original: tatpratipakṣaiḥ śrutismṛtivihitair apanayed akrodhādibhir ahiṃsādibhiś ca yamair
analyzed: tad pratipakṣaiḥ śruti smṛti vihitaiḥ apanayet akrodha ādibhiḥ ahiṃsā ādibhiḥ ca yamaiḥ

original: jñānāviruddhaiś ca niyamaiḥ // SamUpad_II,1.4 //
analyzed: jñāna a viruddhaiḥ ca niyamaiḥ

original: amānitvādiguṇaṃ ca jñānopāyaṃ samyag grāhayet // SamUpad_II,1.5 //
analyzed: amāni tva ādi guṇam ca jñāna upāyam samyak grāhayet

original: ācāryaś cohāpohagrahaṇadhāraṇaśamadamadayānugrahādisampanno labdhāgamo dṛṣṭādṛṣṭabhogeṣv
analyzed: ācāryaḥ ca ūha apoha grahaṇa dhāraṇa śama dama dayā anugraha ādi sampannaḥ labdha āgamaḥ dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭa bhogeṣu

original: anāsaktas tyaktasarvakarmasādhano brahmavid brahmaṇi sthito 'bhinnavṛtto dambhadarpakuhakaśāṭhyamāyāmātsaryānṛtāhaṃkāramamatvādidoṣavarjitaḥ
analyzed: anāsaktaḥ tyakta sarva karma sādhanaḥ brahma vid brahmaṇi sthitaḥ bhinna vṛttaḥ dambha darpa kuhaka śāṭhya māyā mātsarya anṛta ahaṃkāra mamatva ādi doṣa varjitaḥ

original: kevalaparānugrahaprayojano vidyopayogārthī pūrvam upadiśet -- “sad eva somyedam agra
analyzed: kevala para anugraha prayojanaḥ vidyā upayoga arthī pūrvam upadiśet sat eva somya idam agra

original: āsīd ekam evādvitīyam“,
analyzed: āsīt ekam eva advitīyam

original: “yatra nānyat paśyati“,
analyzed: yatra na anyat paśyati

original: “ātmaivedaṃ sarvam“,
analyzed: ātmā eva idam sarvam

original: brahmaivedaṃ sarvam“,
analyzed: brahma eva idam sarvam

original: “ātmā vā idam eka evāgra āsīt“,
analyzed: ātmā vai idam ekaḥ eva agre āsīt

original: “sarvaṃ khalv idaṃ brahma” ity[ādyāḥ] ātmaikatvapratipādanaparāḥ śrutiḥ // SamUpad_II,1.6 //
analyzed: sarvam khalu idam brahma ityādyāḥ ātma ekatva pratipādana parāḥ śrutiḥ

original: upadiśya ca grāhayed brahmaṇo lakṣaṇam -- “ya ātmāpahatapāpmā“,
analyzed: upadiśya ca grāhayet brahmaṇaḥ lakṣaṇam yaḥ ātmā apahata pāpmā

original: “yat sākṣād aparokṣād brahma“,
analyzed: yat sākṣāt aparokṣāt brahma

original: “yo 'śanāyāpipāse“,
analyzed: yaḥ śanāyā pipāse

original: “neti neti“,
analyzed: na iti na iti

original: “asthūlam anaṇu“,
analyzed: a sthūlam an aṇu

original: “sa eṣa neti neti“,
analyzed: saḥ eṣa na iti na iti

original: “adṛṣṭaṃ draṣṭṛ“,
analyzed: a dṛṣṭam draṣṭṛ

original: “vijñānam ānandam“,
analyzed: vijñānam ānandam

original: “satyaṃ jñānam anantam“,
analyzed: satyam jñānam anantam

original: “adṛśye 'nātmye“,
analyzed: adṛśye na ātmye

original: “sa vā eṣaḥ“,
analyzed: sa vai eṣaḥ

original: “aprāṇo hy amanāḥ“,
analyzed: a prāṇaḥ hi a manāḥ

original: “sabāhyābhyantaro hy ajaḥ“,
analyzed: sa bāhya abhyantaraḥ hi ajaḥ

original: “vijñānaghana eva“,
analyzed: vijñāna ghanaḥ eva

original: “anantaram abāhyam“,
analyzed: anantaram abāhyam

original: “anyad eva tad viditād atho aviditāt“,
analyzed: anyat eva tat viditāt atha u a viditāt

original: “ākāśo vai nāma” ityādiśrutibhiḥ // SamUpad_II,1.7 //
analyzed: ākāśaḥ vai nāma ityādi śrutibhiḥ

original: smṛtibhiś ca -- “na jāyate mriyate vā“,
analyzed: smṛtibhiḥ ca na jāyate mriyate vā

original: “nādatte kasyacit pāpam“,
analyzed: na ādatte kasyacid pāpam

original: “yathākāśasthito nityam“,
analyzed: yathā ākāśa sthitaḥ nityam

original: “kṣetrajñāṃ cāpi māṃ viddhi“,
analyzed: kṣetrajñām ca api mām viddhi

original: “na sat tan nāsad ucyate“,
analyzed: na sat tat na asat ucyate

original: “anāditvān nirguṇatvat“,
analyzed: anādi tvāt nirguṇa tvat

original: “samaṃ sarveṣu bhūteṣu“,
analyzed: samam sarveṣu bhūteṣu

original: “uttamaḥ puruṣaḥ” ityādibhiḥ śrutyuktalakṣaṇāviruddhābhiḥ paramātmāsaṃsāritvapratipādanaparābhis tasya sarveṇānanyatvapratipādanaparābhiś ca
analyzed: uttamaḥ puruṣaḥ ityādibhiḥ śruti ukta lakṣaṇa aviruddhābhiḥ paramātma asaṃsāri tva pratipādana parābhiḥ tasya sarveṇa ananyatva pratipādana parābhiḥ ca

original: evaṃ śrutismṛtibhir gṛhītaparamātmalakṣaṇaṃ śiṣyaṃ saṃsārasāgarād uttitīrṣuṃ pṛcchet -- kas tvam asi somyeti // SamUpad_II,1.9 //
analyzed: evam śruti smṛtibhiḥ gṛhīta paramātma lakṣaṇam śiṣyam saṃsāra sāgarāt uttitīrṣum pṛcchet  kaḥ tvam asi somya iti

original: sa yadi brūyāt -- brāhmaṇaputro 'donvayo brahmacāry āsaṃ gṛhastho vedānīm asmi paramahaṃsaparivrāṭ saṃsārasāgarāj janmamṛtyumahāgrāhād uttitīrṣur  #
analyzed: sa yadi brūyāt  brāhmaṇa putraḥ donvayaḥ brahmacārī āsam gṛhasthaḥ vedānīm asmi paramahaṃsa parivrāj saṃsāra sāgarāt janma mṛtyu mahā grāhāt uttitīrṣuḥ  /

original: iti // SamUpad_II,1.10 //
analyzed: iti

original: ācāryo brūyad -- ihaiva te somya mṛtasya śarīraṃ vayobhir adyate mṛdbhāvaṃ vāpadyate,
analyzed: ācāryaḥ brūyat iha eva te somya mṛtasya śarīram vayobhiḥ adyate mṛd bhāvam vā āpadyate

original: tatra kathaṃ saṃsārasāgarād uttartum icchasīti /
analyzed: tatra katham saṃsāra sāgarāt uttartum icchasi iti

original: nahi nadyā avare kūle bhasmībhūto nadyāḥ pāraṃ tariṣyasīti // SamUpad_II,1.11 //
analyzed: nahi nadyāḥ avare kūle bhasmībhūtaḥ nadyāḥ pāram tariṣyasi iti

original: sa yadi brūyāt -- anyo 'haṃ śarīrāt /
analyzed: sa yadi brūyāt anyaḥ ham śarīrāt

original: śarīraṃ tu jāyate mriyate,
analyzed: śarīram tu jāyate mriyate

original: vayobhir adyate mṛdbhāvam āpadyate,
analyzed: vayobhiḥ adyate mṛd bhāvam āpadyate

original: śastrāgnyādibhiś ca vināśyate,
analyzed: śastra agni ādibhiḥ ca vināśyate

original: vyādhyādibhiś ca yujyate /
analyzed: vyādhi ādibhiḥ ca yujyate

original: tasminn ahaṃ svakṛtadharmādharmavaśāt pakṣī nīḍam iva praviṣṭaḥ punaḥ punaḥ śarīravināśe dharmādharmavaśāc charīrāntaraṃ yāsyāmi,
analyzed: tasmin aham sva kṛta dharma adharma vaśāt pakṣī nīḍam iva praviṣṭaḥ punar punar śarīra vināśe dharma adharma vaśāt śarīra antaram yāsyāmi

original: pūrvanīḍavināśe pakṣīva nīḍāntaram /
analyzed: pūrva nīḍa vināśe pakṣī iva nīḍa antaram

original: evam evāham anādau saṃsāre devatiryaṅmanuṣyanirayasthāneṣu svakarmavaśād upāttam upāttaṃ śarīraṃ tyajan,
analyzed: evam eva aham anādau saṃsāre deva tiryak manuṣya niraya sthāneṣu sva karma vaśāt upāttam upāttam śarīram tyajan

original: navaṃ navaṃ cānyad upādadāno,
analyzed: navam navam ca anyat upādadānaḥ

original: janmamaraṇaprabandhacakre ghaṭīyantravat svakarmaṇā bhrāmyamāṇaḥ krameṇedaṃ śarīram
analyzed: janma maraṇa prabandha cakre ghaṭīyantra vat sva karmaṇā bhrāmyamāṇaḥ krameṇa idam śarīram

original: āsādya saṃsāracakrabhramaṇād asmān nirviṇṇo bhagavantam upasanno 'smi saṃsāracakrabhramaṇapraśamāyeti /
analyzed: āsādya saṃsāra cakra bhramaṇāt asmāt nirviṇṇaḥ bhagavantam upasannaḥ smi saṃsāra cakra bhramaṇa praśamāya iti

original: tasmān nitya evāhaṃ śarīrād anyaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt nityaḥ eva aham śarīrāt anyaḥ

original: śarīrāṇy āgacchanty apagacchanti ca vāsāṃṣīva puruṣasyeti // SamUpad_II,1.12 //
analyzed: śarīrāṇi āgacchanti apagacchanti ca vāsāṃṣi iva puruṣasya iti

original: ācāryo brūyat -- sādhv avādiḥ samyak paśyasi /
analyzed: ācāryaḥ brūyat sādhu a vādiḥ samyak paśyasi

original: kathaṃ mṛṣāvādīr brāhmaṇaputro 'donvayo brahmacāry āsam,
analyzed: katham mṛṣāvādīḥ brāhmaṇa putraḥ donvayaḥ brahmacārī āsam

original: gṛhastho vā,
analyzed: gṛhasthaḥ vā

original: idānīm asmi paramahaṃsaparivrāḍ iti // SamUpad_II,1.13 //
analyzed: idānīm asmi paramahaṃsa parivrāj iti

original: sa yadi brūyāt -- bhagavan,
analyzed: sa yadi brūyāt bhagavan

original: katham ahaṃ mṛṣāvādiṣam iti // SamUpad_II,1.14 //
analyzed: katham aham mṛṣā vādiṣam iti

original: taṃ prati brūyād ācāryaḥ -- yatas tvaṃ bhinnajātyanvayasaṃskāraṃ śarīraṃ jātyanvayasaṃskāravarjitasyātmanaḥ
analyzed: tam prati brūyāt ācāryaḥ yatas tvam bhinna jāti anvaya saṃskāram śarīram jāti anvaya saṃskāra varjitasya ātmanaḥ

original: pratyajñāsīr brāhmaṇaputro 'donvaya ityādinā vākyeneti // SamUpad_II,1.15 //
analyzed: pratyajñāsīḥ brāhmaṇa putraḥ donvayaḥ ityādinā vākyena iti

original: sa yadi pṛcchet -- kathaṃ bhinnajātyanvayasaṃskāraṃ śarīram,
analyzed: sa yadi pṛcchet katham bhinna jāti anvaya saṃskāram śarīram

original: kathaṃ vāhaṃ jātyanvayasaṃskāravarjita iti // SamUpad_II,1.16 //
analyzed: katham vā aham jāti anvaya saṃskāra varjitaḥ iti

original: ācāryo brūyat -- śṛṇu somya yathedaṃ śarīraṃ tvatto bhinnaṃ bhinnajātyanvayasaṃskāraṃ tvaṃ ca jātyanvayasaṃskāravarjita ity uktvā taṃ smārayet  #
analyzed: ācāryaḥ brūyat śṛṇu somya yathā idam śarīram tvattaḥ bhinnam bhinna jāti anvaya saṃskāram tvam ca jāti anvaya saṃskāra varjitaḥ iti uktvā tam smārayet  /

original: -- smartum arhasi somya,
analyzed: smartum arhasi somya

original: paramātmānaṃ sarvātmānaṃ yathoktalakṣaṇaṃ śrāvito 'si “sad eva somyedam” ityādi[bhiḥ] śrutibhiḥ smṛtibhiś ca /
analyzed: paramātmānam sarva ātmānam yathā ukta lakṣaṇam si sat eva somya idam ityādibhiḥ śrutibhiḥ smṛtibhiḥ ca

original: lakṣaṇaṃ ca tasya śrutibhiḥ smṛtibhiś ca // SamUpad_II,1.17 //
analyzed: lakṣaṇam ca tasya śrutibhiḥ smṛtibhiḥ ca

original: labdhaparamātmalakṣaṇasmṛtaye brūyāt -- yo 'sāv ākāśanāmā nāmarūpābhyām arthāntarabhūto
analyzed: labdha paramātma lakṣaṇa smṛtaye brūyāt saḥ ākāśa nāmā nāma rūpābhyām artha antara bhūtaḥ

original: 'śarīro 'sthūlādilakṣaṇo 'pahatapāpmatvādilakṣaṇaś ca sarvaiḥ saṃsāradharmair anāgandhitaḥ
analyzed: śarīraḥ sthūla ādi lakṣaṇaḥ pahata pāpma tva ādi lakṣaṇaḥ ca sarvaiḥ saṃsāra dharmaiḥ an āgandhitaḥ

original: “yat sākṣād aparokṣād brahma ... eṣa ta ātmā sarvāntaraḥ“,
analyzed: yat sākṣāt a parokṣāt brahma eṣa te ātmā sarva antaraḥ

original: “adṛṣṭo draṣṭā,
analyzed: a dṛṣṭaḥ draṣṭā

original: aśrutaḥ śrotā,
analyzed: a śrutaḥ śrotā

original: amato mantā,
analyzed: amataḥ mantā

original: avijñāto vijñāta” nityavijñānasvarūpo 'nantaro 'bāhyaḥ,
analyzed: avijñātaḥ vijñāta nitya vijñāna svarūpaḥ nantaraḥ bāhyaḥ

original: “vijñānaghana eva“,
analyzed: vijñāna ghanaḥ eva

original: paripūrṇa ākāśavat,
analyzed: paripūrṇaḥ ākāśa vat

original: anantaśaktiḥ,
analyzed: ananta śaktiḥ

original: ātmā sarvasya,
analyzed: ātmā sarvasya

original: aśanāyādivarjitaḥ,
āvirbhāvatirobhāvavarjitaś ca svātmavilakṣaṇayor nāmarūpayor jagadbījabhūtayoḥ svātmasthayoḥ
analyzed: āvirbhāva tirobhāva varjitaḥ ca svātma vilakṣaṇayoḥ nāma rūpayoḥ jagat bīja bhūtayoḥ svātma sthayoḥ

original: tattvānyatvābhyām anirvacanīyayoḥ svasaṃvedyayoḥ sadbhāvamātreṇācintyaśaktitvād vyākartāvyākṛtayoḥ // SamUpad_II,1.18 //
analyzed: tattva anya tvābhyām anirvacanīyayoḥ sva saṃvedyayoḥ sadbhāva mātreṇa acintya śakti tvāt vyākartā avyākṛtayoḥ

original: te nāmarūpe 'vyākṛte satī vyākriyamāṇe tasmād etasmād ātmana ākāśanāmākṛtī saṃvṛtte /
analyzed: te nāma rūpe vyākṛte satī vyākriyamāṇe tasmāt etasmāt ātmanaḥ ākāśa nāma ākṛtī saṃvṛtte

original: tac cākāśakhyaṃ bhūtam anena prakāreṇa paramātmanaḥ sambhūtaṃ prasannāt salilān malam iva phenam /
analyzed: tat ca ākāśa khyam bhūtam anena prakāreṇa paramātmanaḥ sambhūtam prasannāt salilāt malam iva phenam

original: na salilaṃ na ca salilād atyantabhinnaṃ phenam /
analyzed: na salilam na ca salilāt atyanta bhinnam phenam

original: salilavyatirekeṇādarśanāt /
analyzed: salila vyatirekeṇa adarśanāt

original: salilaṃ tu svaccham anyat phenān malarūpāt /
analyzed: salilam tu svaccham anyat phenāt mala rūpāt

original: evaṃ paramātmā nāmarūpābhyām anyaḥ phenasthānīyābhyāṃ śuddhaḥ prasannas tadvilakṣaṇaḥ /
analyzed: evam paramātmā nāma rūpābhyām anyaḥ phena sthānīyābhyām śuddhaḥ prasannaḥ tad vilakṣaṇaḥ

original: te nāmarūpe 'vyākṛte satī vyākriyamāṇe phenasthānīye ākāśanāmākṛtī saṃvṛtte // SamUpad_II,1.19 //
analyzed: te nāma rūpe vyākṛte satī vyākriyamāṇe phena sthānīye ākāśa nāma ākṛtī saṃvṛtte

original: tato 'pi sthūlabhāvam āpadyamāne nāmarūpe vyākriyamāṇe vāyubhāvam āpadyete,
analyzed: tatas pi sthūla bhāvam āpadyamāne nāma rūpe vyākriyamāṇe vāyu bhāvam āpadyete

original: tato 'py agnibhāvam,
analyzed: tatas pi agni bhāvam

original: agner abhāvam,
analyzed: agneḥ abhāvam

original: tataḥ pṛthvībhāvam ity evaṃkrameṇa pūrvapūrvo[ttaro]ttarānupraveśena pañcamahābhūtāni pṛthivyantāny utpannāni /
analyzed: tatas pṛthvī bhāvam iti evaṃkrameṇa pūrva pūrva uttara uttara anupraveśena pañca mahābhūtāni pṛthivī antāni utpannāni

original: tataḥ pañcamahābhūtaguṇaviśiṣṭā pṛth[i]vī /
analyzed: tatas pañca mahābhūta guṇa viśiṣṭā pṛthivī

original: pṛth[i]vyāś ca pañcātmakyo vrīhiyavādyā oṣadhayo jāyante /
analyzed: pṛthivyāḥ ca pañca ātmakyaḥ vrīhi yava ādyāḥ oṣadhayaḥ jāyante

original: tābhyo bhakṣitābhyo lohitaṃ śukraṃ ca strīpuṃsaśarīrasaṃbandhi jāyate /
analyzed: tābhyaḥ bhakṣitābhyaḥ lohitam śukram ca strīpuṃsa śarīra saṃbandhi jāyate

original: tad ubhayam ṛtukāle 'vidyāprayuktakāmakhajanirmathanodbhūtaṃ mantrasaṃskṛtaṃ garbhāśaye niṣicyate /
analyzed: tat ubhayam ṛtu kāle vidyā prayukta kāma khaja nirmathana udbhūtam mantra saṃskṛtam garbhāśaye niṣicyate

original: tat svayonirasānupraveśena vivardhamānaṃ garbhībhūtaṃ daśame navame vā māsi sañjāyate // SamUpad_II,1.20 //
analyzed: tat sva yoni rasa anupraveśena vivardhamānam garbhībhūtam daśame navame vā māsi sañjāyate

original: taj jātaṃ labdhanāmākṛtikaṃ jātakarmādibhir mantrasaṃskṛtaṃ punar upanayanasaṃskārayogena brahmacārisaṃjñaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: tat jātam labdha nāma ākṛtikam jātakarma ādibhiḥ mantra saṃskṛtam punar upanayana saṃskāra yogena brahmacāri saṃjñam bhavati

original: tad eva śarīraṃ patnīsaṃyogasaṃskārayogena gṛhasthasaṃjñaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: tat eva śarīram patnī saṃyoga saṃskāra yogena gṛhastha saṃjñam bhavati

original: tad eva vanasthasaṃskāreṇa tāpasasaṃjñaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: tat eva vanastha saṃskāreṇa tāpasa saṃjñam bhavati

original: tad eva kriyāvinivṛttinimittasaṃskāreṇa parivrāṭsaṃjñaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: tat eva kriyā vinivṛtti nimitta saṃskāreṇa parivrāj saṃjñam bhavati

original: ity evaṃ tvatto bhinnaṃ bhinnajātyanvayasaṃskāraṃ śarīram // SamUpad_II,1.21 //
analyzed: iti evam tvattaḥ bhinnam bhinna jāti anvaya saṃskāram śarīram

original: manaś cendriyāṇi ca nāmarūpātmakāny eva “annamayaṃ hi somya manaḥ” ityādiśrutibhyaḥ // SamUpad_II,1.22 //
analyzed: manaḥ ca indriyāṇi ca nāma rūpa ātmakāni eva anna mayam hi somya manaḥ ityādi śrutibhyaḥ

original: kathaṃ cāhaṃ bhinnajātyanvayasaṃskāravarjita ity etac chṛṇu /
analyzed: katham ca aham bhinna jāti anvaya saṃskāra varjitaḥ iti etat śṛṇu

original: yo 'sau nāmarūpayor vyākartā nāmarūpadharmavilakṣaṇaḥ sa eva nāmarūpe vyākurvan sṛṣṭvedaṃ
analyzed: yaḥ sau nāma rūpayoḥ vyākartā nāma rūpa dharma vilakṣaṇaḥ saḥ eva nāma rūpe vyākurvan sṛṣṭvā idam

original: śarīraṃ svayaṃ saṃskāradharmavarjito nāmarūpa iha praviṣṭo 'nyair adṛṣṭaḥ svayaṃ
analyzed: śarīram svayam saṃskāra dharma varjitaḥ nāma rūpe iha praviṣṭaḥ nyaiḥ adṛṣṭaḥ svayam

original: paśyaṃs tathāśrutaḥ śṛṇvann amato manvāno 'vijñāto vijānan -- “sarvāṇi rūpāṇi vicitya
analyzed: paśyan tathā śrutaḥ śṛṇvan amataḥ manvānaḥ vijñātaḥ vijānan sarvāṇi rūpāṇi vicitya

original: dhīro nāmāni kṛtvābhivadan yad āste” iti /
analyzed: dhīraḥ nāmāni kṛtvā abhivadan yat āste iti

original: asminn arthe śrutayaḥ sahasraśaḥ “tat sṛṣṭvā tad evānuprāviṣat“. “antaḥ praviṣṭaḥ śāstā janānām“,
analyzed: asmin arthe śrutayaḥ sahasraśas tat sṛṣṭvā tat eva anuprāviṣat antar praviṣṭaḥ śāstā janānām

original: “sa eṣa iha praviṣṭaḥ“,
analyzed: saḥ eṣaḥ iha praviṣṭaḥ

original: “eṣa ta ātmā“,
analyzed: eṣa te ātmā

original: “sa etam eva sīmānaṃ vidāryaitayā dvārā prāpadyata“,
analyzed: saḥ etam eva sīmānam vidārya etayā dvārā prāpadyata

original: “eṣa sarveṣu bhūteṣu gūḍho 'tmā“,
analyzed: eṣa sarveṣu bhūteṣu gūḍhaḥ ā tmā

original: “seyaṃ devataikṣata hantāham imās tisro devatāḥ“,
analyzed: sā iyam devatā aikṣata hanta aham imāḥ tisraḥ devatāḥ

original: “aśarīraṃ śarīreṣu” ityādyāḥ // SamUpad_II,1.23 //
analyzed: aśarīram śarīreṣu ityādyāḥ

original: smṛtayo 'pi “ātmaiva devatāḥ sarvāḥ“,
analyzed: smṛtayaḥ pi ātmā eva devatāḥ sarvāḥ

original: “navadvāre pure dehī“,
analyzed: nava dvāre pure dehī

original: “kṣetrajñaṃ cāpi māṃ viddhi“,
analyzed: kṣetrajñam ca api mām viddhi

original: “samaṃ sarveṣu bhūteṣu“,
analyzed: samam sarveṣu bhūteṣu

original: “upadraṣṭānumantā ca“,
analyzed: upadraṣṭā anumantā ca

original: “uttamaḥ puruṣas tv anyaḥ” ityādyāḥ /
analyzed: uttamaḥ puruṣaḥ tu anyaḥ ityādyāḥ

original: tasmāj jātyanvayasaṃskāravarjitas tvam iti siddham // SamUpad_II,1.24 //
analyzed: tasmāt jāti anvaya saṃskāra varjitaḥ tvam iti siddham

original: sa yadi brūyāt -- anya evāham ajñaḥ sukhī duḥkhī baddhaḥ saṃsārī,
analyzed: sa yadi brūyāt anyaḥ eva aham ajñaḥ sukhī duḥkhī baddhaḥ saṃsārī

original: anyo 'sau madvilakṣaṇo 'saṃsārī devaḥ,
analyzed: anyaḥ sau mad vilakṣaṇaḥ saṃsārī devaḥ

original: tam ahaṃ balyupahāranamaskārādibhir varṇāśramakarmabhiś cārādhya saṃsārasāgarād uttitīrṣur asmi,
analyzed: tam aham bali upahāra namaskāra ādibhiḥ varṇa āśrama karmabhiḥ ca ārādhya saṃsāra sāgarāt uttitīrṣuḥ asmi

original: katham ahaṃ sa eveti // SamUpad_II,1.25 //
analyzed: katham aham saḥ eva iti

original: ācāryo brūyat -- naivaṃ somya pratipattum arhasi,
analyzed: ācāryaḥ brūyat na evam somya pratipattum arhasi

original: pratiṣiddhatvād bhedapratipatteḥ /
analyzed: pratiṣiddha tvāt bheda pratipatteḥ

original: kathaṃ pratiṣiddhā bhedapratipattir ity ata āha -- “anyo 'sāv anyo 'ham asmīti na sa veda“,
analyzed: katham pratiṣiddhā bheda pratipattiḥ iti atas āha anyaḥ sau anyaḥ ham asmi iti na sa veda

original: “brahma taṃ parādād yo 'nyatrātmano brahma veda“,
analyzed: brahma tam parādāt yaḥ nyatra ātmanaḥ brahma veda

original: mṛtyoḥ sa mṛtyum āpnoti ya iha nāneva paśyati” ityevamādyāḥ // SamUpad_II,1.26 //
analyzed: mṛtyoḥ sa mṛtyum āpnoti yaḥ iha nānā iva paśyati iti evamādyāḥ

original: etā eva śrutayo bhedapratipatteḥ saṃsāragamanaṃ darśayanti // SamUpad_II,1.27 //
analyzed: etāḥ eva śrutayaḥ bheda pratipatteḥ saṃsāra gamanam darśayanti

original: abhedapratipatteś ca mokṣaṃ darśayanti sahasraśaḥ -- “sa ātmā tat tvam asi” iti paramātmabhāvaṃ
analyzed: abheda pratipatteḥ ca mokṣam darśayanti sahasraśas saḥ ātmā tat tvam asi iti paramātma bhāvam

original: vidhāya “ācāryavān puruṣo veda” ity uktvā “tasya tāvad eva ciram” iti mokṣaṃ darśayanty
analyzed: vidhāya ācāryavān puruṣaḥ veda iti uktvā tasya tāvat eva ciram iti mokṣam darśayanti

original: abhedavijñānād eva satyasandhasyātaskarasyeva dāhādyabhāvadṛṣṭāntena saṃsārābhāvaṃ darśayanti,
analyzed: abheda vijñānāt eva satya sandhasya a taskarasya iva dāha ādi abhāva dṛṣṭāntena saṃsāra abhāvam darśayanti

original: bhedadarśanād asatyābhisandhasya saṃsāragamanaṃ darśayanti taskarasyeva dāhādidṛṣṭāntena // SamUpad_II,1.28 //
analyzed: bheda darśanāt asatya abhisandhasya saṃsāra gamanam darśayanti taskarasya iva dāha ādi dṛṣṭāntena

original: “ta iha vyāghro vā” ityādinā cābhedadarśanāt “[sa] sarvāḍ bhavati” ity uktvā tadviparītena
analyzed: te iha vyāghraḥ vai ityādinā ca abheda darśanāt sa sarvāj bhavati iti uktvā tad viparītena

original: bhedadarśanena saṃsāragamanaṃ darśayanti -- “atha ye 'nyathāto vidur anyarājānas
analyzed: bheda darśanena saṃsāra gamanam darśayanti atha ye nyathā atas viduḥ anya rājānaḥ

original: te kṣayyalokā bhavanti” iti pratiśākham /
analyzed: te kṣayya lokāḥ bhavanti iti pratiśākham

original: tasmān mṛṣaivāvādīḥ -- brāhmaṇaputro 'donvayaḥ saṃsārī paramātmavilakṣaṇa iti // SamUpad_II,1.29 //
analyzed: tasmāt mṛṣā eva avādīḥ brāhmaṇa putraḥ donvayaḥ saṃsārī paramātma vilakṣaṇaḥ iti

original: tasmāt pratiṣiddhatvād bhedadarśanasya,
analyzed: tasmāt pratiṣiddha tvāt bheda darśanasya

original: bhedaviṣayatvāc ca karmopādānasya,
analyzed: bheda viṣaya tvāt ca karma upādānasya

original: karmasādhanatvāc ca yajñopavītādeḥ karmasādhanopādānasya paramātmābhedapratipattyā pratiṣedhaḥ kṛto veditavyaḥ /
analyzed: karma sādhana tvāt ca yajñopavīta ādeḥ karma sādhana upādānasya paramātma abheda pratipattyā pratiṣedhaḥ kṛtaḥ veditavyaḥ

original: karmaṇāṃ tatsādhanānāṃ ca yajñopavītādīnāṃ paramātmābhedapratipattiviruddhatvāt /
analyzed: karmaṇām tad sādhanānām ca yajñopavīta ādīnām paramātma abheda pratipatti viruddha tvāt

original: saṃsāriṇo hi karmāṇi vidhīyante tatsādhanāni ca yajñopavītādīni,
analyzed: saṃsāriṇaḥ hi karmāṇi vidhīyante tad sādhanāni ca yajñopavīta ādīni

original: na paramātmano 'bhedadarśinaḥ /
analyzed: na paramātmanaḥ bheda darśinaḥ

original: bhedadarśanamātreṇa ca tato 'nyatvam // SamUpad_II,1.30 //
analyzed: bheda darśana mātreṇa ca tatas

original: yadi ca karmāṇi kartavyāni na nivartayiṣitāni karmasādhanāsambandhinaḥ karmanimittajātyāśramādyasambandhinaś
analyzed: yadi ca karmāṇi kartavyāni na karma sādhana asambandhinaḥ karma nimitta jāti āśrama ādi asambandhinaḥ

original: ca paramātmana ātmanaivābhedapratipattiṃ nāvakṣyat “sa ātmā tat tvam asi” ityevamādibhir
analyzed: ca paramātmanaḥ ātmanā eva abheda pratipattim na avakṣyat saḥ ātmā tat tvam asi iti evamādibhiḥ

original: niścitarūpair vākyaiḥ,
analyzed: niścita rūpaiḥ vākyaiḥ

original: bhedapratipattinindāṃ ca nābhyadhāsyat “eṣa nityo mahimā brāhmaṇasya“,
analyzed: bheda pratipatti nindām ca na abhyadhāsyat eṣa nityaḥ mahimā brāhmaṇasya

original: “ananvāgataṃ puṇyenānanvāgataṃ pāpena“,
analyzed: an anvāgatam puṇyena an anvāgatam pāpena

original: “atra steno 'stenaḥ” ityādinā // SamUpad_II,1.31 //
analyzed: atra stenaḥ stenaḥ ityādinā

original: karmāsambandharūpatvaṃ karmanimittavarṇādyasambandharūpatāṃ [ca] nābhyadhāsyat,
analyzed: karma asambandha rūpa tvam karma nimitta varṇa ādi asambandha rūpa tām ca nā abhyadhāsyat

original: karmāṇi [ca] karmasādhanāni [ca] yajñopavītādīni yady aparitityājayiṣitāni /
analyzed: karmāṇi ca karma sādhanāni ca yajñopavīta ādīni yadi

original: tasmāt sasādhanaṃ karma parityaktavyaṃ mumukṣuṇā paramātmābhedadarśanavirodhāt /
analyzed: tasmāt sa sādhanam karma parityaktavyam mumukṣuṇā paramātma abheda darśana virodhāt

original: ātmā ca para eveti pratipattavyo yathāśrutyuktalakṣaṇaḥ // SamUpad_II,1.32 //
analyzed: ātmā ca paraḥ eva iti pratipattavyaḥ yathāśruti ukta lakṣaṇaḥ

original: sa yadi brūyāt -- bhagavan,
analyzed: sa yadi brūyāt bhagavan

original: dahyamāne chidyamāne vā dehe pratyakṣā vedanā,
analyzed: dahyamāne chidyamāne vā dehe pratyakṣā vedanā

original: aśanāyādinimittaṃ ca pratyakṣaṃ duḥkhaṃ mama /
analyzed: aśanāya ādi nimittam ca pratyakṣam duḥkham mama

original: paraś cātmā “apahatapāpmā vijaro vimṛtyur viśoko vijighatso 'pipāsaḥ” sarvasaṃsāradharmavivarjitaḥ śrūyate sarvaśrutiṣu smṛtiṣu ca /
analyzed: paraḥ ca ātmā apahata pāpmā vijaraḥ vimṛtyuḥ viśokaḥ vijighatsaḥ pipāsaḥ sarva saṃsāra dharma vivarjitaḥ śrūyate sarva śrutiṣu smṛtiṣu ca

original: kathaṃ tadvilakṣaṇo 'nekasaṃsāradharmasaṃyuktaḥ paramātmānam ātmatvena māṃ ca saṃsāriṇaṃ paramātmatvenāgnim iva śītatvena pratipadyeyam /
analyzed: katham tad vilakṣaṇaḥ neka saṃsāra dharma saṃyuktaḥ paramātmānam ātma tvena mām ca saṃsāriṇam paramātma tvena agnim iva śīta tvena pratipadyeyam

original: saṃsārī ca san sarvābhyudayaniḥśreyasasādhane 'dhikṛto 'bhyudayaniḥśreyasasādhanāni karmāṇi tatsādhanāni ca yajñopavītādīni kathaṃ parityajeyam  #
analyzed: saṃsārī ca san sarva abhyudaya niḥśreyasa sādhane dhikṛtaḥ bhyudaya niḥśreyasa sādhanāni karmāṇi tad sādhanāni ca yajñopavīta ādīni katham parityajeyam

original: iti // SamUpad_II,1.33 //
analyzed: iti

original: taṃ prati brūyāt -- yad avoco dahyamāne chidyamāne vā dehe pratyakṣā vedanopalabhyate mameti tad asat /
analyzed: tam prati brūyāt yat avocaḥ dahyamāne chidyamāne vā dehe pratyakṣā vedanā upalabhyate mama iti tat asat

original: kasmat /
analyzed: kasmat

original: dahyamāne chidyamāna iva vrkṣa upalabdhur upalabhyamāne karmaṇi śarīre dāhacchedavedanāyā upalabhyamānatvād dāhādisamānāśrayaiva vedanā /
analyzed: dahyamāne chidyamāne iva vrkṣe upalabdhuḥ upalabhyamāne karmaṇi śarīre dāha cheda vedanāyāḥ upalabhyamāna tvāt dāha ādi samāna āśrayā eva vedanā

original: yatra hi dāhaś chedo vā kriyate tatraiva vyapadiśati dāhādivedanāṃ loko na dāhādyupalabdharīti /
analyzed: yatra hi dāhaḥ chedaḥ vā kriyate tatra eva vyapadiśati dāha ādi vedanām lokaḥ na

original: katham /
analyzed: katham

original: kva te vedaneti pṛṣṭaḥ śirasi me vedanorasy udara iti yatra dāhādis tatra vyapadiśati,
analyzed: kva te vedanā iti pṛṣṭaḥ śirasi me vedanā urasi udare iti yatra dāha ādiḥ tatra vyapadiśati

original: nopalabdharīti /
analyzed: na upalabdhari iti

original: yady upalabdhari vedanā syād vedanānimittaṃ vā dāhacchedādi,
analyzed: yadi upalabdhari vedanā syāt vedanā nimittam vā dāha cheda ādi

original: vedanāśrayatvenopadiśed dāhādyāśrayāvat // SamUpad_II,1.34 //
analyzed: vedanā āśraya tvena upadiśet dāha ādi āśrayā vat

original: svayaṃ ca nopalabhyeta cakṣurgatarūpavat /
analyzed: svayam ca na upalabhyeta cakṣuḥ gata rūpa vat

original: tasmād dāhacchedādisamānāśrayatvenopalabhyamānatvād dāhādivat karmabhūtaiva vedanā /
analyzed: tasmāt dāha cheda ādi samāna āśraya tvena upalabhyamāna tvāt dāha ādi vat karma bhūtā eva vedanā

original: bhāvarūpatvāc ca sāśrayā taṇḍulapākavat /
analyzed: bhāva rūpa tvāt ca sa āśrayā taṇḍula pāka vat

original: vedanāsamānāśraya eva tatsaṃskāraḥ /
analyzed: vedanā samāna āśrayaḥ eva tad saṃskāraḥ

original: smṛtisamānakāla evopalabhyamānatvāt /
analyzed: smṛti samāna kāle eva upalabhyamāna tvāt

original: vedanāviṣayas tannimittaviṣayaś ca dveṣo 'pi saṃskārasamānāśraya eva /
analyzed: vedanā viṣayaḥ tad nimitta viṣayaḥ ca dveṣaḥ saṃskāra samāna āśrayaḥ eva

original: tathā coktam -- “rūpasaṃskāratulyādhī rāgadveṣau bhayaṃ ca yat /
analyzed: tathā ca uktam rūpa saṃskāra tulya adhī rāga dveṣau bhayam ca yat

original: gṛhyate dhīśrayaṃ tasmāj jñātā śuddho 'bhayaḥ sadā” // SamUpad_II,1.35 //
analyzed: gṛhyate dhī śrayam tasmāt jñātā śuddhaḥ bhayaḥ sadā

original: kimāśrayaḥ punā rūpādisaṃskārādaya iti /
analyzed: kimāśrayaḥ rūpa ādi saṃskāra ādayaḥ iti

original: ucyate /
analyzed: ucyate

original: yatra kāmādāyaḥ /
analyzed: yatra kāma ādāyaḥ

original: kva punas te kāmādayaḥ /
analyzed: kva punar te kāma ādayaḥ

original: “kāmaḥ saṅkalpo vicikitsā” ityādiśruter buddhāv eva /
analyzed: kāmaḥ saṅkalpaḥ vicikitsā ityādi śruteḥ buddhau eva

original: tatraiva rūpādisaṃskāradayo 'pi,
analyzed: tatra eva rūpa ādi saṃskāra dayaḥ pi

original: “kasmin nu rūpāṇi pratiṣṭhitānīti hṛdaye” iti śruteḥ /
analyzed: kasmin nu rūpāṇi pratiṣṭhitāni iti hṛdaye iti śruteḥ

original: “kāmā ye 'sya hṛdi śritāḥ“,
analyzed: kāmāḥ ye sya hṛdi śritāḥ

original: “tīrṇo hi “,
analyzed: tīrṇaḥ hi

original: “asaṅgo hy ayam“,
analyzed: a saṅgaḥ hi ayam

original: “tad vā asyaitad aticchandāḥ” ityādiśrutiśatebhyaḥ,
analyzed: tat vai asya etat aticchandāḥ ityādi śruti śatebhyaḥ

original: “avikāryo 'yam ucyate“,
analyzed: a vikāryaḥ yam ucyate

original: “anāditvān nirguṇatvāt” ityādi -- icchādveṣādi ca kṣetrasyaiva viṣayasya dharmo nātmana iti -- smṛtibhyaś ca karmasthaivāśuddhir nātmasthā
analyzed: anādi tvāt nirguṇa tvāt ityādi icchā dveṣa ādi ca kṣetrasya eva viṣayasya dharmaḥ na ātmanaḥ iti smṛtibhyaḥ ca karma sthā eva aśuddhiḥ na ātma sthā

original: ato rūpādisaṃskārādyaśuddhisaṃbandhābhāvān na parasmād ātmano vilakṣaṇas tvam iti
analyzed: atas rūpa ādi saṃskāra ādi aśuddhi saṃbandha abhāvāt na parasmāt ātmanaḥ vilakṣaṇaḥ tvam iti

original: pratyakṣādivirodhābhāvād yuktaṃ para evātmāham iti pratipattum -- “tad ātmānam evāved [ahaṃ brahmāsmi]“,
analyzed: pratyakṣa ādi virodha abhāvāt yuktam paraḥ eva ātmā aham iti pratipattum tat ātmānam eva avet aham brahma asmi

original: “ekadhaivānudraṣṭavyam“,
analyzed: ekadhā eva anudraṣṭavyam

original: “aham evādhastāt“,
analyzed: aham eva adhastāt

original: “ātmaivādhastāt“,
analyzed: ātmā eva adhastāt

original: “sarvam ātmānaṃ paśyet“,
analyzed: sarvam ātmānam paśyet

original: “yatra tv asya sarvam ātmaiva“,
analyzed: yatra tu asya sarvam ātmā eva

original: “idaṃ sarvaṃ yad ayam ātma“,
analyzed: idam sarvam yat ayam ātma

original: “sa eṣo ['kalaḥ ]“,
analyzed: saḥ eṣa u kalaḥ

original: “anantaram abāhyam“,
analyzed: anantaram abāhyam

original: “sabāhyābhyantaro hy ajaḥ“,
analyzed: sa bāhya abhyantaraḥ hi ajaḥ

original: “brahmaivedam“,
analyzed: brahma eva idam

original: “etayā dvārā prāpadyata“,
analyzed: etayā dvārā prāpadyata

original: “prajñānasya nāmadheyāni“,
analyzed: prajñānasya nāmadheyāni

original: “satyaṃ jñānam anantaṃ brahma“,
analyzed: satyam jñānam anantam brahma

original: “tasmād vā“,
analyzed: tasmāt vā

original: “tat sṛṣṭvā tad evānuprāviśat“,
analyzed: tat sṛṣṭvā tat eva anuprāviśat

original: “eko devaḥ sarvabhūteṣu gūḍhaḥ“,
analyzed: ekaḥ devaḥ sarva bhūteṣu gūḍhaḥ

original: “aśarīraṃ śarīreṣu“,
analyzed: aśarīram śarīreṣu

original: “na jāyate mriyate“,
analyzed: na jāyate mriyate

original: “svapnāntaṃ jāgaritāntam“,
analyzed: svapna antam jāgarita antam

original: “sa ma ātmeti vidyāt“,
analyzed: sa me ātmā iti vidyāt

original: “yas tu sarvāṇi bhūtāni“,
analyzed: yaḥ tu sarvāṇi bhūtāni

original: “tad ejati tan naijati“,
analyzed: tat ejati tat na ejati

original: “venas tat paśyan“,
analyzed: venaḥ tat paśyan

original: “tad evāgniḥ“,
analyzed: tat eva agniḥ

original: “aham,
analyzed: aham

original: manur abhavam sūryaś ca” “antaḥ praviṣṭaḥ śāstā janānām“,
analyzed: manuḥ abhavam sūryaḥ ca antar praviṣṭaḥ śāstā janānām

original: “sad eva somya“,
analyzed: sat eva somya

original: “tat satyaṃ sa ātmā tat tvam asi” ityādiśrutibhyaḥ // SamUpad_II,1.37 //
analyzed: tat satyam saḥ ātmā tat tvam asi ityādi śrutibhyaḥ

original: smṛtibhyaś ca -- “pūḥ prāṇinaḥ ... guhāśayasya“,
analyzed: smṛtibhyaḥ ca pūḥ prāṇinaḥ guhā āśayasya

original: “ātmaiva devatāḥ“,
analyzed: ātmā eva devatāḥ

original: “navadvāre pure“,
analyzed: nava dvāre pure

original: “samaṃ sarveṣu bhūteṣu“,
analyzed: samam sarveṣu bhūteṣu

original: “vidyāvinayasaṃpanne“,
analyzed: vidyā vinaya saṃpanne

original: “avibhaktaṃvibhakteṣu “,
analyzed: a vibhaktam a vibhakteṣu

original: “vāsudevaḥ sarvam” ityādibhyaḥ,
analyzed: vāsudevaḥ sarvam ityādibhyaḥ

original: eka evātmā paraṃ brahma [sarva]saṃsāradharmavinirmuktas tvam iti siddham // SamUpad_II,1.38 //
analyzed: ekaḥ eva ātmā param brahma sarva saṃsāra dharma vinirmuktaḥ tvam iti siddham

original: sa yadi brūyāt -- yadi bhagavan “anantaro 'bāhyaḥ“,
analyzed: sa yadi brūyāt yadi bhagavan anantaraḥ bāhyaḥ

original: “sabāhyābhyantaro hy ajaḥ“,
analyzed: sa bāhya abhyantaraḥ hi ajaḥ

original: “kṛtsnaḥ prajñānaghana eva” saindhavaghanavad ātmā sarvamūrtibhedavarjita ākāśavad ekarasaḥ,
analyzed: kṛtsnaḥ prajñāna ghanaḥ eva saindhava ghana vat ātmā sarva mūrti bheda varjitaḥ ākāśa vat ekarasaḥ

original: kim idaṃ dṛśyate śrūyate vā sadhyaṃ sādhanaṃ [vā] sādhakaś ceti śrutismṛtilokaprasiddhaṃ vādiśatavipratipattiviṣaya iti // SamUpad_II,1.39
analyzed: kim idam dṛśyate śrūyate vā sadhyam sādhanam vā sādhakaḥ ca iti śruti smṛti loka prasiddham vādi śata vipratipatti viṣayaḥ iti

original: ācāryo brūyāt -- avidyākṛtam etad yad idaṃ dṛśyate śrūyate vā,
analyzed: ācāryaḥ brūyāt avidyā kṛtam etat yat idam dṛśyate śrūyate vā

original: paramārthatas tv eka evātmā avidyādrṣṭer anekavad avābhāsate,
analyzed: paramārthataḥ tu ekaḥ eva ātmā avidyā drṣṭeḥ aneka vat avābhāsate

original: timiradṛṣṭyānekacandravat /
analyzed: timira dṛṣṭyā aneka candra vat

original: “yatra vānyad iva syāt“,
analyzed: yatra vā anyat iva syāt

original: “yatra hi dvaitam iva bhavati tad itara itaraṃ paśyati“,
analyzed: yatra hi dvaitam iva bhavati tat itaraḥ itaram paśyati

original: “mṛtyoḥ sa mṛtyum āpnoti“,
analyzed: mṛtyoḥ sa mṛtyum āpnoti

original: “atha yatrānyat paśyaty anyac chṛṇoty anyad vijānāti tad alpam,
analyzed: atha yatra anyat paśyati anyat śṛṇoti anyat vijānāti tat alpam

original: ... atha yad alpaṃ tan martyam“, iti,
analyzed: atha yat alpam tat martyam iti

original: “vācārambhaṇaṃ vikāro nāmadheyam“,
analyzed: vācā ārambhaṇam vikāraḥ nāmadheyam

original: [“anṛtam“,
analyzed: anṛtam

original: ] “anyo 'sāv anyo 'ham” iti bhedadarśananindopapatter avidyākṛtaṃ dvaitam “ekam evādvitīyam“,
analyzed: sau anyaḥ ham iti bheda darśana nindā upapatteḥ avidyā kṛtam dvaitam ekam eva advitīyam

original: “yatra tv asya“,
analyzed: yatra tu asya

original: “ko mohaḥ kaḥ śokaḥ” ityādyekatvavidhiśrutibhyaś ceti // SamUpad_II,1.40 //
analyzed: kaḥ mohaḥ kaḥ śokaḥ ityādi eka tva vidhi śrutibhyaḥ ca iti

original: yady evaṃ bhagavan,
analyzed: yadi evam bhagavan

original: kimarthaṃ śrutyā sādhyasādhanādibheda ucyate utpattiḥ pralayaś ceti // SamUpad_II,1.41 //
analyzed: kimartham śrutyā sādhya sādhana ādi bhedaḥ ucyate utpattiḥ pralayaḥ ca iti

original: atrocyate -- avidyāvata upāttaśarīrādibhedasyeṣṭāniṣṭayoginam ātmānaṃ manyamānasya
analyzed: atrā ucyate avidyāvataḥ upātta śarīra ādi bhedasya iṣṭa aniṣṭa yoginam ātmānam manyamānasya

original: sādhanair eveṣṭāniṣṭaprāptiparihāropāyavivekam ajānata iṣṭaprāptiṃ cāniṣṭaparihāraṃ
analyzed: sādhanaiḥ eva iṣṭa aniṣṭa prāpti parihāra upāya vivekam a jānataḥ iṣṭa prāptim ca aniṣṭa parihāram

original: cecchataḥ śanais tadviṣayam ajñānaṃ nivartayati śāstraṃ na sādhyasādhanādibhedaṃ vidhatte /
analyzed: ca icchataḥ śanais tad viṣayam ajñānam nivartayati śāstram na sādhya sādhana ādi bhedam vidhatte

original: aniṣṭarūpaḥ saṃsāro hi sa iti tad bhedadṛṣṭim evāvidyāṃ saṃsāramūlam unmūlayati utpattipralayādyekatvopapattipradarśanena // SamUpad_II,1.42
analyzed: aniṣṭa rūpaḥ saṃsāraḥ hi saḥ iti tat bheda dṛṣṭim eva avidyām saṃsāra mūlam unmūlayati utpatti pralaya ādi ekatva upapatti pradarśanena

original: avidyāyām unmūlitāyāṃ śrutismṛtinyāyebhyaḥ “anantaram abāhyam“,
analyzed: avidyāyām unmūlitāyām śruti smṛti nyāyebhyaḥ anantaram abāhyam

original: “sabāhyābhyantaro hy ajaḥ” saindhavaghanavat “prajñānaghana eva“,
analyzed: sa bāhya abhyantaraḥ hi ajaḥ saindhava ghana vat prajñāna ghanaḥ eva

original: ekarasa ātmā ākāśavat paripūrṇa ity atraivaikā prajñā pratiṣṭhitā paramārthadarśino bhavati,
analyzed: eka rasaḥ ātmā ākāśa vat paripūrṇaḥ iti atra eva ekā prajñā pratiṣṭhitā parama artha darśinaḥ bhavati

original: na sādhyasādhanotpattipralayādibhedenāśuddhigandho 'py upapadyate // SamUpad_II,1.43 //
analyzed: na sādhya sādhana utpatti pralaya ādi bhedena aśuddhi gandhaḥ upi upapadyate

original: tac caitat paramārthadarśanaṃ pratipattum icchatā varṇāśramādyabhimānakṛtapāṅktarūpaputravittalokaiṣaṇādibhyo vyutthānaṃ kartavyam /
analyzed: tat ca etat parama artha darśanam pratipattum icchatā varṇa āśrama ādi abhimāna kṛta pāṅkta rūpa putra vitta loka eṣaṇā ādibhyaḥ vyutthānam kartavyam

original: samyakpratyayavirodhāt tadabhimānasya bhedadarśanapratiṣedhārthopapattiś copapadyate /
analyzed: samyak pratyaya virodhāt tad abhimānasya bheda darśana pratiṣedha artha upapattiḥ ca upapadyate

original: na hy ekasminn ātmany asaṃsāritvabuddhau śāstranyāyotpāditāyāṃ tadviparītā buddhir bhavati /
analyzed: na hi ekasmin ātmani asaṃsāri tva buddhau śāstra nyāya utpāditāyām tad viparītā buddhiḥ bhavati

original: na hy agnau śītatvabuddhiḥ,
analyzed: na hi agnau śīta tva buddhiḥ

original: śarīre vājarāmaraṇabuddhiḥ /
analyzed: śarīre vā ajara amaraṇa buddhiḥ

original: tasmād avidyākāryatvāt sarvakarmaṇāṃ tatsādhanānāṃ ca yajñopavītādīnāṃ paramārthadarśananiṣṭhena tyāgaḥ kartavyaḥ // SamUpad_II,1.44 //
analyzed: tasmāt avidyā kārya tvāt sarva karmaṇām tad sādhanānām ca yajñopavīta ādīnām paramārtha darśana niṣṭhena tyāgaḥ kartavyaḥ

original: iti śiṣyapratibodhana[vidhi]prakaraṇam // SamUpad_II,1 //
analyzed: iti śiṣya pratibodhana vidhi prakaraṇam

original: sukham āsīnaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ brahmaniṣṭhaṃ kaścid brahmacārī janmamaraṇalakṣaṇāt saṃsārān nirviṇṇo mumukṣur vidhivad upasannaḥ papraccha -- bhagavan,
analyzed: sukham āsīnam brāhmaṇam brahma niṣṭham kaścid brahmacārī janma maraṇa lakṣaṇāt saṃsārāt nirviṇṇaḥ mumukṣuḥ vidhivat upasannaḥ papraccha bhagavan

original: katham ahaṃ saṃsārān mokṣiṣye /
analyzed: katham aham saṃsārāt mokṣiṣye

original: śarīrendriyaviṣayavedanāvān jāgarite duḥkham anubhavāmi tathā svapne 'nubhavāmi punaḥ punaḥ suṣuptipratipattyā viśramya /
analyzed: śarīra indriya viṣaya vedanāvān jāgarite duḥkham anubhavāmi tathā svapne nubhavāmi punar punar suṣupti pratipattyā viśramya

original: kim ayam eva mama svabhāvaḥ,
analyzed: kim ayam eva mama svabhāvaḥ

original: kiṃ vānyasvabhāvasya sato naimittika iti /
analyzed: kim vā anya svabhāvasya sataḥ naimittikaḥ iti

original: yadi svabhāvo na me mokṣāśā svabhāvasyāvarjanīyatvāt /
analyzed: yadi svabhāvaḥ na me mokṣa āśā svabhāvasya a varjanīya tvāt

original: atha naimittiko nimittaparihāre syān mokṣopapattiḥ // SamUpad_II,2.45 //
analyzed: atha naimittikaḥ nimitta parihāre syāt mokṣa upapattiḥ

original: taṃ gurur uvāca -- śṛṇu vatsa,
analyzed: tam guruḥ uvāca śṛṇu vatsa

original: na tavāyaṃ svabhāvaḥ /
analyzed: na tava ayam svabhāvaḥ

original: naimittikaḥ // SamUpad_II,2.46 //
analyzed: naimittikaḥ

original: ity uktaḥ śiṣya uvāca -- kiṃ nimittam,
analyzed: iti uktaḥ śiṣyaḥ uvāca kim nimittam

original: kiṃ vā tasya nivartakam,
analyzed: kim vā tasya nivartakam

original: ko vā mama svabhāvaḥ,
analyzed: kaḥ vā mama svabhāvaḥ

original: yasmin nimitte nivartite naimittikābhāvo roganimittanivṛttāv iva rogī svabhāvaṃ pratipadyeyeti // SamUpad_II,2.47 //
analyzed: yasmin nimitte nivartite naimittika abhāvaḥ roga nimitta nivṛttau iva rogī svabhāvam pratipadyeya iti

original: gurur uvāca -- avidyā nimittam,
analyzed: guruḥ uvāca avidyā nimittam

original: vidyā tasyā nivartikā,
analyzed: vidyā tasyāḥ nivartikā

original: avidyāyāṃ nivṛttāyāṃ tannimittābhāvān mokṣyase janmamaraṇalakṣaṇāt saṃsārāt,
analyzed: avidyāyām nivṛttāyām tad nimitta abhāvāt mokṣyase janma maraṇa lakṣaṇāt saṃsārāt

original: svapnajāgradduḥkhaṃ ca nānubhaviṣyasīti // SamUpad_II,2.48 //
analyzed: svapna jāgrat duḥkham ca na anubhaviṣyasi iti

original: śiṣya uvāca -- kā sāvidyā,
analyzed: śiṣyaḥ uvāca kā sā avidyā

original: kiṃviṣayā vā,
analyzed: kiṃviṣayāḥ vā

original: vidyā ca kāvidyānivartikā yayā svabhāvaṃ pratipadyeyeti // SamUpad_II,2.49 //
analyzed: vidyā ca kāvidyā nivartikā yayā svabhāvam pratipadyeya iti

original: gurur uvāca-- tvaṃ paramātmānaṃ santam asaṃsāriṇaṃ saṃsāry aham asmīti viparītaṃ pratipadyase,
analyzed: guruḥ uvāca tvam paramātmānam santam asaṃsāriṇam saṃsārī aham asmi iti viparītam pratipadyase

original: akartāraṃ santaṃ karteti,
analyzed: a kartāram santam kartā iti

original: abhoktāraṃ santaṃ bhokteti,
analyzed: a bhoktāram santam bhoktā iti

original: vidyamānaṃ cāvidyamānam iti,
analyzed: vidyamānam ca a vidyamānam iti

original: iyam avidyā // SamUpad_II,2.50 //
analyzed: iyam avidyā

original: śiṣya uvāca -- yady apy ahaṃ vidyamānas tathāpi na paramātmā /
analyzed: śiṣyaḥ uvāca yadi api aham vidyamānaḥ tathā api na paramātmā

original: kartṛtvabhoktṛtvalakṣaṇaḥ saṃsāro mama svabhāvaḥ,
analyzed: kartṛ tva bhoktṛ tva lakṣaṇaḥ saṃsāraḥ mama svabhāvaḥ

original: pratyakṣādibhiḥ pramāṇair anubhūyamānatvāt /
analyzed: pratyakṣa ādibhiḥ pramāṇaiḥ anubhūyamāna tvāt

original: nāvidyānimittaḥ,
analyzed: na avidyā nimittaḥ

original: avidyāyāḥ svātmaviṣayatvānupapatteḥ /
analyzed: avidyāyāḥ sva ātma viṣaya tva anupapatteḥ

original: avidyā nāmānyasminn anyadharmādhyāropaṇā /
analyzed: avidyā nāma anyasmin anya dharma adhyāropaṇā

original: yathā prasiddhaṃ rajataṃ prasiddhāyāṃ śuktikāyām,
analyzed: yathā prasiddham rajatam prasiddhāyām śuktikāyām

original: yathā prasiddhaṃ puruṣaṃ sthāṇāv adhyāropayati,
analyzed: yathā prasiddham puruṣam sthāṇau adhyāropayati

original: prasiddhaṃ vā sthāṇuṃ puruṣe /
analyzed: prasiddham vā sthāṇum puruṣe

original: nāprasiddhaṃ prasiddhe,
analyzed: na a prasiddham prasiddhe

original: prasiddhaṃ vāprasiddhe /
analyzed: prasiddham vā a prasiddhe

original: na cātmany anātmānam adhyāropayati,
analyzed: na ca ātmani anātmānam adhyāropayati

original: ātmano 'prasiddhatvāt /
analyzed: ātmanaḥ prasiddha tvāt

original: tathātmānam anātmani,
analyzed: tathā ātmānam anātmani

original: ātmano 'prasiddhatvād eva // SamUpad_II,2.51 //
analyzed: ātmanaḥ prasiddha tvāt eva

original: taṃ gurur uvāca -- na,
analyzed: tam guruḥ uvāca na

original: vyabhicārāt /
analyzed: vyabhicārāt

original: na hi vatsa, prasiddhaṃ prasiddha evādhyāropayatīti niyantuṃ śakyam /
analyzed: na hi vatsa prasiddham prasiddhaḥ eva adhyāropayati iti niyantum śakyam

original: ātmany adhyāropaṇadarśanāt /
analyzed: ātmani adhyāropaṇa darśanāt

original: gauro 'haṃ kṛṣṇo 'ham iti dehadharmasyāhaṃpratyayaviṣaya ātmany ahaṃpratyayaviṣayasya ca dehe 'yam aham asmīti // SamUpad_II,2.52 //
analyzed: gauraḥ ham kṛṣṇaḥ ham iti deha dharmasya ahaṃpratyaya viṣaye ātmani ahaṃpratyaya viṣayasya ca dehe yam aham asmi iti

original: śiṣya āha -- prasiddha eva tarhy ātmāhaṃpratyayaviṣayatayā dehaś cāyam iti /
analyzed: śiṣyaḥ āha prasiddhaḥ eva tarhi ātmā ahaṃpratyaya viṣaya tayā dehaḥ ca ayam iti

original: tatraivaṃ sati prasiddhayor eva dehātmanor itaretarādhyāropaṇā[t] sthāṇupuruṣayoḥ śuktikārajatayor iva /
analyzed: tatra evam sati prasiddhayoḥ eva deha ātmanoḥ itaretara adhyāropaṇāt sthāṇu puruṣayoḥ śuktikā rajatayoḥ iva

original: tatra kaṃ viseṣam āśritya bhagavatoktaṃ prasiddhayor itaretarādhyāropaṇeti niyantuṃ na śakyata iti // SamUpad_II,2.53 //
analyzed: tatra kam viseṣam āśritya bhagavatā uktam prasiddhayoḥ itaretara adhyāropaṇā iti niyantum na śakyate iti

original: gurur uvāca -- śṛṇu /
analyzed: guruḥ uvāca śṛṇu

original: satyaṃ prasiddhau dehātmānau na tu sthāṇupuruṣāv iva viviktapratyayaviṣayatayā sarvalokaprasiddhau /
analyzed: satyam prasiddhau deha ātmānau na tu sthāṇu puruṣau iva vivikta pratyaya viṣaya tayā sarva loka prasiddhau

original: kathaṃ tarhi /
analyzed: katham tarhi

original: nityam eva nirantarāviviktapratyayaviṣayatayā /
analyzed: nityam eva nirantara avivikta pratyaya viṣaya tayā

original: na hy ayaṃ deho 'yam ātmeti viviktābhyāṃ pratyayābhyāṃ dehātmānau gṛhṇāti yataḥ kaścit /
analyzed: na hi ayam dehaḥ yam ātmā iti viviktābhyām pratyayābhyām deha ātmānau gṛhṇāti yatas kaścid

original: ata eva hi momuhyate loka ātmānātmaviṣaye,
analyzed: atas eva hi momuhyate lokaḥ ātma anātma viṣaye

original: evam ātmā naivam ātmeti /
analyzed: evam ātmā na evam ātmā iti

original: imaṃ viśeṣam āśrityāvocaṃ naivaṃ śakyam iti // SamUpad_II,2.54 //
analyzed: imam viśeṣam āśritya avocam na evam śakyam iti

original: nanv avidyādhyāropitaṃ [yatra] yat tad asat [tatra] dṛṣṭam,
analyzed: nanu avidyā adhyāropitam yatra yat tat asat tatra dṛṣṭam

original: yathā rajataṃ śuktikāyām,
analyzed: yathā rajatam śuktikāyām

original: sthāṇau puruṣaḥ,
analyzed: sthāṇau puruṣaḥ

original: rajjvāṃ sarpaḥ,
analyzed: rajjvām sarpaḥ

original: ākāśe talamalinatvam ityādi /
analyzed: ākāśe tala malina tvam ityādi

original: tathā dehātmanor api nityam evo nirantarāviviktapratyayatayetaretarādhyāropaṇā kṛtā syāt,
analyzed: tathā deha ātmanoḥ api nityam nirantara avivikta pratyaya tayā itaretara adhyāropaṇā kṛtā syāt

original: tad itaretarayor nityam evāsattvaṃ syāt /
analyzed: tat itaretarayoḥ nityam eva a sattvam syāt

original: yathā śuktikādiṣv avidyādhyāropitānāṃ rajatādīnāṃ nityam evātyantāsattvam,
analyzed: yathā śuktikā ādiṣu avidyā adhyāropitānām rajata ādīnām nityam eva atyanta asattvam

original: tadviparītānāṃ ca viparīteṣu,
analyzed: tad viparītānām ca viparīteṣu

original: tadvad dehātmanor avidyayaivetaretarādhyāropaṇā kṛtā syāt /
analyzed: tadvat deha ātmanoḥ avidyayā eva itaretara adhyāropaṇā kṛtā syāt

original: tatraivaṃ sati dehātmanor asattvaṃ prasajyeta /
analyzed: tatra evam sati deha ātmanoḥ asattvam prasajyeta

original: tac cāniṣṭam,
analyzed: tat ca aniṣṭam

original: vaināśikapakṣatvāt /
analyzed: vaināśika pakṣa tvāt

original: atha tadviparyayeṇa deha ātmany avidyayādhyāropitaḥ,
analyzed: atha tad viparyayeṇa dehaḥ ātmani avidyayā adhyāropitaḥ

original: dehasyātmani sati asattvaṃ prasajyeta /
analyzed: dehasya ātmani sati asattvam prasajyeta

original: tac cāniṣṭam,
analyzed: tat ca aniṣṭam

original: pratyakṣādivirodhāt /
analyzed: pratyakṣa ādi virodhāt

original: tasmād dehātmānau nāvidyayetaretarasminn adhyāropitau /
analyzed: tasmāt deha ātmānau na avidyayā itaretarasmin adhyāropitau

original: kathaṃ tarhi /
analyzed: katham tarhi

original: vaṃśastambhavan nityasaṃyuktau // SamUpad_II,2.55 //
analyzed: vaṃśa stambha vat nitya saṃyuktau

original: na / anityatvaparārthatvaprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: na anitya tva parārtha tva prasaṅgāt

original: saṃhatatvāt [parārthatvam anityatvaṃ ca] vaṃśastambhādivad eva /
analyzed: saṃhata tvāt parārtha tvam anitya tvam ca vaṃśa stambha ādi vat eva

original: kiṃ ca yas tu parair dehena saṃhataḥ kalpita ātmā sa saṃhatatvāt parārthaḥ /
analyzed: kim ca yaḥ tu paraiḥ dehena saṃhataḥ kalpitaḥ ātmā sa saṃhata tvāt para arthaḥ

original: tenāsaṃhataḥ paro 'nyo nityaḥ siddhas tāvat // SamUpad_II,2.56 //
analyzed: tena a saṃhataḥ paraḥ nyaḥ nityaḥ siddhaḥ tāvat

original: tasyāsaṃhatasya dehe dehamātratayādhyāropitatvenāsattvānityatvādidoṣaprasaṅgo bhavati /
analyzed: tasya asaṃhatasya dehe deha mātra tayā adhyāropita tvena asattva anitya tva ādi doṣa prasaṅgaḥ bhavati

original: tatra nirātmako deha iti vaināśikapakṣaprāptidoṣaḥ syāt // SamUpad_II,2.57 //
analyzed: tatra nirātmakaḥ dehaḥ iti vaināśika pakṣa prāpti doṣaḥ syāt

original: na / svata evātmana ākāśasyevāsaṃhatatvābhyupagamāt /
analyzed: na svatas eva ātmanaḥ ākāśasya iva asaṃhata tva abhyupagamāt

original: sarveṇāsaṃhataḥ sann ātmeti na nirātmako dehādiḥ sarvaḥ syāt /
analyzed: sarveṇa a saṃhataḥ san ātmā iti na nirātmakaḥ deha ādiḥ sarvaḥ syāt

original: yathā cākāśaṃ sarveṇāsaṃhatam iti sarvaṃ na nirākāśaṃ bhavati, evam /
analyzed: yathā ca ākāśam sarveṇa a saṃhatam iti sarvam na nirākāśam bhavati evam

original: tasmān na vaināśikapakṣaprāptidoṣaḥ syāt // SamUpad_II,2.58 //
analyzed: tasmāt na vaināśika pakṣa prāpti doṣaḥ syāt

original: yat punar uktam,
analyzed: yat punar uktam

original: dehasyātmany asattve pratyakṣādivirodhaḥ syād iti /
analyzed: dehasya ātmani asattve pratyakṣa ādi virodhaḥ syāt iti

original: tan na /
analyzed: tat na

original: pratyakṣādibhir ātmani dehasya sattvānupalabdheḥ /
analyzed: pratyakṣa ādibhiḥ ātmani dehasya sattva anupalabdheḥ

original: na hy ātmani,
analyzed: na hi ātmani

original: kuṇḍe badaram,
analyzed: kuṇḍe badaram

original: kṣīre sarpiḥ,
analyzed: kṣīre sarpiḥ

original: tile tailam,
analyzed: tile tailam

original: bhittau citram iva ca,
analyzed: bhittau citram iva ca

original: pratyakṣādibhir deha upalabhyate /
analyzed: pratyakṣa ādibhiḥ dehaḥ upalabhyate

original: tasmān na pratyakṣādivirodhaḥ // SamUpad_II,2.59 //
analyzed: tasmāt na pratyakṣa ādi virodhaḥ

original: kathaṃ tarhi pratyakṣādyaprasiddhātmani dehādhyāropaṇa,
analyzed: katham tarhi pratyakṣa ādi aprasiddha ātmani deha adhyāropaṇa

original: dehe cātmāropaṇā // SamUpad_II,2.60 //
analyzed: dehe ca ātma āropaṇā

original: nāyaṃ doṣaḥ /
analyzed: na ayam doṣaḥ

original: svabhāva[pra]siddhatvād ātmanaḥ /
analyzed: svabhāva prasiddha tvāt ātmanaḥ

original: na hi kādācitkasiddhāv evādhyāropaṇā na nityasiddhāv iti niyantuṃ śakyam,
analyzed: na hi kādācitka siddhau eva adhyāropaṇā na nitya siddhau iti niyantum śakyam

original: ākāśe talamalādyadhyāropaṇadarśanāt // SamUpad_II,2.61 //
analyzed: ākāśe tala mala ādi adhyāropaṇa darśanāt

original: kiṃ bhagavan,
analyzed: kim bhagavan

original: dehātmanor itaretarādhyāropaṇā dehādisaṃghāṭakṛtāthavātmakṛteti // SamUpad_II,2.62 //
analyzed: deha ātmanoḥ itaretara adhyāropaṇā deha ādi saṃghāṭa kṛtā athavā ātma kṛtā iti

original: gurur uvāca -- yadi dehādisaṃghātakṛtā,
analyzed: guruḥ uvāca yadi deha ādi saṃghāta kṛtā

original: yadi vātmakṛtā,
analyzed: yadi vā ātma kṛtā

original: kiṃ tava syāt // SamUpad_II,2.63 //
analyzed: kim tava syāt

original: ity uktaḥ śiṣya āha -- yady ahaṃ dehādisaṃghātamātraḥ,
analyzed: iti uktaḥ śiṣyaḥ āha yadi aham deha ādi saṃghāta mātraḥ

original: tato mamācetanatvāt parārthatvam iti na matkṛtā dehātmanor itaretarādhyāropaṇā /
analyzed: tatas mama acetana tvāt parārtha tvam iti na mad kṛtā deha ātmanoḥ itaretara adhyāropaṇā

original: athāham ātmā paro 'nyaḥ saṃghātāt,
analyzed: atha aham ātmā paras nyaḥ saṃghātāt

original: citimattvāt svārtha iti mayaiva citimatātmany adhyāropaṇā kriyate sarvānarthabījabhūtā // SamUpad_II,2.64 //
analyzed: citimat tvāt svārthaḥ iti mayā eva citimatā ātmani adhyāropaṇā kriyate sarva anartha bīja bhūtā

original: ity ukto gurur uvāca -- anarthabījabhūtāṃ cen mithyādhyāropaṇāṃ jānīṣe,
analyzed: iti uktaḥ guruḥ uvāca anartha bīja bhūtām ced mithyā adhyāropaṇām jānīṣe

original: mā kārṣīs tarhi // SamUpad_II,2.65 //
analyzed: mā kārṣīḥ tarhi

original: naiva bhagavan,
analyzed: na eva bhagavan

original: śaknomi na kartum /
analyzed: śaknomi na kartum

original: anyena kenacit prayukto 'haṃ na svatantra iti // SamUpad_II,2.66 //
analyzed: anyena kenacid prayuktaḥ ham na svatantraḥ iti

original: na tarhy acitimattvāt svārthas tvam /
analyzed: na tarhi a citimat tvāt sva arthaḥ tvam

original: yena prayukto 'svatantraḥ pravartase,
analyzed: yena prayuktaḥ svatantraḥ pravartase

original: sa citimān svārthaḥ,
analyzed: sa citimān svārthaḥ

original: saṃghāṭa eva tvam // SamUpad_II,2.67 //
analyzed: saṃghāṭaḥ eva tvam

original: yady acetano 'ham,
analyzed: yadi acetanaḥ ham

original: kathaṃ sukhaduḥkhavedanāṃ bhavaduktaṃ ca jānāmi // SamUpad_II,2.68 //
analyzed: katham sukha duḥkha vedanām bhavat uktam ca jānāmi

original: gurur uvāca -- kiṃ sukhaduḥkhavedanāyā maduktāc cānyas tvaṃ kiṃ vānanya eveti // SamUpad_II,2.69 //
analyzed: guruḥ uvāca kim sukha duḥkha vedanāyāḥ mad uktāt ca anyaḥ tvam kim vā ananyaḥ eva iti

original: śiṣya uvāca -- nāhaṃ tāvad ananyaḥ /
analyzed: śiṣyaḥ uvāca na aham tāvat ananyaḥ

original: kasmāt /
analyzed: kasmāt

original: yasmāt tadubhayaṃ karmabhūtaṃ gaṭādim iva jānāmi /
analyzed: yasmāt tat ubhayam karma bhūtam gaṭa ādim iva jānāmi

original: yadi ananyo 'ham,
analyzed: yadi an anyaḥ ham

original: tena tadubhayaṃ na jānīyām,
analyzed: tena tat ubhayam na jānīyām

original: kiṃ tu jānāmi,
analyzed: kim tu jānāmi

original: tasmād anyaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt anyaḥ

original: sukhaduḥkhavedanāvikriyā ca svārthaiva prāpnoti,
analyzed: sukha duḥkha vedanā vikriyā ca sva arthā eva prāpnoti

original: tvaduktaṃ ca syāt,
analyzed: tvad uktam ca syāt

original: ananyatve,
analyzed: ananyatve

original: na ca tayoḥ svārthatā yuktā /
analyzed: na ca tayoḥ svārtha tā yuktā

original: na hi candanakaṇṭakakṛte sukhaduḥkhe candanakaṇṭakārthe,
analyzed: na hi candanakaṇṭaka kṛte sukha duḥkhe candanakaṇṭaka arthe

original: ghaṭopayogo vā ghaṭārthaḥ /
analyzed: ghaṭa upayogaḥ vā ghaṭa arthaḥ

original: tasmāt tadvijñātur mama candanādikṛto 'rthaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt tad vijñātuḥ mama candana ādi kṛtaḥ rthaḥ

original: ahaṃ hi tato 'nyaḥ samastam arthaṃ jānāmi buddhyārūḍham // SamUpad_II,2.70 //
analyzed: aham hi tatas nyas samastam artham jānāmi buddhi ārūḍham

original: taṃ gurur uvāca -- evaṃ tarhi svārthas tvaṃ citimattvān na pareṇa prayujyase /
analyzed: tam guruḥ uvāca evam tarhi sva arthaḥ tvam citimat tvāt na pareṇa prayujyase

original: na hi citimān paratantraḥ pareṇa prayujyate,
analyzed: na hi citimān paratantraḥ pareṇa prayujyate

original: citimataś citimadarthatvānupapatteḥ,
analyzed: citimataḥ citimat artha tva anupapatteḥ

original: samatvāt,
analyzed: sama tvāt

original: prakāśayor iva /
analyzed: prakāśayoḥ iva

original: nāpy acitimadarthatvaṃ citimato bhavati,
analyzed: na api a citimat artha tvam citimataḥ bhavati

original: acitimato 'citimattvād eva svārthasaṃbandhānupapatteḥ /
analyzed: citimat tvāt eva svārtha saṃbandha anupapatteḥ

original: nāpy acitimator anyonyārthatvaṃ dṛṣṭam /
analyzed: na api acitimatoḥ anyonya artha tvam dṛṣṭam

original: na hi kāṣṭhakuḍye 'nyonyārthaṃ kurvāte // SamUpad_II,2.71 //
analyzed: na hi kāṣṭha kuḍye nyonya artham kurvāte

original: nanu citimattve same 'pi bhṛtyasvāminor anyonyārthatvaṃ dṛṣṭam // SamUpad_II,2.72 //
analyzed: nanu citimat tve same pi bhṛtya svāminoḥ anyonya artha tvam dṛṣṭam

original: naivam, agner uṣṇaprakāśavat tava citimattvasya vivakṣitatvāt /
analyzed: na evam agneḥ uṣṇa prakāśa vat tava citimat tvasya vivakṣita tvāt

original: darśitaś ca dṛṣṭāntaḥ prakāśayor iveti /
analyzed: darśitaḥ ca dṛṣṭāntaḥ prakāśayoḥ iva iti

original: tatraivaṃ sati svabuddhyārūḍham eva sarvam upalabhase 'gnyuṣṇaprakāśatulyena kūṭasthanityacaitanyasvarūpeṇa /
analyzed: tatra evam sati sva buddhi ārūḍham eva sarvam upalabhase gni uṣṇa prakāśa tulyena kūṭastha nitya caitanya svarūpeṇa

original: yadi caivam ātmanaḥ sarvadā nirviśeṣatvam abhyupagacchasi /
analyzed: yadi ca evam ātmanaḥ sarvadā nirviśeṣa tvam abhyupagacchasi

original: kim ity ūcivān,
analyzed: kim iti ūcivān

original: suṣupte viśramya viśramya jāgratsvapnayor duḥkham anubhavāmi /
analyzed: suṣupte viśramya viśramya jāgrat svapnayoḥ duḥkham anubhavāmi

original: kim ayam eva mama svabhāvaḥ,
analyzed: kim ayam eva mama svabhāvaḥ

original: kiṃ vā naimittika iti ca /
analyzed: kim vā naimittike iti ca

original: kim asau vyāmoho 'pagataḥ,
analyzed: kim asau vyāmohaḥ pagataḥ

original: kiṃ vā na // SamUpad_II,2.73 //
analyzed: kim vā na

original: ity uktaḥ śiṣya uvāca -- bhagavan,
analyzed: iti uktaḥ śiṣyaḥ uvāca bhagavan

original: apagatas tvatprasādād vyāmohaḥ,
analyzed: apagataḥ tvad prasādāt vyāmohaḥ

original: kiṃ tu mama kūṭasthatāyāṃ saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: kim tu mama kūṭastha tāyām saṃśayaḥ

original: katham /
analyzed: katham

original: śabdādīnāṃ svataḥsiddhir nāsti,
analyzed: śabda ādīnām svatas siddhiḥ na asti

original: acetanatvāt /
analyzed: acetana tvāt

original: śabdādyākārapratyayotpattes tu teṣām /
analyzed: śabda ādi ākāra pratyaya utpatteḥ tu teṣām

original: pratyayānām itaretaravyāvṛttaviśeṣaṇānāṃ nīlapītādyākāravatāṃ svataḥsiddhyasaṃbhavāt /
analyzed: pratyayānām itaretara vyāvṛtta viśeṣaṇānām nīla pīta ādi ākāravatām svatas siddhi asaṃbhavāt

original: tasmād bāhyākāranimittatvaṃ gamyata iti bāhyākāravacchabdādyākāratvasiddhiḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt bāhya ākāra nimitta tvam gamyate iti bāhya ākāra vat śabda ādi ākāra tva siddhiḥ

original: tathā pratyayānām apy ahaṃpratyayālambanavastubhedānāṃ saṃhatatvād acaitanyopapatteḥ svārthatvāsaṃbhavāt svarūpavyatiriktagrāhakagrāhyatvena  #
analyzed: tathā pratyayānām api ahaṃpratyaya ālambana vastu bhedānām saṃhata tvāt acaitanya upapatteḥ svārtha tva asaṃbhavāt svarūpa vyatirikta grāhaka grāhya tvena

original: siddhiḥ śabdādivad eva /
analyzed: siddhiḥ śabda ādi vat eva

original: asaṃhatatve sati caitanyātmakatvāt svārtho 'py ahaṃ pratyayānāṃ nīlapītādyākārāṇām upalabdheti vikriyāvān eva,
analyzed: asaṃhata tve sati caitanya ātmaka tvāt aham pratyayānām nīla pīta ādi ākārāṇām upalabdhā iti vikriyāvān eva

original: kūṭastha iti saṃśayaḥ // SamUpad_II,2.74 //
analyzed: kūṭasthaḥ iti saṃśayaḥ

original: taṃ gurur uvāca -- na yuktas tava saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: tam guruḥ uvāca na yuktaḥ tava saṃśayaḥ

original: yatas teṣāṃ pratyayānāṃ niyamenāśeṣata upalabdher evāpariṇāmitvāt kūṭasthatvasiddhau niścayahetum evāśeṣacittapracāropalabdhiṃ saṃśayahetum  #
analyzed: yatas teṣām pratyayānām niyamena aśeṣatas upalabdheḥ eva apariṇāmi tvāt kūṭastha tva siddhau niścaya hetum eva aśeṣa citta pracāra upalabdhim saṃśaya hetum

original: āttha /
analyzed: āttha

original: yadi hi tava pariṇāmitvaṃ syāt,
analyzed: yadi hi tava pariṇāmi tvam syāt

original: aśeṣasvaviṣayacittapracāropalabdhir na syāt,
analyzed: aśeṣa sva viṣaya citta pracāra upalabdhiḥ na syāt

original: cittasyeva svaviṣaye yathā cendriyāṇāṃ svaviṣayeṣu /
analyzed: cittasya iva sva viṣaye yathā ca indriyāṇām sva viṣayeṣu

original: na ca tathātmanas tava svaviṣayaikadeśopalabdhiḥ /
analyzed: na ca tathā ātmanaḥ tava sva viṣaya eka deśa upalabdhiḥ

original: ataḥ kūṭasthataiva taveti // SamUpad_II,2.75 //
analyzed: atas kūṭastha tā eva tava iti

original: tatrāha -- upalabdhir nāma dhātvartho vikriyaiva,
analyzed: tatra āha upalabdhiḥ nāma dhātvarthaḥ vikriyā eva

original: upalabdhuḥ kūṭasth[ātm]atā ceti viruddham // SamUpad_II,2.76 //
analyzed: upalabdhuḥ kūṭastha ātma tā ca iti viruddham

original: na / dhātvarthavikriyāyām upalabdhyupacārāt /
analyzed: na dhātvartha vikriyāyām upalabdhi upacārāt

original: yo hi bauddhaḥ pratyayaḥ sa dhātvartho vikriyātmaka ātmana upalabdhyābhāsaphalāvasāna ity upalabdhiśabdenopacaryate /
analyzed: yaḥ hi bauddhaḥ pratyayaḥ sa dhātvarthaḥ vikriyā ātmakaḥ ātmanaḥ upalabdhi ābhāsa phala avasānaḥ iti upalabdhi śabdena upacaryate
